title: Achievements
content: Achievements are a feature in Islands introduced on January 20, 2023 . Completing achievements grant Achievement Points (AP) and sometimes give bonus rewards. The player's AP count determines their placement on the server leaderboard.  List of achievements [ ]  Events [ ]  Achievement Description AP rewarded Bonus rewards Halloween Event 2022 Killed Zombie Cletus in the Halloween 2022 event 10 I'll keep my brains, thanks! Killed Zombie Cletus 25 times in the Halloween 2022 event 25 Christmas Event 2022 Complete a match of the snowball fight [sic] in the 2022 christmas event [sic] 10 Snowball Combatant Completed 25 snowball fight matches 25 Lunar Event 2023 Defeat the Lunar rabbit [sic] in the 2023 Lunar event 10 1x Gold Envelope 2023 It's just a harmless bunny... Defeat the Lunar Rabbit in the Lunar 2023 event 6 times 25 3x Gold Envelope 2023 Year of the Rabbit Collect all of the Rabbit-related event items 1x Lunar Rabbit Statue 1x Lunar Rabbit Plushie 1x Lunar Rabbit Banner 50 3x Gold Envelope 2023 A Spooky Collection Collect both the Wrath Plushies and Pet Egg event items Wraith Boss Plushie Render 2000x2000.png 3x Wraith Boss Plushie Cat Pet Spawn Egg Render 2000x2000.png 1x Cat Pet Spawn Egg 50 250x Haunted Mansion Event Ticket The Wicked Wraith Kill The Wraith Boss 20 times! 50 150x Haunted Mansion Event Ticket Mansion Mayhem! title: Acorn
content: Acorn Type of block Non-solid block; Harvestable Spawns Buffalkor Island Wizard Island Sell price 2 coins Best tool Luminous Transparent Description An acorn found in the wilderness. An acorn is a plant that naturally spawns on Buffalkor Island and Wizard Island .  Obtaining [ ]  Natural generation [ ]  Acorns naturally spawn on Buffalkor Island and Wizard Island . It can be harvested by pressing "F" on PC, but breaking a naturally-generated acorn will not drop itself.  Breaking [ ]  Acorns can be instantly removed by harvesting it, but will take slightly longer to remove if mining it. Only mining an acorn on a player island will drop it.  Acorn Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 18 Stone 10 10 Iron 6 6 Gilded Steel 5 5 Diamond 3 3 Opal 3 3 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Selling [ ]  Acorns can be sold to Ivon for 2 coins each.  Bugs and Glitches [ ]  Harvesting an acorn progresses some crop harvesting quests.  History [ ]  July 17, 2020 Added acorns.

title: Amber
content: Amber Location Desert Island Purpose None Occupation Weaponsmith Amber is a villager located in the city of Azarath on Desert Island .  Dialogue [ ]  "I've been forging the sharpest blades in Azarath, come back soon if you are interested." >Will do End.  History [ ]  May 8, 2021 Added Amber. July 30, 2022 Added quests for Amber.  Trivia [ ]  Amber uses the idle animation from the Bubbly animation package . Amber is the second female NPC, with Taliyah being the first.

content: Amethyst may refer to:  Amethyst Crystal ; an item mined from amethyst rocks . Amethyst Block ; a decorative block crafted with amethyst crystals. Amethyst Rock ; an ore rock that spawns in the Void Isles .

title: Amethyst_Crystal
content: Amethyst Crystal Amethyst Crystal Rock Dropped by Void Hound , Void Serpent , Void Crop Eater Spawns Void Isles Sell price 7 coins An amethyst crystal is a crystal that can be mined from an amethyst rock .  Obtaining [ ]  Mining [ ]  Amethyst rocks naturally generate throughout the Void Isles . Mining an amethyst rock yields 1 - 2 amethyst crystals after each stage and 9 Mining XP (36 with the 4x daily bonus), resulting in a total of 2 - 4 amethyst crystals and 18 Mining XP (72 with the 4x daily bonus) per rock.  Mob drop [ ]  Void hounds have a 1% chance of dropping an amethyst crystal upon defeat.  Serpent eggs [ ]  Opening a serpent egg has a 75% chance of rewarding 15 - 30 amethyst crystals, having a rarity of 'common'. title: Amir
content: Amir Location Desert Island Purpose None Occupation Merchant Amir is a villager located in the city of Azarath , located on Desert Island .  Dialogue [ ]  "Hey, I'm importing fresh products, come back when I've set up shop." >Okay End.  History [ ]  May 8, 2021 Added Amir. July 30, 2022 Added dialogue for Amir in the "Desert Heat" quest .  Trivia [ ]  Amir uses the idle animation from the superhero animation pack .

title: Ancient_Longbow
content: Ancient Longbow Type Longbow Attack damage 20 HP 34 HP (Fully charged) 33 - 38 HP ( Stone Short Arrow ) 56 - 65 HP (Stone Long Arrow; Fully charged) 35 - 40 HP ( Iron Long Arrow ) 46 - 68 HP (Iron Long Arrow; Fully charged) 40 - 47 HP ( Steel Long Arrow ) 68 - 80 HP (Steel Long Arrow; Fully charged) Recipe 100 Steel Ingot 100 Maple Wood 4 Ancient Slime String Crafted with Anvil Required skill Level 25 Archery Description High quality bow made from sturdy materials. The ancient longbow is a ranged weapon that shoots large arrows .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Ancient Longbow 100 Steel Ingot 100 Maple Wood 4 Ancient Slime String Anvil Level 25 Archery  Attacking [ ]  To shoot the bow, at least one large arrow must be in the player's inventory . The bow can be charged by holding left click on PC or holding down on mobile and the damage dealt by the arrow will increase in proportion to the time the bow is charged.  At level 1 Archery , the ancient longbow deals a base damage of 20 HP to mobs , and its damage can be increased by leveling up the Archery skill.  Charging [ ]  Charging a shot will increase the amount of damage dealt by 1.7x at full charge. This additional damage can be increased by leveling up the Archery skill.  History [ ]  August 9, 2020 Added artifact bows. January 22, 2021 Level 6 Archery is now required to craft artifact bows. September 17, 2022 Renamed the artifact bow to "Ancient Longbow". Decreased the base damage of ancient longbows from 27 HP to 20 HP. Ancient longbows can no longer be used to craft azarathian longbows . Changed the recipe from 3 ancient slime string and 1 hardened bow limb to 100 steel ingots 100 maple wood , and 4 ancient slime string. Level 25 Archery is now required to craft ancient longbows, up from level 6.

title: Andesite
content: Andesite Andesite Rock Type of block Solid block Spawns Hub Best tool Luminous Transparent Andesite is a block that can be mined from an andesite rock .  Obtaining [ ]  Mining [ ]  Andesite rocks naturally generate in the mining zone in the Hub . Mining an andesite rock yields 2 - 4 andesite after each stage and 3 Mining XP (6 with the 4x daily bonus), resulting in a total of 4 - 8 andesite and 9 Mining XP (18 with the 4x daily bonus) per rock.  Totem [ ]  Andesite totems can be purchased from Arius in the Hub for 8,000 coins . An andesite totem will spawn andesite rocks around it when placed, or if placed next to a conveyor belt , the totem will drop andesite directly onto the conveyor. title: And_Gate
content: And Gate Type of block Solid block; Electrical Recipe 10 Iron Ingot 15 Electrite Crafted with Electrical Workbench (Level 2) Best tool Luminous Transparent Description A logic gate that allows electrical pass through if BOTH inputs receives power, pass through amount is the greater of either power source. The and gate is a logic gate block that is crafted in the electrical workbench .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station And Gate 10 Iron Ingot 15 Electrite Electrical Workbench (Level 2)  Breaking [ ]  And Gate Breaking Data Hardness 3 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 5 Wooden 9 9 Stone 5 5 Iron 3 3 Gilded Steel 3 3 Diamond 2 2 Opal 2 2 Void Mattock 1  Usage [ ]  Electronics [ ]  For the electricity from the input(s) to pass through, BOTH inputs need to have at least one power unit. This is sometimes confused with the combiner , which only needs ONE input to be on to work. It is usually accompanied with the or gate , xor gate , combiner, and/or splitter . title: Animal_Care
content: Animal Care Class Production Base Stats +1% Animal Sell Price Unlocks Lowest Unlock LVL 2 Highest Unlock LVL 95  Animal Care (formerly Animal Husbandry ) is a skill that mainly focuses around passive mobs . It can be leveled up by petting, feeding, and breeding animals along with harvesting bee hives or catching fireflies , spirits and butterflies . It can be used to unlock crafting recipes in the animal bench and offers from Taliyah . Players can only have 7 large animals, 7 small animals, 3 turkeys , and 3 vultures (20 in total). Trivia [ ]  This skill was renamed from Animal Husbandry to Animal Care after February 5, 2021 . This skill has the highest level unlock out of all skills. Although the developers alluded to different advantages and special abilities for animal mounting in the February 19, 2021 update, riding animals serves no purpose as of right now, but only gives extra speed to the rider. Despite showing that the descriptions of roadmap "2 Large Animals" (Level 10 to 80) or "2 Small Animals" (Level 20 to 80), players could only spawn 3 to 7 large animals or 3 to 7 small animals. This is because the player's animal limit is actually increased by 1 (+1 with small animal) instead of 2 (+2 with small animal). Its limit was actually 7 (+7 with small animal) instead of 12 (+12 with small animal). There is a glitch that allows a player to gain Animal Care XP by repeatedly releasing a butterfly and capturing it again. When the player reached level 100 Animal Care , this skill doesn't have any unlock of roadmap.

title: Animal_Nametag
content: Animal Nametag Recipe 5 Bamboo 1 Ancient Slime String Crafted with Animal Bench Required skill Level 15 Animal Care Description Give your animal a name! An animal nametag is an item used to name animals .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Animal Nametag 5 Bamboo 1 Ancient Slime String Animal Bench Level 15 Animal Care  Usage [ ]  Naming animals [ ]  To name an animal, equip the nametag and interact with chosen animal. The game will prompt you to enter a name.  The names are affected by Roblox's filter, meaning some words and phrases may be censored.  History [ ]  February 5, 2021 Added animal nametags. April 29, 2022 Fixed animal nametags' UI.  Trivia [ ]  Before the February 12, 2021 update, players could only view an animal's name if inspected with an animal well-being kit . There was a glitch where players were able to name anything, even if it wasn't an animal. It was shortly patched.

title: Animal_Skins
content: Animal skins (aka animal costumes ) are skins that can be applied to animals. To equip a skin on an animal, a skin must first be purchased from the Robux Shop and then it can be added at the bottom of the inspection UI when inspecting an animal. A skin can only be applied to one animal at a time, but multiple animals can have skins (e.g. 3 cows can all have the "Lunar New Year" skin, 3 sheep can have the "Birthday" skin; the only requirement is that multiple skins have to be bought).  List of animal skins [ ]  Image Name Description Limited Time Animal Cost Lunar New Year Celebrate the Lunar New Year with a limited edition cow skin! February 12, 2021 - February 19, 2021 Cow Off-sale (Previously 499 Robux ) Birthday A sheep with sprinkles? Yes please!! February 19, 2022 - February 26, 2021 Sheep Off-sale (Previously 399 Robux ) Tuxedo A flightless bird never looked so fly. February 26, 2021 - April 24, 2021 Chicken Off-sale (Previously 399 Robux ) Piggy Bank You can't go wrong with a golden pig. April 24, 2021 - Current Pig 399 Robux

title: Animal_Well-Being_Kit
content: Animal Well-Being Kit Recipe 5 Iron Ingot 20 Oak Wood Crafted with Animal Bench Required skill Level 2 Animal Care The animal well-being kit was an item that was previously needed to inspect farm animals. It can no longer be crafted and does not have a use.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Before the February 12, 2021 update, the animal well-being kit could be crafted with the recipe below.  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Before February 12, 2021 Animal Well-Being Kit 5 Iron Ingot 20 Oak Wood Animal Bench Level 2 Animal Care  Removal [ ]  The animal well-being kit was removed on February 12, 2021 due to the added ability to inspect animals by pressing "F" or tapping on it, thus making the kit redundant.  Usage [ ]  Inspection Interface [ ]  Happiness Bar: This bar indicated how much bond the animal had toward player. The more hearts that are full the animal had, the more often the animal would provide their product ( milk from cows , wool from sheeps , and truffles from pigs ). The animal's happiness could have been increased by petting or feeding it more often. Hunger Bar: This bar had shown if the animal needed to be fed. Feeding the animal would refill the hunger bar, which affected its happiness. If the animal's hunger bar had dropped drastically, it will lose its happiness. Favorite Food: This data displayed what food the animal enjoys and what it could eat other than their main food. Feeding their favorite foods would increase their happiness.  Gallery [ ]

title: Antler_Dagger
content: Antler Dagger Description A dagger imbued with the Might of Fhanhorn. The antler dagger is an unimplemented melee weapon in Islands .  Information [ ]  The antler dagger was added on November 27, 2021 along with the antler shield and antler hammer but was left unimplemented.  History [ ]  November 27, 2021 Added antler daggers.  Trivia [ ]  A recolored antler dagger can be seen on the maple workbench's model.

title: Antler_Hammer
content: Antler Hammer Type Heavy Melee Physical class Striking Attack damage 35 HP (Base) +18 HP (Critical) Description A hammer imbued with the Might of Fhanhorn The antler hammer is a heavy melee weapon in the striking class that can only be obtained while under the Might of Fhanhorn effect.  Obtaining [ ]  Mob drop [ ]  Any mob has a 0.3% chance to drop either an antler hammer or antler shield upon defeat provided that the player has the Might of Fhanhorn effect.  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Heavy Melee , the antler hammer deals a base damage of 35 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal an extra 18 HP of damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Heavy Melee skill and it is in the striking class.  History [ ]  November 27, 2021 Added antler hammers. September 17, 2022 Antler hammers are now a striking weapon. October 1, 2022 Changed the model of antler hammers.

title: Antler_Shield
content: Antler Shield Type Heavy Melee/Shield Physical class Striking Attack damage 15 HP (Base) 23 HP (Critical)  The antler shield is a heavy melee weapon able to attack and defend from attacks.  Obtaining [ ]  Mob drop [ ]  Any mob has a 0.3% chance to drop either an antler shield or antler hammer upon defeat provided that the player has the Might of Fhanhorn effect.  Usage [ ]  Attacking [ ]  At Heavy Melee level 1, the antler shield deals a base damage of 15 HP. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal 50% more damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Heavy Melee skill.  Defending [ ]  Any damage taken from mobs will be reduced by 60% if the player is holding the antler shield.  History [ ]  November 27, 2021 Added antler shields.

title: Apple
content: Apple Heals 10 HP Sell price 26 coins An apple is a fruit grown on apple trees .  Obtaining [ ]  Harvesting [ ]  Apples grow every season on apple trees and can be obtained by harvesting them. There can be up to three apples on a tree at a time. When harvested, the player will obtain 1 apple, 6 Farming XP (24 with the 4x daily bonus), and a 3% chance for an additional apple tree sapling .  It takes 5 minutes and 30 seconds for an apple to grow and 16 minutes and 30 seconds for the three apples to grow.  Usage [ ]  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Uncooked Apple Pie 1 Dough 3 Apple Cooking Table Food Processor Level 22 Cooking Candy Apple 3 Jar of Honey 1 Apple Cooking Table Food Processor Level 60 Cooking  Crate-packing [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Crate of Apples 100 Apple Crate Packer Large Crate of Apples 250 Apple Tier 2 Crate Packer  Eating [ ]  Eating an apple restores 10 HP.  Selling [ ]  Apples can be sold to Tom for 20 coins .  Animals [ ]  Apples can be a cow's , sheep's , or pig's favorite food.  History [ ]  June 26, 2020 Added apples. August 30, 2020 Apples can now be used to craft candy apples . October 3, 2020 Apples can now be a cow's favorite food. January 22, 2021 Apples now grant 6 Farming XP when harvested. Apples can now be a sheep's favorite food. February 5, 2021 Apples can now be a pig's favorite food. August 21, 2021 Apples can now be packed into crates and large crates . June 3, 2022 Apples can now be sold to Cletus instead of to Tom . June 18, 2022 Changed the sell price of apples from 20 coins to 24 coins. ? Changed the sell price of apples from 24 coins to 20 coins. September 10, 2022 Changed the sell price of apples from 20 coins to 25 coins. October 15, 2022 Apples can now be sold to Tom instead of to Cletus .  Trivia [ ]  If an apple tree is chopped down while having apples on it, it will only drop the sapling and not any of the apples.

title: Apple_Pie
content: Apple Pie Recipe 1 Uncooked Apple Pie Crafted with Campfire Small Furnace Desert Furnace Industrial Oven Heals 30 HP Sell price 120 - 180 coins Hot sell price 180 - 270 coins Apple pie is a food item .  Obtaining [ ]  Cooking [ ]  Cooking an uncooked apple pie in a campfire , small furnace , desert furnace , or industrial oven will create an apple pie.  Input Output 1 Uncooked Apple Pie 1 Apple Pie  Usage [ ]  Eating [ ]  Eating an apple pie restores 30 HP.  Selling [ ]  Apple pie can be sold to Petur for 120 - 180 coins each, or 180 - 270 coins if apple pie is a hot offer.  History [ ]  June 26, 2020 Added apple pie. January 8, 2022 Changed the base selling price from 150 coins to 180 - 270 coins. January 15, 2022 Changed the base selling price from 180 - 270 coins to 120 - 180 coins.

title: Apple_Tree
content: Apple Tree Sapling Spring Summer Fall Winter Type of block Solid block Spawns Player's Island Best tool Drops 3 - 4 Oak Wood 1 Apple Tree Sapling Luminous Transparent The apple tree is a fruit tree added in the June 26, 2020 update.  The canopies of apple trees change color based on the current in-game season ; dark green in spring , light green in summer , dark red in fall , and white in winter , but its sapling always has light green leaves on its canopy.  Obtaining [ ]  Natural generation [ ]  Players have a 25% chance of starting with an apple tree on their island upon island creation.  Harvesting [ ]  Apple tree saplings have a 3% chance of dropping whenever an apple is harvested from the tree. It can be planted on grass to be grown into an apple tree. It takes 1 minute and 50 seconds for an apple tree sapling to grow into an apple tree.  Breaking [ ]  Apple Tree Breaking Data Hardness 8 Best Tool Axe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 12 Wooden 12 24 Stone 8 13 Iron 5 8 Gilded Steel 4 6 Diamond 3 4 Opal 2 4 Void Mattock 2  Drops [ ]  When cut down, the player will recieve:  1 apple tree sapling 3 - 4 oak wood  Usage [ ]  Harvesting [ ]  Apples grow every season on apple trees and can be obtained by harvesting them from the tree. There can be up to three apples on a tree at a time, and whenever an apple is harvested, there is a 3% chance of getting an additional apple tree sapling. Harvesting an apple yields 6 Farming XP (24 XP with the 4x daily bonus). It takes x minutes for an apple tree to grow an apple, adding up to a total of xx minutes to grow three apples.  Apple trees can be harvested with leaf clippers to drop 2 leaves .  History [ ]  June 26, 2020 Added apple trees.  Trivia [ ]  If an apple tree is chopped down while having apples on it, it will only drop the sapling and not any of the apples.

title: April_10_2020
content: April 10, 2020 Basic Information Day released April 10, 2020 Version number 1 Version Navigator Next version April 24, 2020 April 10, 2020 was the release date for SkyBlock , now known as Islands .  Differences [ ]  These are the differences from the first update in Islands , April 24, 2020 :  Different starter island design. Lower player limit for servers. No mobile or Xbox support. Clay could not be smelted into bricks . Teleporting to other player islands spawns the player to the portal rather than the spawn position. No private servers. Oak saplings naturally generated on grass . Players could not buy oak saplings. title: April_10_2021
content: April 10, 2021 Basic Information Day released April 10, 2021 Version number 41 Version Navigator Previous version Next version April 4, 2021 April 16, 2021  The April 10, 2021 update, also known as Islands' First Anniversary Update, is a minor update. To celebrate Islands' 1st Anniversary, Taliyah visits the Player's Island and awards those who talk to her with an Islands Anniversary Cake . Once the cake is given, Taliyah will automatically leave through the Portal .  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added Islands Anniversary Cake Taliyah visits the player's island .  Modifications [ ]  Economy level requirements lowered. To buy from vending machines , the minimum level a player must be is 25 instead of 30. To sell from one's own vending machine requires level 55 instead of 60.  Previous changes [ ]  April 5, 2021 [ ]  Vending machines will now only render UI when nearby. Mobile animal interact UI range has been reduced. Magic XP skill now gives scaling bonus damage. content: April 14, 2023 Basic Information Day released April 14, 2023 Version number 120 Version Navigator Previous version Next version March 31, 2023 April 28, 2023 The April 14, 2023 update, also known as the third anniversary update, is a major update in Islands that celebrates the third anniversary of Islands . title: April_16_2021
content: April 16, 2021 Basic Information Day released April 16, 2021 Version number 42 Version Navigator Previous version Next version April 10, 2021 April 24, 2021 The April 16, 2021 update, also known as the Totem Upgrades update, added totem upgrades and a few modifications.  Changes [ ]  Added [ ]  Coins and resources can now be used to upgrade totems placed on players' islands . Totem upgrade categories are Quality, Efficiency, and Utility. Totems have over 150 possible upgrades. Upgrading totems can unlock special perks. Totems will change in appearance as they are upgraded.  Modifications [ ]  Increased coin limit to $1.5B. Improved clouds. Hickory wood can be sold to John . Bug fixes and performance boosts. Combat Level requirements for Buffalkor Island , Wizard Island , Desert Island , and Diamond Mines lowered to 7, 20, 36, and 46 respectively.  Modifications (April 17, 2021) [ ]  Totem hitboxes fixed. title: April_16_2022
content: April 16, 2022 Basic Information Day released April 16, 2022 Version number 78 Version Navigator Previous version Next version April 9, 2022 April 22, 2022 The April 16, 2022 update, also known as the orb update, is an update in Islands that added personal orbs , and boss orbs .  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added Ruby Skorp Claws Added Infernal Flames Added Personal Orbs Black Personal Orb Green Personal Orb Yellow Personal Orb Blue Personal Orb Lime Personal Orb Purple Personal Orb Pink Personal Orb Cyan Personal Orb Orange Personal Orb Red Personal Orb Added Boss Orbs Slime King Orb Kor Orb Wizard Boss Orb Bhaa Orb Fhanhorn Orb Infernal Dragon Orb Added new treasure chests Slime Island Treasure Maple Isles Treasure Spirit Island Treasure Buffalkor Island Treasure Wizard Island Treasure Desert Island Treasure  Modifications [ ]  Regular treasure chests can now be found on Pirate Island Treasure maps may now locate treasure chests on Slime Island , the Maple Isles , Spirit Island , Pirate Island , Buffalkor Island , Wizard Island , or Desert Island Fixed the appearances of andesite , diorite , and granite rocks Reduced the damage dealt by Fhanhorn's pull attack by 25% and increased its periodic healing time from 1.6 seconds to 2.3 seconds  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed a bug causing some treasure chests to be too deep within the ground to be dug up Fixed Xbox controls Fixed a bug causing pink rabbits to crash Roblox Fixed a bug preventing players from traveling to Fhanhorn's spawn area . fish now appear in fish tanks Corrected the appearances of duck and turkey spawn eggs Fixed an area in the Hub with an incorrect collision box Fixed a visual error where lava appeared on Slime Island an Islands second anniversary cake Removed decorations in the Hub celebrating Islands' second anniversary  April 18, 2022 [ ]  Bug fixes [ ]  Boss orbs now display the boss's name in the teleporter UI title: April_1_2022
content: April 1, 2022 Basic Information Day released April 1, 2022 Version number 76 Version Navigator Previous version Next version March 25, 2022 April 9, 2022 The April 1, 2022 update is an update in Islands that introduced many minor quality of life changes.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added the Spring Build Trophy  Modifications [ ]  Manual machines now work while players are on other islands Changed the UI of all item transformers Increased the number of items that can be put in the following item transformers at a time: Campfire (1 ➡ 10) Cheesemaker (1 ➡ 10) Stonecutter (2 ➡ 50) Honey Press (1 ➡ 10) Sawmill (3 ➡ 50) Composter (3 ➡ 20) Cloth Loom (1 ➡ 10) Churner (1 ➡ 10) Small Furnace (3 ➡ 50) Adjusted the smelting time of various recipes Totems bought from Arius are now identified more clearly The Mailman can no longer spawn on newly created player islands Decreased the spawn rate of opal rocks in the Underworld Decreased the drop rate of rubies Changed drops rates from some mobs Changed the recipe of the king's shield to require 1 iron sword instead of 10 Changed composters to allow tuna , red snapper , trout , and grouper to be transformed into basic fertilizer .  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed update logs being dated as 2021 Fixed the “Back To Island” button being behind the player list Fixed the settings menu being cut off Potions now have an animation when being drunk title: April_24_2020
content: April 24, 2020 Basic Information Day released April 24, 2020 Version number 2 Version Navigator Previous version Next version April 10, 2020 April 27, 2020 The April 24, 2020 update is the first update released for Islands . This update is different from the first version, removing and modifying existing items in the game. The clay totem , clay nodes , clay , and bricks were added to the game.  Patchnotes [ ]  Patchnote #1 [ ]  New update! 🏗️  🌎 New starter island design 📈 Increased player limit to 30 📱 Added mobile support 🧱 Smelt clay into bricks 📡 Teleporting to another island sends you to the spawn location instead of portal location. 🌲 You can buy default tree saplings from spawn 🌱 Removed natural growth of default tree saplings 👑 Added VIP servers  Link: https://discord.com/channels/699869792445792348/699870693675892746/703130288749805598  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Mobile support is implemented. VIP Servers are now purchasable. Bricks can be smelted from clay. Tree saplings can be bought from Cletus .  Modifications [ ]  Modified starter island design. Player limit is modified to 30. Modified island teleport location. Removed the natural growth of default trees. content: April 27, 2020 Basic Information Day released April 27, 2020 Version number 3 Version Navigator Previous version Next version April 24, 2020 May 2, 2020  The April 27, 2020 update, also known as the tomato update, is the second update released for Islands . This update added the first new crop since release; Tomatoes , as well as multiple new blocks and enhancements to the game and its economy .  Patchnotes [ ]  Patchnote #1 [ ]  New update is out!  💖 VIP Rank 🏛️ Stonecutter + Stone Bricks 🍅 Tomatoes ⤴️ Stairs 🌲 Pine fences 🔒 Autosaving 💻 UI enhancements 💸 Economy balancing 🛠️ Bug fixes  Link: https://discord.com/channels/699869792445792348/699870693675892746/704237092166959114  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  VIP rank was made available for purchase. Balanced the economy. Bug fixes to the existing code. title: April_4_2021
content: April 4, 2021 Basic Information Day released April 4, 2021 Version number 40 Version Navigator Previous version Next version March 19, 2021 April 10, 2021 The April 4, 2021 update, also known as the Wizard Boss update, added the new hostile boss , the Wizard Boss , and revamped Buffalkor Island and Wizard Island . Other additions to the game include frogs , new blocks , and more.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Rain [ ]  Rain has a chance of occurring; it is more likely to occur during spring . Added frogs that spawn during rain. Added frog jars that can be obtained by catching a frog with a net .  Revamped Buffalkor Island [ ]  Added slate and marble blocks, slabs and stairs . Added slate bricks and marble columns .  Revamped Wizard Island [ ]  Added Wizard Boss . Removed ores spawning.  Other [ ]  Added slab and stair variants to aquamarine blocks and red sandstones . Added spawn blocks that can purchased from Jack . Added industrial lumbermills . Added steam generators . Added sickles . Added watermelons . Cletus has a chance of visiting the Player's Island in the summer to sell watermelon seeds and buy watermelons. Added roses . Fulco can now visit the Player's Island. Fulco sells fertile red or blue roses during the summer, and has a small chance of appearing during the winter to sell fertile white roses. Added palm trees . Players now have a 3% chance of harvesting a palm tree saplings along with a coconut when harvesting a coconut from a palm tree on their island. Players may start with a palm tree as their starter fruit tree .  Modifications [ ]  Bug Fixes [ ]  Fixed xor gates Fixed bug with pricing of hot items sold to the Baker . Stone , coal , iron and gold rocks no longer spawn on Wizard Island.  Other [ ]  Wheat can now be placed in metal troughs . Players can ask villagers to leave their island. Aligned bedrock to the Portal . Adjusted wind . Updated background music . Added an anti-cheat system that disables cheaters and exploiters. title: April_5th_2025_Trade_Exploit
content: On April 5th, 2025, a serious Roblox platform exploit (not Islands) was discovered that allowed exploiters to steal items from any Islands player’s inventory , without any kind of trade, interaction, or warning. This exploit was not caused by an issue in Islands itself, but by a vulnerability in Roblox’s networking system. The exploit was quickly abused by exploiters, leading to widespread inventory wipes.  How it happened [ ]  Using third-party tools, exploiters were able to send spoofed network requests to Islands servers. These requests tricked the game into transferring items from other players directly into the exploiters' account without a trade, without consent, and without the victim knowing until it was already too late.  The exploit worked in any public place, including:  The main Hub Any published player island  Private servers were unaffected, but most players in public areas were vulnerable to random, invisible theft.  Impact [ ]  The consequences were devastating:  Full inventories were wiped from countless players, including rare items, blocks, and tools. Exploiters mass-stole items and redistributed or sold them, destroying the balance of the in-game economy. Players who had spent years collecting and building lost everything in seconds. With Islands having been officially cancelled in 2023 , the game was already running with minimal support, leaving players with little hope for recovery.  Easy.ggs Response [ ]  The only official response from Easy.gg was to work with Roblox engineers to patch the core exploit at the platform level. As of now:  No in-game fixes or rollbacks have been issued as of April 7th, 2025. Affected accounts have not been restored, and may never be. The chance of item recovery is considered extremely slim due to the game's discontinued status.  The player base responded quickly, with most of the reports and discussions happening in the Islands Discord server, where affected users flooded channels with evidence, clips, and warnings.  Players shared screen recordings of their inventories disappearing in real time. Many recommended others stay in private servers or stop playing altogether. The Discord moderators pinned safety notices and updates, but there was no public statement from the devs on future recovery efforts.

title: Aquamarine_Shard
content: Aquamarine Shard Aquamarine Shard Rock Spawns Hub Lake Slime Reef Description A small piece of prismarine. Found in ponds. An aquamarine shard is an item that can be obtained by mining aquamarine rocks in the Hub Lake , Slime Reef or player island.  Obtaining [ ]  Natural generation [ ]  Aquamarine rocks naturally spawn at the bottom of the Hub Lake and Slime Reef . Mining an aquamarine rock grants the player 1 - 2 aquamarine shards and 9 Mining XP (39 with the 4x daily bonus) per stage, resulting in a total of 2 - 4 aquamarine shards and 18 Mining XP (78 with the 4x daily bonus) per full rock. The rock has a 0.5% chance to yield a crystallized aquamarine when it is fully broken.  Totems [ ]  An aquamarine totem will spawn aquamarine rocks in a 5 block radius. After the totem has spawned 6 aquamarine rocks or has run out of space, the totem will begin to mine the rocks and hold rewards equivalent to a half of an ore rock, which can be collected by interacting with the totem.  An aquamarine totem placed next to a conveyor belt will drop aquamarine shards onto the conveyor belt.  Fishing [ ]  Fishing with a wooden or iron fishing rod has a chance to reward 5 aquamarine shards as a treasure item, having a rarity of 'uncommon.'  Breaking [ ]  Aquamarine Rock Breaking Data Hardness 70 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 105 Wooden 210 105 Stone 112 70 Iron 70 44 Gilded Steel 49 35 Diamond 35 21 Opal 28 14 Void Mattock 14  Usage [ ]  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Aquamarine Block 4 Aquamarine Shard Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Teleporter Pad 20 Iron Ingot 10 Steel Ingot 30 Aquamarine Shard Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Hub Island Orb 10 Glass Block 15 Oak Wood 15 Coal 10 Iron Ingot 10 Sand 8 Aquamarine Shard Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Aquamarine Sword 200 Aquamarine Shard 2 Crystallized Aquamarine Anvil Aquamarine Potted Plant 10 Aquamarine Shard 2 Tall Grass 5 Grass Furniture Workbench Sink 50 Iron Ingot 5 Aquamarine Shard Furniture Workbench Orb Stand 5 Iron Ingot 5 Steel Ingot 5 Aquamarine Shard Furniture Workbench Gamepass required Sea Lantern 20 Aquamarine Shard 10 Coal Lighting Station  History [ ]  July 11, 2020 Added aquamarine shards. January 29, 2021 Aquamarine shards can be used to craft aquamarine potted plants and sinks . October 9, 2021 Aquamarine shards can be obtained from aquamarine totems . April 9, 2022 Aquamarine shards can now be used to craft teleporter pads , Hub Island orbs , and orb stands . May 13, 2022 Aquamarine shards can now be obtained from fishing .  Trivia [ ]  This is the first ore that can be obtained underwater, the second being clay .

title: Aquamarine_Sword
content: Aquamarine Sword Type Light Melee Physical class Slashing Attack damage 18 HP (Base) +9 HP (Critical) Recipe 200 Aquamarine Shard 2 Crystallized Aquamarine Crafted with Anvil The aquamarine sword is a light melee weapon in the slashing class.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Aquamarine Sword 200 Aquamarine Shard 2 Crystallized Aquamarine Anvil  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Light Melee , the aquamarine sword deals a base damage of 18 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing, leaving a blue trail with its large attack range. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal an extra 9 HP of damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Light Melee skill and it is in the slashing class.  History [ ]  July 17, 2020 Added aquamarine swords. May 13, 2022 Changed the recipe from 200 aquamarine shards and 2 pearls to 200 aquamarine shards and 2 crystallized aquamarine . September 17, 2022 Aquamarine swords are now a slashing weapon. October 1, 2022 Changed the model of aquamarine swords.  Trivia [ ]  This weapon has the greatest range out of all melee weapons . Prior to October 1, 2022 , the aquamarine swords in a tool stand lay flat instead of standing upright. There is currently a bug that causes the aquamarine sword to deal extreme amounts of knockback towards mobs when hit many times in a short time span while frozen from the frost swords or frost hammers .

title: Area_of_Effect
content: Area of Effect Causes Causes nearby mobs along with the target to be damaged. Source Weapons whose magical class is hydro Type Attack  Area of Effect or simply AOE is an effect that affects hostile mobs when attacked by weapons whose magical class is hydro .  Source [ ]  Area of Effect will affect mobs when hit with a weapon whose magical class is hydro such as the tidal spellbook and the trout's fury .  Causes [ ]  Area of Effect creates a water torrent that appears the attacked mob, then splashes and damages nearby enemies.  History [ ]  July 25, 2020 Added Area of Effect. June 10, 2022 Removed Area of Effect damage from tidal spellbooks and the staff of Godzilla . October 8, 2022 Re-added Area of Effect damage to tidal spellbooks .

title: Arius
content: Arius Location Hub , Player's Island Purpose Sells totems Occupation Totems Arius is a villager located in the Hub , next to the instrument workbench seller, Melody . Players can use coins to purchase totems from him. He is located in front of a hobbit-like house with glowing orange/yellow windows. Arius comes to the player's island upon crafting of a tier 2 workbench to give a free iron totem .  Shop [ ]  Arius sells various totems for coins. title: August_13_2022
content: August 13, 2022 Basic Information Day released August 13, 2022 Version number 94 Version Navigator Previous version Next version August 6, 2022 August 20, 2022 The August 13, 2022 update, also known as the Void Isles Update, is a major update in Islands that added the Void Isles , the Void Serpent , new weapons , and new materials.  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added the Void Isles . Added the Void Serpent . Added void hounds . Added Larry . Added Bobalok . Added amethyst rocks . Added amethyst crystals . Added amethyst blocks . Added void stone rocks . Added void stone blocks . Added piles of void sand . Added void sand blocks . Added piles of void grass . Added void grass . Added void potions . Added serpent's fangs . Added serpent's scales . Added serpent's hooks . Added serpent's banes . Added void serpent tokens . Added Void Isles orbs . Added Void Serpent orbs .  Modifications [ ]  Slightly modified the Desert Island terrain to fit the Void Isles portal . Desert Island now has a more sandy visual atmosphere. The Underworld now has a reddish atmosphere. Added a new Void Isles-themed questline . Updated the island loading screen UI. Teleporting to different islands now indicates the targeted destination. Quests are now searchable in the quest log . Increased the player's maximum health from 296 to 300 if their Combat level is 99. Lowered the health of the Infernal Dragon from 30,000 HP to 17,000 HP. Renamed void blocks to "Respawn Block". Increased the sell price of dragon fruits from 45 coins to 50 coins. Decreased the sell price of oranges from 20 coins to 16 coins.  August 14, 2022 [ ]  Fixed a bug that broke animations for many entities. Fixed a bug that caused the Void Serpent to get stuck when being summoned. Corrected the orientation of ore rocks and piles in the Void Isles .  August 15, 2022 [ ]  Fixed a bug that caused mobs to die multiple times. Fixed a bug that allowed Kor to spawn extra diamond rocks upon defeat. Reduced the damage reduction scale in boss fights. Increased the Void Serpent's health to 50,000. Reduced the drop rate of serpent's fangs and serpent's scales from the Void Serpent. Fixed server memory issues. title: August_18_2023
content: August 18, 2023 Basic Information Day released August 18, 2023 Version number 127 Version Navigator Previous version Next version July 21, 2023 October 13, 2023  The August 18, 2023 update, or the Mushroom Obby Event Update, is an update that initiated the Mushroom Obby Event and added new furniture items .  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added Mushroom Obby Tickets . Added Jim . Added new furniture blocks : Added Nature Fridges . Added Nature Outhouses. Added Tree Trunk Chairs. Added Mushroom Tables. Added Glowing Mushroom Blocks . Added The Mushroom Obby Event Trophy. Added Nature's Divine Longbows . Added The Divine Dao . Added Poison Arrows . Added Mushroom Golems . Added Snails . Added Koi.  Modifications [ ]  Changed the sell price of potatoes from 11 coins to 16 coins. Changed the sell price of onions from 30 coins to 25 coins.  August 18th, 2023 [ ]  Fixed issue where some teams cannot complete the race when pressing the button Fixed issue where event tasks would not show for some teams Reduced game time: 20 minutes -> 10 minutes Reduced team size: 10 -> 5 Added 50/50 chances to catch carp now in event  August 19th, 2023 [ ]  Fixed issue where players loading in after the game starts doesn't count them on game complete Added Iron Sickle to help with harvesting task in Obby game Reworked scoring for players Changed placement chat announcement to include player who finished the race Removed collision on lavenders  New Score Tracking: 1st place gets 75 tickets 2nd place gets 65 tickets 3rd place gets 55 tickets Each task counts as 25 points in the Obby.  Game ends automatically when the first 3 people hit the button. title: August_2_2020
content: August 2, 2020 Basic Information Day released August 2nd, 2020 Version number 17 Version Navigator Previous version Next version July 25, 2020 August 9, 2020 The August 2, 2020 update, or more commonly known as the Popular Islands update, is the 16th major Islands update. This update adds a new type of tree to the game, as well as a new gamepass , the ability to publish islands for other players to visit, and more.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Gamepass [ ]  A new jukebox gamepass that can play music on a player's island.  Tree [ ]  The hickory tree can now be grown from its saplings . This also includes items similar to its counterparts.  Publishing Islands [ ]  A new menu has been added to the UI to browse popular islands. Players with the Pro rank can now publish their islands and allow visitors even when they're offline. Islands can hold a maximum of 50 players at a time.  Easter Egg [ ]  When players type "honk" or "Honk" in the chat, it makes a "honk" sound.  Modifications [ ]  Bug Fixes [ ]  Bug fixes and performance improvements.  VIP Servers [ ]  VIP Server owners can now kick unwanted players with the /kick command.  Sounds [ ]  New crop and trees planting sounds.  Trivia [ ]  This update released a major bug into the game that wiped users' data upon joining the game. This is the first time (outside copyright issues) the developers have closed the game until they have fixed the bug. title: August_20_2022
content: August 20, 2022 Basic Information Day released August 20, 2022 Version number 95 Version Navigator Previous version Next version August 13, 2022 August 27, 2022 The August 20, 2022 update, or the Void Isles Update II, is an update in Islands that added serpent eggs , void mattocks , void parasites , and other new content.  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added serpent eggs . Added void mattocks . Added void mattock hilts . Added void parasite seeds . Added void parasites . Added void fish . Added Void Serpent pet spawn eggs . Added Void Serpent pets . Added privacy setting in the visitor permissions menu .  Modifications [ ]  Larry now hosts a shop. Plowing and replowing void grass now turns it back into a normal grass block . Changed the quest dialogue UI to use the default dialogue system used elsewhere. Increased the Void Serpent 's damage reduction per compound in the arena. Increased the sell price of rice from 24 coins to 30 coins. Increased the sell price of oranges from 16 coins to 20 coins. Decreased the sell price of dragon fruits from 50 coins to 45 coins. Decreased the sell price of lemons from 20 coins to 15 coins.  Bug fixes [ ]  The serpent's hook's exclusive spinning attack is no longer applied to every tool .  August 21, 2022 [ ]  Modifications [ ]  Fixed migrating data issues. Increased void parasite spawn locations on the Void Isles. Increased the chance of getting void parasite seeds from 0.5% to 3%. title: August_30_2020
content: August 30, 2020 Basic Information Day released August 30th, 2020 Version number 19 Version Navigator Previous version Next version August 16, 2020 September 6, 2020 The August 30, 2020 update, or more commonly known as the Bees update, is the 19th update in Islands. This update brought various new items and blocks , a new passive mob , and general quality of life updates.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Bees [ ]  Added the Bee mob Collects pollen from Flowers on your island to produce Honeycomb Creates a Bee Hive if the bees like your island.  Food [ ]  Added Honeycomb Added the ability to craft Honey Toast , Roasted Honey Carrot , Candy Apple , Lemon Puff , and Orange Honeycomb Added the ability to make Roasted Carrot  Blocks & Items [ ]  Added Honey Press to the game Turn Honeycomb into Jars of Honey Added Honeycomb Block and Honey Block  Reset [ ]  Added /reset to reset your island (does not reset inventory).  Modifications [ ]  Inventory UI [ ]  Ability to search New looks Sorted into categories  Totems & Chests [ ]  Added 2 more slots to totems . (Used to be 4) Added additional slots to chests  Animal AI [ ]  Rebuilt the framework allowing them to more easily add new animals  Jars [ ]  Changed the model of grape jam and tomato sauce . content: August 6, 2022 Basic Information Day released August 6, 2022 Version number 93 Version Navigator Previous version Next version July 30, 2022 August 13, 2022 The August 6, 2022 update, also known as the new totems update, is a minor update in Islands that added new crop totems and other small changes. Modifications [ ]  Increased the damage dealt by the Slime Queen's scepter from 40 HP to 50 HP. Shots that hit mobs now heal the player's health. Decreased the sell price of spinach from 18 coins to 14 coins.  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed whisper commands not registering. title: August_8_2021
content: August 8, 2021 Image Icon Basic Information Day released August 8, 2021 Version number 52 Version Navigator Previous version Next version July 30, 2021 August 15, 2021  The August 8, 2021 update, also known as the Co-op Save Slots update, is a minor update that introduced the "co-op island" feature. The update replaced the factory update part 2 as the latter was delayed for another week to add new features.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added Co-Op Islands To create a co-op island, open the save slots menu and select an empty slot, after that you will have an option to make it solo or co-op. Up to 7 friends can be invited to the island where everyone will be owners.  Bug Fixes [ ]  Fixed a bug upon release that made some users lose their Farming Festival items . The Farming Festival was re-added soon . title: August_9_2020
content: August 9, 2020 Basic Information Day released August 9th, 2020 Version number 18 Version Navigator Previous version Next version August 2, 2020 August 16, 2020  The August 9, 2020 update, or more commonly known as the Skorp Islands update, is the 17th major Islands update. This update adds a new island to the game, as well as a new enemy, a new workbench, and a variety of new blocks.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Islands [ ]  Desert Island has been added to the game The desert island key came alongside in order to enter the portal  Blocks/Items [ ]  Red sandstone has been added, available by destroying its node It can be crafted into its brick , brick slab , and stair variants. The brewing stand , a new crafting station , is now implemented in the game Grants the ability to craft regen potions and strength potions Dead bushes have been added to the game Hardened bow limbs are craftable, and are used to craft the artifact bow  Mobs [ ]  Introduced the iron skorp , ruby skorp , and gold skorp , all of which are hostile mobs located on Desert Island Obtain iron skorp scale , ruby skorp scale , and gold skorp scale by killing their skorp variety Obtain gold skorp claws by killing Gold Skorps Obtain ruby skorp stingers by killing Ruby Skorps Slimes are now able to drop ancient slime string .  Weapons [ ]  Basic bows and artifact bows , as well as arrows , have been added, and are able to be crafted in the anvil The vamp bow has been added, and requires a new blueprint to be crafted  Music Disks [ ]  Yellow jukebox disks , red jukebox disks , and blue jukebox disks can be obtained by killing hostile mobs  Modifications [ ]  Adventurer [ ]  Ivon now buys all skorp scales  Inventory [ ]  Improved inventory tooltips Selected item titles have been improved  Indicators [ ]  Taking damage now has an indicator with the damage taken  Game Translation [ ]  The game fully supports the French translation  Bug Fixes [ ]  Bows are easier to hit, and the artifact bow does more damage now Fixed an issue causing some users to not load into the game The regen potion works properly now  Islands
