title: Mailbox
content: Mailbox Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 10 Oak Wood Crafted with Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Spawns Player's Island Best tool Luminous Transparent Description "Place to send and receive mail!" The mailbox is a block used to send and receive letters.  Obtaining [ ]  Player's Island [ ]  A mailbox is spawned near the portal to the Hub to every player that joins Islands . However, if you have blocks that is blocking the portal on the day of the update, the mailbox will automatically be sent to your inventory.  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Mailbox 10 Oak Wood Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Breaking [ ]  Mailbox Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 18 Stone 10 10 Iron 6 6 Gilded Steel 5 5 Diamond 3 3 Opal 3 3 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Mail [ ]  Mailboxes can be used to send letters to Roblox friends, to do so players must interact with the mailbox and select the "Send Mail" button. After that they must fill out three fields: Recipient, Subject and the Message. The Message and Subject fields are censored with Roblox's censor service, letters with inappropriate words will NOT be sent, those words will be highlighted in red. Likewise after every in-game update each player will receive an official letter containing the most recent update's changelog.  History [ ]  May 21, 2021 Added mailboxes.

title: Mailman
content: Mailman Location Player's Island Purpose Conduct a survey Occupation Mailman The Mailman is a villager that players can interact with on their island to complete a survey .  Spawning [ ]  From February 7, 2022 to April 1, 2022 , the Mailman would spawn on the player's island to conduct a survey . The Mailman only spawns once per Roblox account, which means that even if the player resets their island or moves to another save slot another Mailman will not spawn. Players can still interact with the Mailman after April 1, 2022.  Purpose [ ]  Players can interact with the Mailman to take part in a survey. Players will be rewarded 200 coins once they have completed the survey.  Dialogue [ ]  "Hey there user ! I have a survey for you to do if you have time, I'll reward you for your time." >[Do survey] Opens the Survey . The Mailman leaves the player's island once the survey is completed.  After survey completion [ ]  If the player interacts with a Mailman after they have already completed the survey, he will say the following line:  "Hey there user ! I have a survey for you to do if you have time, I'll reward you for your time." >[Ask to leave island] Exits and the Mailman leaves the player's island.  History [ ]  February 7, 2022 Added the Mailman. April 1, 2022 The Mailman no longer spawns on player islands .  Trivia [ ]  There was a bug that caused the Mailman to appear on a player's island more than once, allowing the player to complete the survey multiple times.

title: Maple_Isles
content: Maple Isles Current Old Older Required skill None (Any Combat levels) Resources Raspberry Bush (Currently unharvestable) Villagers Bailey Don Emma Kontos Mobs Turkey Fhanhorn (1-hour cooldown; Currently cannot be bypassed with tokens ; No tokens ) The Maple Isles (also known as Turkey Island ) is a cluster of 3 islands that has villagers that provide quests and hold their own unique shops. It can be accessed by talking to Don in the Hub , who can be found near Taliyah 's barn. Interacting with Don near the spawn of the Maple Isles will teleport the player back to the Hub.  This cluster of islands had appeared before November 27, 2021 with buildings, but all of its structures were removed, only leaving terrain behind. This was because exploiters/hackers could fly to the island.  This cluster of islands currently has no hostile mobs to reward boss tokens . The only mobs present are turkeys as passive mobs and Fhanhorn as a boss.  Resources [ ]  Resources Resources Raspberries (Currently unharvestable)  Foliage [ ]  The following foliage spawns in the Maple Isles:  Raspberry Bush (Currently unharvestable)  Transport [ ]  The Maple Isles has no portals,  Instead, Don sends the player from the Maple Isles to the Hub and vice-versa. A teleporter pad is also located next to the portal, which can be used to teleport to various locations depending on the inserted orbs .  Talking to Don Teleporter Pad  Mobs [ ]  Turkeys [ ]  Five turkeys spawn on the second island of the isles.  Access to the second island is locked by a gate until the player completes Bailey 's questline. Players can "spook" a turkey causing it to drop red berries or raspberries . Spooking turkeys will not grant any Animal Care XP nor Fhanhorn tokens .  Fhanhorn [ ]  Fhanhorn can be spawned on the third major island of the Maple Isles, which can be traveled to by talking to Don after completing Bailey 's and Emma 's questlines. It has a summon cooldown at 60 minutes; 1 hour. It also can be summoned without any Combat level requirement. It currently has no token .  Unlike the Slime King , Kor , the Wizard Boss , and Bhaa as regular bosses with summon cooldowns , Fhanhorn 's summon cooldown currently cannot be bypassed with tokens , unless other than forcing players to wait for 60 minutes; 1 hour and able to re-summon it. It also currently doesn't have its own token , even with its summoning UI while on cooldown since the October 28, 2022 update.  Villagers [ ]  First Isle [ ]  First Isle Villagers Don Bailey Kontos  Bailey [ ]  Bailey is a villager located near the island spawn who, upon first interaction, will give the player a maple workbench . The player can complete quests for her to progress through the Maple Isles questline and earn other rewards from her, such as a sap boiler and a syrup bottler . She hosts a shop where players can sell pancakes and purchase various furniture blocks.  Kontos [ ]  Kontos is a villager who rewards the player with a turkey trophy after defeating Fhanhorn for the first time. He is located on the first island near the bridge that connects the second island.  Second Isle [ ]  Second Isle Villagers Emma Don  Emma [ ]  Emma is a villager located behind the gate on the second island, which can only be unlocked after completing Bailey's questline. Like Bailey, she also hands out quests that the player can complete to progress to Fhanhorn's arena. She sells raspberry seeds and turkey spawn eggs and buys raspberries and berry pancakes , although Bailey also buys berry pancakes for the same price.  Don [ ]  Don appears in two locations: near the island spawn and on a pier on the second island. Interacting with her near spawn will teleport the player back to the Hub . Although the player can interact with her on the second island, she will only provide the final questline once the player has finished Emma's. After completing her quest, she grants the player access to Fhanhorn's arena on the third island.  Music [ ]  Name Audio Artist Fall in the Sky https://robloxislands.fandom.com/wiki/File:Fall_in_the_Sky.ogg Micah Fischer  History [ ]  November 20, 2020 Added a floating maple tree, a teaser for Turkey Island. December 18, 2020 Added Turkey Island. January 4, 2021 Removed all terrain and content from the island. November 27, 2021 Re-added terrain and content to the island. Officially named the island the "Maple Isles". Added turkeys on the Maple Isles. Added Fhanhorn on the Maple Isles. July 16, 2022 Replaced the Maple Island portal with Don now transporting the player to and from the Hub .  Trivia [ ]  Prior to November 27, 2021 , everything except the terrain was removed on January 4, 2021 , it was re-added as the Maple Isles on November 27, 2021 . The Maple Isles is the first location to be a cluster of islands, the second being the Void Isles . There is a bug where the gate to the Second Isle will still be there even after the player finished Bailey 's questline. This can be fixed by talking to Kontos or Bailey . The Maple Isles is the second permanent island that doesn't have any hostile mob , with the first being Spirit Island . Fhanhorn was the first and only boss of the Maple Isles in Islands whose summon cooldown currently cannot be bypassed with tokens during it has no token and no hostile mobs , unless forced players to wait for 60 minutes; 1 hour and able to re-summon it. Due to the Maple Isles has no hostile mobs , it doesn't have its own token to bypass 1-hour cooldown. Since the October 28, 2022 update, it doesn't have any token requirement on its summoning UI while on cooldown. Unlike most bosses with the " Failed to Summon " notification, if a player attempts to summon Fhanhorn while on cooldown during it has no token , nothing happens. It was the first and only boss of the Maple Isles in Islands that doesn't have the " Failed to Summon " notification.  Gallery [ ]

title: Maple_Sap
content: Maple Sap Maple sap is a liquid item that can be pumped out of a maple tree using a tree tap .  Obtaining [ ]  Pumping [ ]  Maple sap can be pumped out of maple trees by placing a tree tap on the tree. Every 90 seconds, the tree tap will produce one maple sap that can be collected by clicking F on computers or tapping it on mobile. It can also be transported using wood tubes from the maple tree to a sap boiler .  Usage [ ]  Transforming [ ]  Input Item transformer Output 1 Maple Sap ➡ Sap Boiler ➡ 1 Maple Syrup  History [ ]  November 27, 2021 Added maple sap.  Trivia [ ]  There is a visual bug where maple sap in a wood tube will turn black, similar to pipes .

title: Maple_Shield
content: Maple Shield Type Light Melee/Shield Physical class Striking Attack damage 5 HP (Base) 8 HP (Critical) Recipe 150 Maple Wood 25 Iron Ingot Crafted with Maple Workbench  The maple shield is a light melee weapon able to attack and defend from attacks. It is in the striking class.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Maple Shield 150 Maple Wood 25 Iron Ingot Maple Workbench  Usage [ ]  Attacking [ ]  At Light Melee level 1, the maple shield deals a base damage of 5 HP. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal 50% more damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Light Melee skill.  Defending [ ]  Any damage taken from mobs will be reduced by 40% if the player is holding the maple shield.  History [ ]  November 27, 2021 Added maple shields. September 17, 2022 Maple shields are now a striking weapon.  Trivia [ ]  Prior to November 11, 2022 , this weapon is tied with the lightning scepter for the lowest damage per hit in the game.

title: Maple_Syrup
content: Maple Syrup Recipe 1 Maple Sap Crafted with Sap Boiler Maple syrup is a liquid item that can be transported using wood tubes . It cannot be collected into the player's inventory .  Obtaining [ ]  Transforming [ ]  Maple syrup can be obtained by boiling maple sap in a sap boiler . It takes 15 seconds to fully boil the sap into maple syrup.  Input Item transformer Output 1 Maple Sap ➡ Sap Boiler ➡ 1 Maple Syrup  Usage [ ]  Transforming [ ]  Maple syrup can be bottled into maple syrup bottles in a syrup bottler . It takes 5 seconds to bottle maple syrup into a maple syrup bottle. Up to 6 maple syrup can be bottled in a syrup bottler at once.  Input Item transformer Output 1 Maple Syrup ➡ Syrup Bottler ➡ 1 Maple Syrup Bottle  History [ ]  November 27, 2021 Added maple syrup.

title: Maple_Tree
content: Maple Tree Type Maple Sapling Cost 1,000 coins Growth Duration 90 seconds The maple tree is a species of trees in Islands . It was the fourth tree added to the game, added on May 10, 2020 .  Obtaining [ ]  Maple sapling [ ]  Maple trees are grown from maple saplings , which can only be bought from Cletus for 1,000 coins after reaching level 11 in the Woodcutting skill . The sapling can only be planted on grass and takes about 90 seconds to grow. Like other saplings , it needs a radius of 7 unoccupied blocks to be able to grow and is nine blocks tall.  Drops [ ]  When breaking, it drops:  3-4 maple wood 1 maple sapling  When harvested by leaf clippers , it drops:  2 maple leaves  Breaking [ ]  Maple Tree Breaking Data Hardness 79 Best Tool Axe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 119 Wooden 119 237 Stone 79 127 Iron 50 79 Gilded Steel 40 56 Diamond 24 40 Opal 16 32 Void Mattock 16  Tree Tap [ ]  Tree taps can be tapped onto a maple tree to collect maple sap . Only one tree tap can be tapped into a maple tree, and it takes 90 seconds for the tree to produce one maple sap.  History [ ]  May 10, 2020 The maple tree is added. January 22, 2021 The breaking data for the maple tree has been increased from 8 to 79. November 27, 2021 Tree tap can be tapped onto maple trees. Fhanhorn now can summon a maple tree and heal itself. December 5, 2021 Tree taps will now be given back when breaking maple trees.  Trivia [ ]  The leaves on the tree stay the same during fall and summer . This feature also occurs for hickory trees and pine trees . This tree is the second-hardest tree in the game to chop down.

title: Marble
content: Marble Marble Rock Spawns Buffalkor Island Best tool Luminous Transparent Marble is a block obtained by breaking marble rocks naturally found on Buffalkor Island .  Obtaining [ ]  Mining [ ]  Marble rocks naturally generate on Buffalkor Island in a pit next to the large crane . Mining a marble rock yields 1 - 3 marble after each stage and 6 Mining XP (24 with the 4x daily bonus), resulting in a total of 2 - 6 marble and 12 Mining XP (48 with the 4x daily bonus) per rock.  Totems [ ]  Marble totems can be purchased from Arius in the Hub for 22,000 coins after reaching level 22 Mining . A marble totem will spawn marble rocks around it when placed, or if placed next to a conveyor belt , the totem will drop marble directly onto the conveyor. title: March_13_2021
content: March 13, 2021 Basic Information Day released March 13, 2021 Version number 38 Version Navigator Previous version Next version March 5, 2021 March 19, 2021  The March 13, 2021 update, also known as the Slime King and Seasons update, added a new boss mob as well as a new crop and a recurring crop. When seasons were introduced, the first one to take place was Spring .  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Seasons [ ]  Added 4 Seasons . Seasons alternate every 24 hours. Spring Summer Fall Winter Cletus visit the Player's Island during Spring and Fall to sell seasonal seeds. The colors of trees and grass change during each seasons. Added wind .  Radish [ ]  Added the Radish crop, which can only grow during spring. Added Radish Seeds .  Other [ ]  Added the Slime King . Added a Settings Menu which allows players to control volume, notifications, and shadows in-game. Removed villager animations in the Hub .  Modifications [ ]  Petur now offers to buy all food items, rather than making 5 offers per day. Pumpkins were re-introduced and can now only grow during the Fall . Cletus visits the Player's Island and offers to sell Pumpkin Seeds and buy Pumpkins . Opening the inventory shows the current season above the search bar. Additions to Slime Island were made to house the Slime King boss. Blocks can now cast a shadow, until turned off in the Settings. Friend notifications and joining can be disabled in the Settings. Item tooltips are now visible in the animal inspect menu. title: March_19_2021
content: March 19, 2021 Basic Information Day released March 19, 2021 Version number 39 Version Navigator Previous version Next version March 13, 2021 April 4, 2021  The March 19, 2021 update, also known as the Godzilla vs Kong event update, added a new event and coconuts. The season on this day was Fall.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Godzilla vs Kong [ ]  Added Godzilla vs Kong event countdown. Added portals to the Godzilla Island and Kong Island when the countdown ended. Added Holt villager. Added Bosco villager. Added Kong Trophy . Added Godzilla Trophy . Added Kong Badge . Added Godzilla Badge .  Weapons [ ]  Added Kong's Axe . Added Staff of Godzilla .  Coconuts [ ]  Added Coconut . Added Palm Tree . Added Palm Tree Sapling  Modifications [ ]  Changed hub to match the event. Tom now buys coconuts . title: March_25_2022
content: March 25, 2022 Basic Information Day released March 25, 2022 Version number 75 Version Navigator Previous version Next version March 12, 2022 April 1, 2022 The March 25, 2022 update, also known as the yak update, is a major update in Islands that introduced yaks , new food items, and new mineral blocks .  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added Yaks Added Yak Milk Buckets Added Yak Butter Added new food items: Bhutan Butter Tea Sweet Rice Dessert Gondo Datshi Added Copper Blocks Added Red Bronze Blocks Added Opal Blocks  Modifications [ ]  Reduced the sell price of pineapples from 92 coins to 85 coins Increased the sell price of tomatoes from 8 coins to 15 coins Fixed the bug preventing marble , aquamarine , sandstone , and red sandstone stairs from appearing in the crafting UI Renamed the mayonnaise spinner to "churner" Fixed a bug causing players to get stuck after configuring prices in a vending machine . title: March_3_2023
content: March 3, 2023 Basic Information Day released March 3, 2023 Version number 117 Version Navigator Previous version Next version February 17, 2023 March 17, 2023 The March 3, 2023 update, also known as the farming tools update, is an update in Islands that added a new farming tool, reworked Desert Island , bug fixes, and other changes.  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added the Master Harvester achievement . Added crystalline plow . Added crystalline ivy seeds . Added crystallines . Added industrial nests . Added new villagers : Added Rick . Added Maria .  Modifications [ ]  Increased the sell price of onions from 30 coins to 37 coins. Decreased the sell price of watermelons from 80 coins to 74 coins. Added a new toggle in the Settings for highlighting entities on player islands . The Hide Icons setting is now on by default. Added a Host tag for island owners when using chat on Published islands.  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed a bug preventing rageblades from damaging mobs . Fixed a bug causing animals to jitter when near players. Fixed a hold seed placement for PC. Fixed a bug causing block placement not to register when looking into the void or buildings underneath players. Fixed inconsistent trellis seed planting placement. Fixed a bug causing players to be unable to place blocks underneath properly, causing some blocks to be placed on the opposite side of another block. title: March_31_2023
content: March 31, 2023 Basic Information Day released March 31, 2023 Version number 119 Version Navigator Previous version Next version March 17, 2023 April 14, 2023 The March 31, 2023 update is a minor update in Islands that added new furniture , bug fixes, and other changes. Added vine stem benches .  Modifications [ ]  Ducks and chickens now lay eggs on nests and industrial nests instead of grass . Reduced jump heights on all animals .  Bug fixes [ ]  Vultures can now be mounted. Vultures can now drop feathers onto nests and industrial nests . title: March_5_2021
content: March 5, 2021 Basic Information Day released March 5, 2021 Version number 37 Version Navigator Previous version Next version February 26, 2021 March 13, 2021  The March 5, 2021 update is a minor update in Islands .  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Changed the starter island for new players. Revamped and expanded the tutorial . Now villagers have a proper name, and Taliyah now has a title that says ''Animals''. Added a "Home" teleport button to the right sidebar while away from the player's island.  Modifications [ ]  Increased pickaxe block breaking damage. Reduced health/hardness of grass . The right sidebar is now positioned higher on mobile devices. Fixed a bug that sometimes caused the hotbar to appear empty on join.  Previous changes [ ]  March 4, 2021 [ ]  Removed the portal and teleport button to Fishing Festival Island . Improved portal teleporting speed to prevent duping. title: Maria
content: Maria Location City of Azarath ( Desert Island ) Purpose Sells seeds and buys crops Occupation Crops Maria is a villager located in City of Azarath , which is on Desert Island . Players can buy seeds from Maria and sell crops to them.  Shop [ ]  Buy [ ]  Image Name Sell price Crystalline 35 coins Vine Stem 38 coins Opuntia 42 coins  Sell [ ]  Image Name Cost Required skill Crystalline Ivy Seeds 3,500 coins Level 55 Combat Vine Stem Seeds 3,800 coins Level 65 Combat Opuntia Seeds 4,200 coins Level 72 Combat  Dialogue [ ]  "Check out my shop for the best crops in the entire Desert!" >Buy Seeds Opens sell shop. >Sell Crops Opens buy shop.  History [ ]  March 3, 2023 Added Maria. March 17, 2023 Maria can now sell vine stem seeds and opuntia seeds , and buy vine stems and opuntias .

title: Mayonnaise_Jar
content: Mayonnaise Jar Recipe 1 Egg Crafted with Churner Sell price 240 coins Required skill Level 18 Animal Care (to sell) The mayonnaise jar is an item made by spinning eggs .  Obtaining [ ]  Transforming [ ]  Eggs can be transformed into mayonnaise jars in a churner . It takes a total of 3 minutes and 25 seconds to fully transform an egg into a mayonnaise jar.  Input Item transformer Output 1 Egg ➡ Churner ➡ 1 Mayonnaise Jar  Usage [ ]  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Island Orb 10 Glass Block 5 Milk Bucket 5 Pizza 3 Mayonnaise Jar 5 Jar of Honey Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 None Deviled Eggs 4 Egg 4 Mayonnaise Jar Cooking Table Level 20 Cooking Potato Salad 12 Potato 4 Tomato 4 Mayonnaise Jar Cooking Table Level 13 Cooking  Selling [ ]  Mayonnaise jars can be sold to Taliyah for 240 coins each after reaching level 18 Animal Care .  History [ ]  February 26, 2021 Added mayonaise jars. November 13, 2021 4 mayonnaise jars are now required to craft deviled eggs , up from 1. 4 mayonnaise jars are now required to craft potato salad , up from 1. April 9, 2022 Mayonnaise jars can now be used to craft Island orbs .  Trivia [ ]  The jar holding the mayonnaise does not need to be crafted. This trait is shared with other jars , such as bee jars , firefly jars , and frog jars .

title: May_10_2020
content: May 10, 2020 Basic Information Day released May 10th, 2020 Version number 7 Version Navigator Previous version Next version May 7, 2020 May 17, 2020  The May 10th, 2020 Update ( Grape Update or cooking update) is the sixth major update for Islands. This update mostly includes new vegetation, cooking, and bug fixes.  Patchnotes [ ]  Patchnote #1 [ ]  New update is rolling out!  🍇 Grapes (used with Trellis) 🌲 Birch and Maple trees 🚪 Doors 👨‍🍳 Sell crafted food to the Baker for bonus coins 🍕 Pizza, Tomato Soup, Jelly and more 🏗️ Increased max block limit to 50,000 (was 27,000) 🚊 Conveyor Ramp 🌳 Wait 20 minutes before dropping berry bushes 🏕️ Added new bushes to the Floral Bench ⚡ Performance optimizations and bug fixes  Link: https://discord.com/channels/699869792445792348/699870693675892746/708986564847468546  Patchnote #2 [ ]  Rolled out some bug fixes, exploit patches and mobile optimizations.  Link: https://discord.com/channels/699869792445792348/699870693675892746/710714162543722537  Patchnote #3 [ ]  New minor update is live!  😌 Bulk crafting 📝 Fix an issue that caused inventories to reset 🧅 Fix an issue that caused crop totems to not save seeds 🏃‍♀️ Sprinting on mobile 🚪 Open doors on mobile 📵 Fix chest opening on mobile ⬅️ Conveyor belts should behave more consistently 👨‍🏫 Patch several duping exploits 🧗‍♂️ Improve ladder climbing 🛰️ Reduced network traffic 🎫 Save chest output direction on rejoin  Link: https://discord.com/channels/699869792445792348/699870693675892746/711131524220846150  Patchnote #4 [ ]  Rolling out a small bug fix patch.  🗒️ Improve saving for large islands ☂️ Reduce max factory-dropped items to 40 (still 80 on VIP servers. More info below) ⛰️ You can now build on the bedrock block  We've been experiencing major server lag when multiple islands with large factories are in the same server. When too many dropped items exist in the server, the physics will slow to a crawl. This unfortunately ruins the experience for everyone on the server. We're experimenting several ways to solve this problem; for now, we need to lower the item limit to keep servers in a healthy state. VIP servers still have the 80 item limit -- this change only applies to public servers.  Link: https://discord.com/channels/699869792445792348/699870693675892746/711131524220846150  Changes [ ]  Added [ ]  Items [ ]  Blocks: Trellises Doors Conveyor Ramps Maple Hedges Maple Bushes Crops: Grapes Trees: Birch Saplings Maple Saplings Recipes: Pizza Tomato Sauce Grape Jam Jam Sandwich Bread Berry Pie Tomato Soup  Other [ ]  NPCs: Baker Crafting: Bulk crafting  Modified [ ]  Performance optimizations Inventory resets Crops Totem not saving seeds Sprinting on Mobile Opening Doors on Mobile Chest opening on Mobile Conveyor belts behave more consistently Duping Exploits Improved Ladder climbing Reduced network traffic Save Industrial Chest output direction when rejoining Improved Island saving  Other [ ]  Building on the Bedrock block Increased Max Block Limit to 50,000 Reduced max Factory-dropped items to 40 (80 on VIP Servers)  Removed [ ]  Test Totem was nerfed and made unobtainable. The ability to purchase Berry Seeds from Cletus . title: May_12_2023
content: May 12, 2023 Basic Information Day released May 12, 2023 Version number 122 Version Navigator Previous version Next version April 28, 2023 May 26, 2023 The May 12, 2023 update, also known as the Hardcore update part I, is a major update in Islands that introduced Hardcore mode to solo save slots .  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added Hardcore mode . Added void crop eaters . Added new Achievements . Added Master of Hardcore Medal . Added moth glider pet spawn eggs .  Modifications [ ]  Players can now receive a notification if they cannot follow other players. Following other players now uses loading screens Players can now receive a notification if they are banned from other player's islands instead of getting kicked on arrival. Increased the sell price of wheat from 7 coins to 12 coins. Decreased the sell price of watermelons from 80 coins to 75 coins.  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed bug causing players unable to see travel merchant shops. Fixed bug causing players unable to breed vultures .  May 16, 2023 [ ]  Bug fixes [ ]  Removed seaweed seeds from experience tree. Removed anniversary quests. Fixed bug causing non-hardcore profiles getting hardcore achievements and items . Fixed damage conversion in hardcore.  Modifications [ ]  Void Serpent [ ]  Decreased knockbacks of the Void Serpent 's attacks. Decreased the amount of void hounds spawned by the Void Serpent. Increased movement speed of underground state of the Void Serpent.  Fhanhorn [ ]  Decreased the hardness of Fhanhorn 's healing tree from 83 to 55. Increased Fhanhorn's healing time from 5 seconds to 7 seconds.  Infernal Dragon [ ]  Decreased the Infernal Dragon 's health from 17,000 HP to 13,000 HP.  Hardcore [ ]  Added fruit tree saplings to travel merchant. Losing coins is now 5%-8% of player's total coins. Crop eaters no longer target totems .  May 23, 2023 [ ]  Decreased the maximum player count from 30 to 20 for private servers and the Player's Island servers. The Hub and other islands remain the same maximum player count at 30. title: May_13_2022
content: May 13, 2022 Basic Information Day released May 13, 2022 Version number 81 Version Navigator Previous version Next version April 29, 2022 May 20, 2022 The May 13, 2022 update, also known as the fishing update, is an update in Islands that revamped many fishing mechanics.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added Tier 2 Bait .  Modifications [ ]  New animations and sounds now play when fishing . Added a new mechanic when fishing. Fish now spawn on Buffalkor Island and Wizard Island . Added fish and treasure rarities. Changed fish and spirit fish shadows in bodies of water . Fishing rods now have additional properties: Decay Slow: Better fishing rods preserve the player's fishing progress. Renamed bait to tier 1 bait . Modified various skill requirements: Level 25 Fishing now unlocks the crafting recipe for fish tank shipwrecks . Level 30 Fishing now unlocks the crafting recipe for fish tank anchors . Level 35 Fishing now unlocks the crafting recipe for fish tank castles . Level 40 Fishing now unlocks the crafting recipe for fish tank treasure chests . Leveling up the Fishing skill now increases the chance of finding treasure by 0.1% per level. Owners of the pro gamepass are granted a bonus 3% chance of fishing treasure. Tier 1 bait now increases the player's fishing speed by 15% on average. Candy apples now increase the player's fishing speed by 25% on average. Orange honeycombs now increase the player's fishing speed by 15% on average. Fish tank blueprints can no longer be obtained. Renamed talapia to "Tilapia." Changed the recipe of the aquamarine sword to require 2 crystallized aquamarine instead of 2 pearls . Changed the recipe of the washing station to require 1 crystallized iron instead of 3 pearls . Players may now reset their player any island . Reduced the sell price of starfruit from 67 coins to 60 coins. Reduced the sell price of watermelon from 80 coins to 75 coins. Increased the sell price of kiwis from 24 coins to 32 coins. Greatly improved the performance in the Hub . Re-added Day/Night cycles to the Hub. Other performance improvements.  Fish price changes [ ]  Fish Old price New price Trout 3 coins ➡ 20 coins Blue tang 20 coins ➡ 35 coins Spirit fish 100 coins ➡ 200 coins Tuna 900 coins ➡ 1,000 coins Shark 450 coins ➡ 1,000 coins  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed a bug causing the bobber of fishing rods to apply centripetal force to the player. Fixed the collision box of the lights in the Hub. Melody can no longer appear inside the ground. Fixed visiting friends' islands on mob islands.  May 14, 2022 [ ]  Fixed a bug preventing fish from being fished. Fixed issues with missing audio. Fixed a bug preventing the Infernal Dragon from spawning and not showing its spawn cost. Fixed a bug causing players who jump off the Underworld not to teleport back to the Underworld. Fixed basic fertilizer not going to the inventory when fished. Fixed a bug causing fishing related quests not to save.  May 15, 2022 [ ]  Fisherman Thomas has been returned to the Hub. Fixed issues with fishing up fertilizers . Improved fishing rarities. Fixed an issue with recognizing highest tier bait effect. Fixed a bug causing fishing quest progress to not get recorded. title: May_17_2020
content: May 17, 2020 Basic Information Day released May 17, 2020 Version number 8 Version Navigator Previous version Next version May 10, 2020 May 26, 2020 The May 17th, 2020 update, also known as the Buffalkor Update, is the seventh major update in Islands . This update introduced a new island, as well as new blocks and tools .  Patchnotes [ ]  Patchnote #1 [ ]  New content patch is rolling out!  🗿 Buffalkor Mob & Island ✨ Gold Ore ⚔️ Iron War Axe 🔨 Gilded Steel Hammer 🥇 Gilded Steel Tools 🕯️ Lighting Station Gamepass 🔷 Coal, Iron and Gold Blocks 👓 Glass Blocks 🏭 Industrial Stonecutter 🥕 Carrot Cake 🌻 Flower Pots 🎵 Fix background music 🔊 Mobs play a sound when taking damage 🥫 Fix some foods not being edible ⚡ Bug fixes and performance optimizations  Note: You need a "Buffalkor Island Key" to travel to the new island. This is a new rare drop from killing slimes. Note 2: Crystalized Iron is a rare drop from manually breaking iron rocks.  We'll make both of these things more clear in a follow up patch tomorrow 🙂  Link: https://discord.com/channels/699869792445792348/699870693675892746/711654121194913802  Patchnote #2 [ ]  Rolling out a small bug fix patch.  🗒️ Fix an issue that could cause island data to corrupt 💸 Lower cost of gilded steel tools 🛠️ Fix an issue that could cause two islands to overlap ✍️ Fix some item descriptions  Link: https://discord.com/channels/699869792445792348/699870693675892746/711821964720734249  Patchnote #3 [ ]  Deployed another set of bug fixes aimed to fix island corruption.  Link: https://discord.com/channels/699869792445792348/699870693675892746/712009244991422515  Patchnote #4 [ ]  Rolling out some more bug fixes.  Link: https://discord.com/channels/699869792445792348/699870693675892746/712391930734182480  Patchnote #5 [ ]  More bug fixes are going live!  We've identified an issue where joining a server with a large island (40,000+ blocks) could crash the server if not enough memory is available. This results in the large island's data being corrupted (lots of missing blocks). As a temporary fix, we now deny large islands from joining a server if it will cause a crash. This means players with large islands may need to join several different servers until they are able to load-in.  We're working on ways we can avoid this type of restriction for large islands. For the time being, players with large islands are recommended to either join non-full servers or reserve a VIP server. We've also lowered the max player count to 22. We're hoping this lowered limit is only temporary.  Link: https://discord.com/channels/699869792445792348/699870693675892746/712535293881745448  Patchnote #6 [ ]  Quick patch to help with servers becoming unbearably laggy over time.  Link: https://discord.com/channels/699869792445792348/699870693675892746/712535293881745448  Changes [ ]  Added [ ]  New Island: Buffalkor Island New Enemy : Buffalkor New Weapons: Iron War Axe and Gilded Steel Hammer New Tools: Gilded Steel Axe and Gilded Steel Pickaxe New Recipe: Carrot Cake Batter and Carrot Cake New Gamepass: Lighting Station Gamepass New Ore: Gold Ore New Item Drops: Buffalkor Crystal and Crystallized Iron . New Blocks: Coal Blocks Iron Blocks Gold Blocks Glass Blocks Industrial Stonecutters Flower Pots  Modified [ ]  Fixed background music from not playing. Fixed mobs not playing their taking damage sound effect when taking damage. Fixed some foods not being edible. Performance optimizations. Reduced the chance of player's islands could get corrupted or overlapping. Fixed item descriptions being incorrect  Islands update history 2020 April April 10 • April 24 • April 27 May May 2 • May 4 • May 7 • May 10 • May 17 • May 26 • May 31 June June 15 • June 26 July July 4 • July 11 • July 17 • July 25 August August 2 • August 9 • August 16 • August 30 September September 6 • September 18 October October 3 • October 16 November November 1 • November 7 • November 20 • November 26 December December 11 • December 18 2021 January January 4 • January 22 • January 29 February Feburary 5 • Feburary 12 • Feburary 19 • Feburary 26 March March 5 • March 13 • March 19 April April 4 • April 10 • April 16 • April 24 May May 8 • May 21 June June 4 • June 30 July July 9 • July 17 • July 23 • July 30 August August 8 • August 15 • August 21 • August 28 September September 5 • September 11 • September 18 • September 25 October October 9 • October 18 November November 13 • November 27 December December 10 • December 18 • December 29 2022 January January 8 • January 15 • January 30 February February 7 • February 19 • February 27 March March 6 • March 12 • March 25 April April 1 • April 9 • April 16 • April 22 • April 29 May May 13 • May 20 • May 27 June June 3 • June 10 • June 18 • June 25 July July 2 • July 9 • July 16 • July 23 • July 30 August August 6 • August 13 • August 20 • August 27 September September 3 • September 10 • September 17 • September 24 October October 1 • October 8 • October 15 • October 22 • October 28 November November 4 • November 11 • November 18 • November 25 December December 2 • December 16 • December 23 2023 January January 6 • January 20 February February 3 • February 17 March March 3 • March 17 • March 31 April April 14 • April 28 May May 12 • May 26 June June 23 July July 7 • July 21 August August 18 October October 13 November November 7 Discontinuation

title: May_20_2022
content: May 20, 2022 Basic Information Day released May 20, 2022 Version number 82 Version Navigator Previous version Next version May 13, 2022 May 27, 2022 The May 20, 2022 update is an update in Islands that added the blast furnace , other cut fish , and various other changes based on community opinions.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added Blast Furnaces . Added Cut Catfish . Added Cut Carp . Added Cut Trout . Added Fish and Chips .  Modifications [ ]  Fish now spawn in water wherever the fishing rod's bobber is. Players can now walk around while fishing. Casting a fishing rod onto a block that is not a body of water will now retract it. Improved fishing performances. Changed Catherine 's model. Tier 1 bait no longer requires level 15 Fishing to craft and use. Steel rods now require 20 steel ingots to craft, down from 25. The industrial smelter now requires 1 pink sticky gears to craft, down from 3. Increased the sell price of carrots from 21 coins to 25 coins. Increased the sell price of dragon fruits from 45 coins to 52 coins. Updated the sound when mining flowers .  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed a bug that prevented the minigame from ending when unequipping a fishing rod. Fixed the upside-down bobber and reworked the fishing line physics. Fixed other bugs related to fishing . Fixed a UI issue when looking in industrial chests . Fixed entities getting stuck in blocks on player islands . Fixed the Return to Home button not appearing when visiting other player islands. Fixed a bug that prevented fishing from working in private servers. content: May 26, 2023 Basic Information Day released May 26, 2023 Version number 123 Version Navigator Previous version Next version May 12, 2023 June 23, 2023 The May 26, 2023 update, also known as the Hardcore update part II, is a minor update in Islands that reworked Hardcore.  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added Hardcore Trophies . Added private server restriction to Hardcore rules menu.  Modifications [ ]  Players can now trade gears for gears from Ivon in Hardcore. Players can now trade flowers for flowers from Fulco in Hardcore. Players can now trade plum saplings for orange saplings during fall on the Player's Island . Increased the sell price of potato from 11 coins to 17 coins. Decreased the sell price of kiwis from 24 coins to 19 coins.  June 19, 2023 [ ]  Temporarily disabled Vending Machines , and the ability to trade, and drop items in an attempt to fix Islands' economy. title: May_27_2022
content: May 27, 2022 Basic Information Day released May 27, 2022 Version number 83 Version Navigator Previous version Next version May 20, 2022 June 3, 2022 The May 27, 2022 update is a minor update in Islands that reworked magic weapons and visitor permissions .  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Revamped the Visitor Permissions UI . Added an option to teleport players. Added the ability to ban and unban players. Added a search bar to search for players. A warning now shows up when changing the permissions of a player. A confirmation now shows up when resetting a join code.  Modifications [ ]  Charging spellbooks , tidal spellbooks , and ruby staffs will now increase its damage. Improved particle effects on magic weapons. 3 gilded steel rods are now required to craft gilded steel pickaxes and gilded steel axes , down from 5. Increased chances of fishing eels , seaweed seeds , and propellers when fishing . Changed the skill requirements of certain items : Catfish now requires level 12 Combat to sell. Groupers and eels now require level 20 Combat to sell. Tilapia and swordfish now require level 36 Combat to sell. Cactus spikes now require level 36 Combat to craft. Infernal fish now require level 55 Combat to sell. The dragonslayer now requires level 55 Combat to craft. Rageblades now require level 60 Combat to craft. Tidal spellbooks now require level 20 Magic to craft. Ruby staffs now require level 36 Magic to craft. Conveyor sensors now require level 36 Forging to craft, down from 50. Input/output chests now require level 40 Forging to craft, down from 62. Opal pickaxes now require level 55 Mining to craft. Opal axes now require level 44 Woodcutting to craft. Iron sickles now require level 20 Farming to craft. Gilded steel sickles now require level 36 Farming to craft. Diamond sickles now require level 50 Farming to craft. Vending Machine Tier 2 now require level 70 Economy to craft. Increased the sell price of avocados from 32 coins to 36 coins. Reduced the sell price kiwis from 32 coins to 24 coins.  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed an issue where join codes didn't reset immediately. Fixed the fireball offset when using magic weapons. Fixed an issue were certain furniture blocks were still locked after using its blueprint . Fixed an issue where the progress bar would get stuck when fishing. title: May_4_2020
content: May 4, 2020 Basic Information Day released May 4th, 2020 Version number 5 Version Navigator Previous version Next version May 2, 2020 May 7, 2020  The May 4th, 2020 Update (Floral Update) is the fourth major update in Islands. This update includes the Floral Bench and Starter Pack gamepasses, and Crop Totems could be automated.  Patch Notes [ ]  Patch Note #1 [ ]  New update is rolling out now! Your server should restart within a few minutes.  🌻 Floral bench! Craft hedges and bushes to decorate your island. 👨‍🌾 Crop totems now output to conveyor belts. 💸 Sell slime balls to the Adventurer Merchant. 🟩 Increased the size of slimes. 🍃 Ambient tree leaves. 🤺 Wooden sword no longer falls into void after being dropped. 🧰 Starter Pack. 🛡️ Exploit and bug fixes.  Link: https://discord.com/channels/699869792445792348/699870693675892746/706897911002431488  Changes [ ]  Added [ ]  The Floral Bench is now accessible by buying the corresponding gamepass. Crop Totem now outputs to Conveyor belts. Trees now have ambient leaves particle effects. Starter Pack can now be purchased on the store. You can now sell Slime Balls to Ivon (Adventurer).  Modified [ ]  The Wooden Sword no longer falls into the void when dropped. Exploit fixes. Increased the size of Slimes.  Trivia [ ]  Roblox Island's popularity rose on the release of this update. The most famous YouTubers known for making Roblox Islands videos released their first videos on the game after the intial release of this update. title: May_8_2021
content: May 8, 2021 Basic Information Day released May 8, 2021 Version number 44 Version Navigator Previous version Next version April 24, 2021 May 21, 2021  The May 8, 2021 update, also known as the Water Update, made several decoration changes.  Changes [ ]  Added [ ]  Water Water Bucket Banner Workbench gamepass Banners Banner Workbench Marble bricks , marble brick stairs , and marble brick slabs 2 new villagers can be found on Desert Island Added paintings from Discord painting competition: Hillside Hut Painting Halcyon View Painting Picnic Painting  Modifications [ ]  4 banner types can be crafted in normal tiered workbenches. Many blocks were retextured including: All wood planks Colored and regular glass blocks and panes are properly translucent Slate bricks Diamond block Gold block Iron block Bricks Sandstone Sandstone bricks Red sandstone bricks Aquamarine bricks Logs and marble columns can be placed sideways Blocks no longer rotate by default Blocks can be rotated by while placing by pressing "R" Tiling on stairs & slabs have been fixed Azarath has been expanded Fixed the in-hand totem model Buckets can now collect water Dead bushes will naturally generate on Desert Island again.  Trivia [ ]  Minutes after the update there was a bug that prevented players from using the portal to Slime Island . title: Medal
content: Medal Master of Fishing Master of Farming Master of Forging Master of Combat Master of Light Melee Master of Heavy Melee Master of Magic Master of Archery Master of Mining Master of Woodcutting Master of Economy Master of Cooking Master of Animal Husbandry Medals are items used to commemorate the player in completing certain achievements . There are currently 13 medals, one for each skill . They cannot be dropped, traded , or put in vending machines and chests .  Obtaining [ ]  Achievements [ ]  Achievement Description AP rewarded Bonus rewards Master of Fishing Reach Level 100 Fishing 50 1x Master of Fishing Medal Master of Farming Reach Level 100 Farming 1x Master of Farming Medal Master of Forging Reach Level 100 Forging 1x Master of Forging Medal Master of Combat Reach Level 100 Combat 1x Master of Combat Medal Master of Light Weapons Reach Level 100 Light Melee 1x Master of Light Melee Medal Master of Heavy Weapons Reach Level 100 Heavy Melee 1x Master of Heavy Melee Medal Master of Magic Reach Level 100 Magic 1x Master of Magic Medal Mastery of Archery Reach Level 100 Archery 1x Master of Archery Medal Mastery of Mining Reach Level 100 Mining 1x Master of Mining Medal Mastery of Woodcutting Reach Level 100 Woodcutting 1x Master of Woodcutting Medal Master of Economy Reach Level 100 Economy 1x Master of Economy Medal Master of Cooking Reach Level 100 Cooking 1x Master of Cooking Medal Master of Animals Reach Level 100 Animal Care 1x Master of Animal Husbandry Medal Master of Hardcore Survive 720 hours(30 days) in Hardcore 1x Master of Hardcore  Usage [ ]  Displaying [ ]  Medals can be displayed in a single medal display stand mounted on the side of blocks . Up to one medal can be showcased per stand.  History [ ]  February 3, 2023 Added medals.

title: Melody
content: Melody Location Hub Purpose Gives 2 instruments and promotes the instrument workbench Occupation Musician Melody is a villager located in the Hub . Upon interacting with her for the first time, she will give the player a pan flute and kalimba .  Dialogue [ ]  First interaction [ ]  "What's rockin', user ?" >That's a nice guitar! "Thanks! I happen to have some spare instruments on me if you want to jam yourself?" >Yes please! "Here you go. Enjoy." >Other instruments "If you're wantin' some other instruments to play with, you can create them in an instrument workbench." >Purchase Workbench Prompts gamepass purchase. >Thank you! "What can I do for you?" [Loops to beginning]  After first interaction [ ]  "What's rockin', user ?" (Without gamepass) >Purchase Workbench Prompts gamepass purchase. (With gamepass) >Goodbye End.  History [ ]  July 9, 2021 Added Melody. May 13, 2022 Fixed a bug causing Melody to appear inside the ground.

title: Mercenary

title: Merger
content: Merger Type of block Solid block Recipe 1 Crystallized Iron 4 Steel Rod 5 Iron Ingot Crafted with Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Best tool Luminous Transparent A merger is a conveyor block that outputs inputted items from two conveyor outputs. The output conveyor belt cannot be switched to another conveyor belt.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Merger 1 Crystallized Iron 4 Steel Rod 5 Iron Ingot Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Breaking [ ]  Merger Breaking Data Hardness 4 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 6 Wooden 12 12 Stone 7 7 Iron 4 4 Gilded Steel 3 3 Diamond 2 2 Opal 2 2 Void Mattock 1  Usage [ ]  Merging [ ]  Having the opposite functionality to a randomizer , the merger merges two conveyor inputs from the side into one conveyor output in the middle of the machine.  History [ ]  August 15, 2021 Added mergers. April 22, 2022 Fixed the collision box of the merger.  Trivia [ ]  The split conveyor and randomizer have the exact same model but with different designs at the top and different conveyor directions. It is the only craftable block added in the August 15, 2021 update that can be crafted in the workbench tier 3 . The merger shares the same crafting recipe as the randomizer.

title: Milk_Bucket
content: Milk Bucket Sell price 80 coins A milk bucket is an item obtained from cows .  Obtaining [ ]  Milking [ ]  Milk buckets are produced by milking a cow with an empty bucket . This process can be automated with an industrial milker .  Usage [ ]  Using a milk bucket in any way will not return the bucket .  Transforming [ ]  Milk buckets can be transformed into cheese in a cheesemaker . It takes a total of 3 minutes and 30 seconds to fully transform a milk bucket into cheese.  Input Item transformer Output 1 Milk Bucket ➡ Cheesemaker ➡ 1 Cheese  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Island Orb 10 Glass Block 5 Milk Bucket 5 Pizza 3 Mayonnaise Jar 5 Jar of Honey Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 None Dragon Fruit Ice Cream 1 Dragon Fruit 1 Starfruit 3 Blueberry 1 Milk Bucket Cooking Table Food Processor None Tomato Soup 8 Tomato Sauce 4 Onion 1 Milk Bucket Cooking Table Food Processor Level 36 Cooking Glass of Milk 1 Milk Bucket Cooking Table Food Processor Level 42 Cooking  Selling [ ]  Milk buckets can be sold to Taliyah for 80 coins each.  History [ ]  October 3, 2020 Added milk buckets. November 13, 2021 Milk buckets can now be used to craft tomato soup . February 27, 2022 Milk buckets can now be used to craft dragon fruit ice cream . April 9, 2022 Milk buckets can now be used to craft Island orbs . July 23, 2022 Milk buckets can now be used to craft glasses of milk .

title: Mob
content: A mob is a living entity that the player can interact with. Hostile mobs can be attacked while passive mobs cannot. Neutral mobs only attack when damaged.  Spawning [ ]  Mobs spawn in various ways: hostile mobs are tied to specific mob islands. Passive mobs can spawn in varying methods, including the time of day, weather patterns, or with a spawn egg .  List of mobs [ ]  Mobs are listed and classified by their nature from the player's perspective. For more details on a particular mob, scroll down and click and view their individual page.  Passive mobs [ ]  Passive mobs are harmless mobs that cannot attack and cannot be attacked by the player.  Animals [ ]  Animals are a type of passive mob that can be spawned with spawn eggs, which can be obtained via breeding or purchase form Taliyah . They can be ridden once fully grown. They can also be named using an animal nametag .  Except for turkeys , animals have a spawn limit based on your Animal Care skill level.  Catchable mobs [ ]  Catchable mobs are mobs that can be caught with a net .  Fish [ ]  Fish can be caught using a fishing rod in bodies of water .  Other [ ]  Other mobs below do not belong in any category above.  Passive mob stats [ ]  Name Luminous Spawn location Catch method Additional info Bee No Player islands (near a bee hive ) Net , Golden Net Bees spawn from a bee hive and will pollinate flowers during the day. Bees will produce honeycombs in the bee hive that can be collected. Firefly Yes Player islands (near trees at night) Net , Golden Net There are 5 different color variants of fireflies. In  order of rarity, they are yellow, green, red, blue, and purple. Fish No Most bodies of water / Lava pools / Void pools Fishing Rod Bait can be used to increase the chances of getting a rare catch. Certain fish can only be caught using an iron fishing rod. Spirit Fish Yes Spirit River Fishing Rod Spirit fish have a 10% chance of spawning in the Spirit River . They are depicted as luminous silhouettes that can be caught using a fishing rod . Infernal Fish Yes Lava pools Fishing Rod Infernal fish exclusively spawn in lava pools in the Underworld . Void Fish Yes Void pools Fishing Rod Void fish exclusively spawn in lava pools in the Void Isles . Cow No Player islands (spawned by players) N/A Cows can be milked for milk buckets . Sheep No Player islands (spawned by players) N/A Sheep can be sheared for wool . Pig No Player islands (spawned by players) N/A Pigs may dig up truffles . Chicken No Player islands (spawned by players) N/A Chickens may lay eggs . Frog No Player islands (during rain ) Net , Golden Net A limit of 4 frogs can be on the player's island at once. Rabbit No Player islands (during winter ) Net , Golden Net A limit of 3 rabbits can be on the player's island at once. Spirit Yes Spirit Island Net , Golden Net There are 4 color variants of spirits. In increasing order of rarity, they are white, blue, pink, and green. Pumpkin Bat Yes Player's island (near trees at night during Halloween 2021 ) Net , Golden Net N/A Butterfly No Butterfly Festival Island Net , Golden Net There are 6 color variants of butterflies. In increasing order of rarity, they are white, red, yellow, green, blue, and silver. Ember Skull Yes Player's island]] (near trees at night during the Halloween 2022 event) Net , Golden Net N/A Turkey No Player islands (spawned by players), Maple Isles N/A Turkeys are able to harvest red berries , blueberries , blackberries , and raspberries for the player. When spooked on the Maple Isles , the player will be rewarded 1 - 2 red berries or raspberries. It is the first and only medium animal passive mob. Duck No Player islands (spawned by players) N/A Ducks may lay duck eggs . Ducks also grant a 25% speed boost when mounted. Yak No Player islands (spawned by players) N/A Yaks can be milked for yak milk buckets . Yaks also grant a 25% speed boost when mounted. Horse No Player islands (spawned by players) N/A Horses grant a 100% speed boost and a 50% jump boost when mounted. Vulture No Player islands (spawned by players) N/A Vultures may drop feathers . Void Crop Eater No Player islands (at night in Hardcore Mode ) N/A Void Crop Eaters eat the player's crops at night.  Pets [ ]  Pets are passive mobs that follow the player around.  Pets can only be spawned through a pet spawn egg .  Neutral mobs [ ]  Neutral mobs don't attack players unless they get attacked themselves.  Hostile mobs [ ]  Hostile mobs always attack players and will drop loot when killed. Most in-game hostile mobs have a chance to drop a jukebox disk and/or a portal shard of their respective island. All in-game mobs have a 0.3% chance to drop either an antler shield or antler hammer provided that the player has the Might of Fhanhorn effect.  Bosses [ ]  Bosses are hostile mobs that have a massive amount of health with unique move/attack sets. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 10% for 2 players, 25% for 3 players, 35% for 4 players, 45% from 5 players, and 55% for 6+ players in the boss' area. When a boss is killed, the amount of Combat XP rewarded is slightly decreased for every player that attacked the boss. Players can see any boss's health bar at the top of the GUI or on top of the boss itself if nearby. Some bosses can be summoned without any Combat level requirement, two bosses cannot be summoned by players or tokens, and only one cannot be bypassed with any token.  Event mobs [ ]  Event mobs are mobs that are only in-game for a limited amount of time. After their respective events end, they will no longer spawn. Currently doesn't have its own token)  * The Slime King , Fhanhorn , Percival the Pumpkin King , Zombie Cletus , and the Lunar Rabbit can be summoned without a Combat level requirement ** Fhanhorn 's summon cooldown cannot be bypassed with tokens and doesn't have its own token *** The Grand High Witch and the Lunar Rabbit cannot be summoned by players or tokens, doesn't have a summon cooldown, and doesn't have their own token  Damage reduction (bosses only, except the Grand High Witch ) [ ]  Number of players Damage reduction 1 0% 2 10% 3 25% 4 35% 5 45% 6+ 55%  Trivia [ ]  Slimes are the first hostile mob in Islands . Fish are the first passive mob in Islands . Bees are the first flying passive mob in Islands . When the Christmas 2020 event ended, frost slimes would still spawn on Slime Island for a few more days. Snowmen are currently the first and only neutral mob in Islands . The Grand High Witch is the first boss in Islands . The Infernal Dragon is the first boss in Islands that doesn't have a summon cooldown. It is the first boss in Islands that requires its own token to be summoned. Fhanhorn is the first and only boss in Islands whose summon cooldown currently cannot be bypassed with 500 tokens . It is also the second boss in Islands that doesn't have its own token, with the others being the Grand High Witch, the Lunar Rabbit , and the Azarathian Serpent . Unlike most bosses with the "Failed to Summon" notification, if a player attempts to summon Fhanhorn while still on cooldown due to it doesn't have its own token, nothing happens. It is the first and only boss in Islands that doesn't have the "Failed to Summon" notification if attempts to be summoned by players during cooldown or doesn't have its own token. Since the October 28, 2022 update, the token requirement is doesn't indicate on Fhanhorn's summoning UI due to it doesn't have its own token. Fhanhorn is the first boss in Islands with the ability to heal itself.

title: Moth_Glider_Spawn_Egg
content: Moth Glider Spawn Egg A moth glider spawn egg is a spawn egg that can be used to spawn the Moth Glider Pet. It cannot be dropped, traded , or put in vending machines and chests .  Obtaining [ ]  Harcore Mode [ ]  Getting the Plant Protection Agency achievement by killing 300 void crop eaters in hardcore mode will award the player with a moth glider spawn egg.  Usage [ ]  Spawning [ ]  To spawn a moth glider, the player must be the owner of the island they are currently on. While holding the egg, clicking or tapping anywhere on the player's screen will spawn a moth glider.  History [ ]  May 12, 2023 Added moth gilder spawn eggs.

title: Mounts
content: Mounts are a feature added in the October 15, 2022 update. They are types of transportation that can be used to give speed boosts to players riding them. Mounts can be selected by pressing the button on the left and can be equipped by pressing the "C" key (PC only) or by pressing the button next to the backpack button. Players cannot change mounts while on one. Mounts will automatically be dismounted when the player takes any damage from mobs , with the exception of animal mounts.  Methods of obtaining [ ]  Quests [ ]  Broom (Sweep the Floor) Witch's Broom (The Wicked Witch)  Animals [ ]  Not boosted [ ]  Cow Sheep Pig Chicken Turkey  With boosts [ ]  Duck Yak Horse Vulture  Function [ ]  When mounted, most mounts will give a speed boost that lasts until the player dismounts it, and only one gives a jump boost.  Mounts [ ]  Animal mounts [ ]  Full-grown animals can be mounted. Some animal mounts will give the player a speed boost and only one gives the player a jump boost.  Unlike the broom or the witch's broom , animal mounts will no longer automatically be dismounted when the player takes any damage from mobs .  Not boosted [ ]  With boosts [ ]  Trivia [ ]  Prior to the patch on October 16, 2022 , mounts had a 5 second cooldown on mounting when receiving any damage. Horse and vulture are the only animal mounts that don't have or indicate the status effect icon if players mount them due to their permanent boosts. Turkey is the first and only animal mount that don't have any animation if a player mounts it. Horse is the fastest animal mount in Islands if a player mounts it, even faster when consuming chili peppers , potato and duck egg scrambles , and sweet rice desserts . Its permanent speed boost was likely 100%. Horse is the first and only animal mount in Islands that grants a jump boost. if a player mounts it. Its permanent jump boost was likely 50%. Horse, turkey, and vulture are the only animal mounts able to turn around while jumping and mounting. They are also the only animals that don't have a looking animation. This was likely can be done if camera lock or first-person view. If the player attempts to use another mount when already on a mount, the notification says: " Already on a mount - You are already on a mount. ".  Gallery [ ]

title: Mushroom_Obby
content: Mushroom Obby Required skill Level 20 Fishing Level 30 Combat Resources Mushroom Obby Tickets Iron Ore Gold Ore Copper Ore Mobs Mushroom Golem Snail Koi Carp Catfish  The Mushroom Obby is a series of challenges that can be completed for mushroom obby tickets .  Gameplay [ ]  The Mushroom Obby can be accessed by interacting with the Info Board in the hub . Holding [F] on PC or a button on mobile near the Info Board will allow the player to join a game queue. Tickets are awarded upon completion of the obby. There are a maximum of 5 players each round. The player's inventory is temporarily cleared upon joining the game and will automatically be given a gilded steel pickaxe , iron sickle , diamond great sword , net , and an iron fishing rod .  Objectives [ ]  Before each task, players must complete a small obby by bouncing on bouncy mushrooms to the next island. Upon completing a task, a red portal gate will turn green, and players can pass through to the next task.  Spawn Island [ ]  Players spawn here before the game begins. After the game begins, players have to parkour to the first island via bouncy mushrooms.  First Island [ ]  Iron , coal and copper rocks spawn on this island. Players receive a quest to fully break 16 copper rocks on the island with their pickaxe.  Second Island [ ]  Players then receive a quest to collect 15 glowing mushrooms using their sickle or by picking them up by pressing [F] on PC or a button on mobile. Harvesting ordinary red mushrooms will not contribute to this quest.  Third Island [ ]  Players then receive a quest to defeat 10 mushroom golems which have ~400 health [Confirmation needed] .  Fourth Island [ ]  Players then receive a quest to collect 15 snails with their net.  Fifth Island [ ]  Players then receive a quest to fish 3 carp using their iron fishing rod. Fishing other types of fish will not contribute towards the task.  Final Island [ ]  Players must climb to the top of this island and press the mushroom button on the stump pedestal ([F] on PC and a button on mobile) to complete the obby. The server then broadcasts the message " [SERVER] <player_name> has finished in 1st/2nd/3rd/? place! "  Rewards [ ]  As a reward for finishing the obby, players will receive the glowing mushrooms they collected and any fish they caught.  Rank Prize 1st 75 mushroom obby tickets 2nd 65 mushroom obby tickets 3rd 55 - 65 mushroom obby tickets Under 3rd 45 mushroom obby tickets for 100-125 points 35 mushroom obby tickets for 50-75 points 25 mushroom obby tickets for 25 points  History [ ]  August 18, 2023 Initiated the Mushroom Obby Event. September 16, 2023 Removed the Mushroom Obby event.

title: Mushroom_Obby_Ticket
content: Mushroom Obby Ticket Description A ticket obtained from the Mushroom Obby. Use to claim rewards from the obby host.  Mushroom obby tickets are the official currency of the 2023 Mushroom Obby event, granting the player the ability to purchase various limited items and trades. Currently, the item cannot be dropped, traded , or put in vending machines , chests , and trash cans .  Obtaining [ ]  2023 Mushroom Obby [ ]  During the 2023 Mushroom Obby event, players could have competed in contests with other players in the server they are in to earn mushroom obby tickets. The amount of mushroom obby tickets a player received at the end of the contest depended on the place they were in once they finished each island. Each task they completeted would give 25 points, and any player who came 4th or 5th would get a certain amount of mushroom obby tickets.  Rank Prize 1st 75 mushroom obby tickets 2nd 65 mushroom obby tickets 3rd 55 - 65 mushroom obby tickets Under 3rd 45 mushroom obby tickets for 100-125 points 35 mushroom obby tickets for 50-75 points 25 mushroom obby tickets for 25 points  Usage [ ]  Purchasing [ ]  Players could have purchased various items from Jim in the Hub using Mushroom Obby Tickets.

title: Mysterious_Fragment
content: Mysterious Fragment #1 #2 #3 #4 Dropped by #1: Slime King , Slime Queen #2: Kor #3: Wizard Boss #4: Bhaa Description #1: A mysterious fragment from the Slime King... #2: A mysterious fragment from Kor... #3: A mysterious fragment from the Wizard Boss... #4: A mysterious fragment from Bhaa... A mysterious fragment is a mob drop rarely dropped by defeating the current bosses in the game. None of the four variants can be dropped, traded , or put in vending machines and chests .  Obtaining [ ]  Mob drop [ ]  Name Dropped by Drop chance Mysterious Fragment #1 Slime King Slime Queen 10% (Slime King) 6.67% (Slime Queen) Mysterious Fragment #2 Kor 5% Mysterious Fragment #3 Wizard Boss 5% Mysterious Fragment #4 Bhaa 5%  Usage [ ]  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Mysterious Portal 1 Mysterious Fragment #1 1 Mysterious Fragment #2 1 Mysterious Fragment #3 1 Mysterious Fragment #4 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 None Slime King Orb 10 Glass Block 20 Red Bronze Ingot 1 Mysterious Fragment #1 Workbench Tier 4 Defeated the Slime King at least once Kor Orb 10 Glass Block 20 Red Bronze Ingot 1 Mysterious Fragment #2 Workbench Tier 4 Level 46 Combat Defeated Kor at least once Wizard Boss Orb 10 Glass Block 20 Red Bronze Ingot 1 Mysterious Fragment #3 Workbench Tier 4 Level 20 Combat Defeated the Wizard Boss at least once Bhaa Orb 10 Glass Block 20 Red Bronze Ingot 1 Mysterious Fragment #4 Workbench Tier 4 Level 36 Combat Defeated Bhaa at least once  History [ ]  September 5, 2021 Added mysterious fragments. September 11, 2021 Changed the drop rate for fragment #2 from 3.33% to 5%. Changed the drop rate for fragment #3 from 2% to 5%. Changed the drop rate for fragment #4 from 4% to 5%. April 16, 2022 Mysterious fragments can now be used to craft Slime King orbs , Kor orbs , Wizard Boss orbs , and Bhaa orbs . July 2, 2022 The Slime Queen is now able to drop mysterious fragment #1s upon defeat. September 3, 2022 Changed the drop rate for fragment #1 from the Slime Queen from 10% to 6.67%.

title: Mysterious_Portal
content: Mysterious Portal Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 1 Mysterious Fragment #1 1 Mysterious Fragment #2 1 Mysterious Fragment #3 1 Mysterious Fragment #4 Crafted with Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Required skill Level 55 Combat (to use) Best tool Luminous Transparent Description An ancient portal crafted from mysterious fragments... The mysterious portal is a placeable portal that leads to the Underworld . It cannot be dropped, traded , or put in vending machines and chests .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Mysterious Portal 1 Mysterious Fragment #1 1 Mysterious Fragment #2 1 Mysterious Fragment #3 1 Mysterious Fragment #4 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Breaking [ ]  Mysterious Portal Breaking Data Hardness 35 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 53 Wooden 105 105 Stone 56 56 Iron 35 35 Gilded Steel 25 25 Diamond 18 18 Opal 14 14 Void Mattock 7  Usage [ ]  Traveling [ ]  Before September 11, 2021 , a timer counting down to the time the portal will be open will appear on top of the portal. Since the release of the update, players can use the portal to travel to the Underworld if the player has reached level 55 Combat .  Additional notes [ ]  Even if given build permissions , players cannot place or break mysterious portals on player islands where they are not the owner. Other players are able to go through any mysterious portal to access the Underworld, even if they are not the owner or given build permissions.  History [ ]  September 5, 2021 Added mysterious portals. It had no use or function. September 11, 2021 The mysterious portal now leads to the Underworld . April 10, 2022 Level 55 Combat is now required to use the mysterious portal.  Trivia [ ]  As the countdown ticked down to its opening on September 11, 2021 , the mysterious portal became less and less transparent and emitted orange-yellow particles more frequently every few seconds. The mysterious portal is the second portal that is not the regular purple color, the first being the golden portal, obtainable only by having 100 million or more coins before the Economy Wipe .

title: Nature27s_Divine_Longbow
content: Nature's Divine Longbow Type Long Bow Attack damage 26 HP 44 HP (Fully charged) 39 - 45 HP ( Stone Short Arrow ) 66 - 75 HP (Stone Long Arrow; Fully charged) 41 - 46 HP ( Iron Long Arrow ) 70 - 78 HP (Iron Long Arrow; Fully charged) 46 - 53 HP ( Steel Long Arrow ) 78 - 90 HP (Steel Long Arrow; Fully charged) Buy cost 550 Mushroom Obby Ticket Description Buyable Bow  A nature's divine longbow is an event item that could have been purchased for 550 Mushroom Obby Tickets .  Obtaining [ ]  Purchasing [ ]  The nature's divine longbow could have been purchased for 550 Mushroom Obby Tickets from Jim's shop.  Behavior [ ]  Attacking [ ]  To shoot the bow, at least one large arrow must be in the player's inventory . The bow can be charged by holding left click on PC or holding down on mobile and the damage dealt by the arrow will increase in proportion to the time the bow is charged.  At level 1 Archery , the nature's divine longbow deals a base damage of 26 HP to mobs , and its damage can be increased by leveling up the Archery skill.  Charging [ ]  Nature's divine longbows can be charged in one second. Charging a shot will increase the amount of damage dealt by 1.7x at full charge. This additional damage can be increased by leveling up the Archery skill.  History [ ]  August 18, 2023 Added nature's divine longbows.

title: Nest
content: Nest Type of block Non-solid block Recipe 40 Wheat 20 Oak Plank Required skill Level 19 Animal Care Best tool Luminous Transparent Description Birds like to roost and lay eggs in a nest A nest is a block that chickens and ducks can sleep or lay eggs on, and collect feathers from vultures .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Nest 40 Wheat 20 Oak Plank Animal Bench Level 19 Animal Care  Breaking [ ]  Nest Breaking Data Hardness 2 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 3 Wooden 6 6 Stone 4 4 Iron 2 2 Gilded Steel 2 2 Diamond 1 1 Opal 1 1 Void Mattock 1  Usage [ ]  Animal bed [ ]  When placed down, chickens and ducks will lay eggs and duck eggs respectively in the nest, while vultures will drop feathers inside after being fed carp or their favorite food . They may sleep on the nest during nighttime. The nest can hold up to 3 eggs at once. Eggs can be manually placed into nests, but duck eggs and feathers cannot.  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Industrial Nest 1 Nest 1 Conveyor Belt 3 Blue Sticky Gear Animal Bench Level 45 Animal Care  History [ ]  February 26, 2021 Added chicken nests. February 19, 2022 Renamed chicken nests to nests. Ducks can now sleep and lay duck eggs in nests. ? Changed the recipe to require 40 wheat , up from 20. March 3, 2023 Nests can now be used to craft industrial nests . March 17, 2023 Vultures can now sleep and drop feathers in nests.

title: Net
content: Net Type Tool Recipe 15 Oak Wood Crafted with Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Required skill Level 2 Animal Care Description Use to catch bees, fireflies and frogs. The net is a tool that can be used to catch any catchable mob .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Net 15 Oak Wood Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Level 2 Animal Care  Usage [ ]  Catching mobs [ ]  Nets can be used to catch catchable mobs by clicking (PC) or pressing the "Use" button (mobile). The end of the net must touch the mob to catch it. The player will receive colored firefly jars from catching fireflies, frog jars from frogs, caged rabbits from rabbits, spirit jars from spirits , Pumpkin Boss tokens from pumpkin bats , colored butterfly jars from butterflies and Zombie Cletus tokens from ember skulls .  History [ ]  September 6, 2020 Added nets. January 22, 2021 Level 3 Animal Care is requried to craft the net. April 4, 2021 Changed the description to "Used to catch bees, fireflies and frogs." June 4, 2021 Nets can now catch rabbits . June 30, 2021 Nets can now catch spirits . June 31, 2021 Fixed a bug that caused players to not be able to catch mobs on private servers. July 23, 2021 Level 2 Animal Care is now required to craft the net. October 18, 2021 Nets can now catch pumpkin bats . July 30, 2022 Fixed nets not working on mobile devices. September 3, 2022 Nets can now catch butterflies . October 15, 2022 Nets can now catch ember skulls .  Trivia [ ]  Fish cannot be caught with nets. There used to be a bug where swinging a net will remove the stun effect if the player is affected by it. Following the release of the June 30, 2021 update, there was a bug where nets were unable to capture mobs in private servers. This was fixed the following day so that nets properly function in private servers.

title: November_1_2020
content: November 1, 2020 Basic Information Day released November 1st, 2020 Version number 24 Version Navigator Previous version Next version October 16, 2020 November 7, 2020 The November 1, 2020 update, also known as the New Flowers and Colors update, introduced more colors to the coloring station , revamped flowers , and reduced lag.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Items & Blocks [ ]  More clay variations, now 11 colors in total. Added 4 new types of flowers with color variants, over 20 variations in total.  Hub [ ]  Hub revamped and counted as a separate server, instead of being part of a server. The Hub can now hold 50 people.  Chat [ ]  Added a cross-server chat system. Players are able to chat with others, despite not being in the same server.  Modifications [ ]  Islands [ ]  Every island is now counted as a server itself. This reduces lag and allows developers to increase the block limit in the future. All players now have free access to join codes.  Building [ ]  Added double doors Added upside down stairs Added top and bottom slabs Added ability to press R to rotate while placing  Other [ ]  Hotbar layout saves on rejoin. Music toggle saves on rejoin. Doubled the lifetime and amount limit of factory-dropped items (this means items produced by machines last longer when dropped) All items that previously displayed as a block when hold now display the item properly (this means you can see some type of item now) Removed Halloween content. Watering cans now have infinite water storage. Can no longer access player list. Major duplication glitch patched. title: November_11_2022
content: November 11, 2022 Basic Information Day released November 11, 2022 Version number 107 Version Navigator Previous version Next version November 4, 2022 November 18, 2022 The November 11, 2022 update, also known as the plushie update, is a major update in Islands that added plushies, reworks and bug fixes.  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added a new furniture block: Added plushies . Added solids . Added sewing stations . Added yarn . Added sewing buttons .  Modifications [ ]  Renamed the static scepter to "Lightning Scepter". Changed lightning scepter’s lightning effect. Lightning scepter now deals multiple ticks of damage per target hit. Added an option to show/hide owner's join code in the Explore Menu . Renamed pet egg stands . The squeak sounds of plushies now have variants. Increased the sell price of wheat from 7 coins to 11 coins. Decreased the sell price of radishes from 64 coins to 59 coins. John now sells sewing buttons for 1,000 coins.  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed a bug causing items to be deleted when falling into the void. Fixed a bug causing permissions menu locking in place when clicking multiple times. Fixed a bug causing trees to float in the Hub . Fixed damage differences in swords. Fixed a bug causing pet spawn eggs to be removed when spawning an existing pet . title: November_18_2022
content: November 18, 2022 Basic Information Day released November 18, 2022 Version number 108 Version Navigator Previous version Next version November 11, 2022 November 25, 2022 The November 18, 2022 update, also known as the PvP update, is a major update in Islands that added Taylor , re-added PvP, along with reworks and bug fixes.  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added Taylor . Added pastels . Re-added PvP.  Modifications [ ]  John no longer sells sewing buttons . PvP mode can now be toggled on or off through the Settings Menu . Wizard Boss now uses new arc effects with its charged up attacks, and attacks faster. Damage numbers when fighting mobs are now client side. Removed Hide Icons in the Permissions Menu. Added Hide Icons in the Settings Menu. Renamed gazebos . Increased the sell price of pineapple from 92 coins to 96 coins. Decreased the sell price of spinach from 18 coins to 15 coins.  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed bug causing players to attack others without PvP toggled on. Fixed bug causing mobs not to take or deal damage to players. title: November_20_2020
content: November 20, 2020 Basic Information Day released November 20th, 2020 Version number 26 Version Navigator Previous version Next version November 7, 2020 November 26, 2020 The November 20, 2020 update, also known as the PvP update, introduced PvP, three new villagers along with their respective currencies, and more.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  PvP Alpha [ ]  Began PvP Alpha event. Added PvP Island . Added PVP Alpha Trophy which can be purchased from the Mercenary . (Limited time) Added Mercenary villager along with quests.  Flowers [ ]  Added Fulco along with quests. Added Daffodil flower which can be unlocked through Fulco. Added Pottery Bench to craft flower pots which can be purchased through the Florist.  Desert [ ]  Added Cactus crop. Added Cactus Spike sword. Added a city with nomads on Desert Island . Added quests to Azur . Added Desert Chest . Added Desert Furnace .  Currencies [ ]  Added Sand Dollars which can be obtained from Azur . Added Petals which can be obtained from Fulco . Added Skulls which can be obtained from the Mercenary .  Modifications [ ]  Vending Machines [ ]  Vending Machines now have a 10% tax on all transactions. Increased vending machine max stack size to 300. Increased vending machine max transaction price to $1B. Added commas to vending machine display prices. Added direct input for vending machine price. Added "2x" deposit button to help for large prices.  Other [ ]  Revamped Quest system. Crops now grow while the player is offline. The Hub will no longer be too bright during certain times of the day. Skorp animations now work correctly and are improved. Improved general island loading time for slower devices. Removed "Go Home" button in hub on phones.
