title: November_26_2020
content: November 26, 2020 Basic Information Day released November 26th, 2020 Version number 27 Version Navigator Previous version Next version November 20, 2020 December 11, 2020  The November 26, 2020 update is a minor content update in Islands. It introduced a few changes to private servers as well as started the Roblox Battles scavenger hunt event.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Roblox Battles Event [ ]  Added Roblox Battles event, talk to the Scavenger to complete the event. Added Scavenger villager that spawns at the portal of the Player's Island . Added Roblox Battles Trophy . Added the Islands RB Battles Championship Badge .  Modifications [ ]  Private Servers [ ]  Private servers now have a private Hub and mob islands. Teleporting to the Hub will no longer unload the player's island on private servers. Multiple islands can now be loaded on private servers (as long as they are within a server block limit). Re-enabled the default player list on private servers, hubs and published islands  Islands update history 2020 April April 10 • April 24 • April 27 May May 2 • May 4 • May 7 • May 10 • May 17 • May 26 • May 31 June June 15 • June 26 July July 4 • July 11 • July 17 • July 25 August August 2 • August 9 • August 16 • August 30 September September 6 • September 18 October October 3 • October 16 November November 1 • November 7 • November 20 • November 26 December December 11 • December 18 2021 January January 4 • January 22 • January 29 February Feburary 5 • Feburary 12 • Feburary 19 • Feburary 26 March March 5 • March 13 • March 19 April April 4 • April 10 • April 16 • April 24 May May 8 • May 21 June June 4 • June 30 July July 9 • July 17 • July 23 • July 30 August August 8 • August 15 • August 21 • August 28 September September 5 • September 11 • September 18 • September 25 October October 9 • October 18 November November 13 • November 27 December December 10 • December 18 • December 29 2022 January January 8 • January 15 • January 30 February February 7 • February 19 • February 27 March March 6 • March 12 • March 25 April April 1 • April 9 • April 16 • April 22 • April 29 May May 13 • May 20 • May 27 June June 3 • June 10 • June 18 • June 25 July July 2 • July 9 • July 16 • July 23 • July 30 August August 6 • August 13 • August 20 • August 27 September September 3 • September 10 • September 17 • September 24 October October 1 • October 8 • October 15 • October 22 • October 28 November November 4 • November 11 • November 18 • November 25 December December 2 • December 16 • December 23 2023 January January 6 • January 20 February February 3 • February 17 March March 3 • March 17 • March 31 April April 14 • April 28 May May 12 • May 26 June June 23 July July 7 • July 21 August August 18 October October 13 November November 7 Discontinuation

title: November_27_2021
content: November 27, 2021 Basic Information Day released November 27, 2021 Version number 63 Version Navigator Previous version Next version November 13, 2021 December 10, 2021 The November 27, 2021 update, also known as the maple isles update, is an update in Islands that revamped the Maple Isles and added new maple-themed items and blocks .  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Re-added and revamped the Maple Isles (formerly Turkey Island ) Added four new villagers : Emma Bailey Don Kontos Added Turkeys Added Raspberries Added Raspberry Seeds Added a new boss, Fhanhorn Fhanhorn's summon cooldown is now cannot be bypassed with tokens due to no tokens Added Maple Workbench Added Turkey Spawn Egg Added Fhanhorn Pet Spawn Egg Added Berry Basket Added Industrial Berry Basket Added Tree Tap Added Maple Sap Added Maple Syrup Added Maple Syrup Bottle Added Sap Boiler Added Syrup Bottler Added Pancake Dough Added Pancakes Berry Pancakes Sweet Pancakes Fhanhorn's Pancakes Added Wood Tube Added Wood Tube Merger Added Maple Shield Added Antler Shield Added Antler Hammer Added Turkey Trophy Added Fhanhorn's Flower Added new furniture blocks: Cornucopia Bed Turkey Couch Maple Couch Vanilla Turkey Bean Bag Maple Turkey Bean Bag Chocolate Turkey Bean Bag  Modifications [ ]  Slightly nerfed cooking yield from skill level (maximum of +1.3 to +1) Increased the spawn rate of buffalkors on Buffalkor Island Removed quests for Cletus and Taliyah  November 28, 2021 [ ]  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed an issue with unlocking the recipe for Fhanhorn's pancakes. Fixed raspberry bushes getting destroyed when using sickle .  November 29, 2021 [ ]  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed a bug which would cause items to be stuck on conveyors . Fixed the industrial berry basket. Fixed black particles on many blocks and tools. Fixed Underworld spell particles not disappearing. Fixed dialogue popup with villagers . Fixed random seats around the Hub . Fixed bugged treasure spots on treasure maps . Reduced lag in the Hub. title: November_4_2022
content: November 4, 2022 Basic Information Day released November 4, 2022 Version number 106 Version Navigator Previous version Next version October 28, 2022 November 11, 2022 The November 4, 2022 update, also known as the pet egg stand update, is a minor update in Islands that concluded the Halloween 2022 event, added pet egg stands , and other small changes.  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added pet egg stands . Added large diamond chests . Added expanded diamond chests . Added DV plushies . Re-added Cletus .  Modifications [ ]  Concluded the Halloween 2022 event. Halloween event items are now tradable . Players will be teleported when the last island owner leaves their island, instead of after their island unloads. Island owners can now toggle off builder/owner icon renders in the permissions menu. Vending machines now retain the purchase amount without resetting back to one. Increased load time for owner icons when loading in. Increased the sell price of pumpkins from 52 coins to 58 coins. Decreased the sell price of cacti from 30 coins to 25 coins. Removed Tom .  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed bug causing visitors to lose items when island owners disconnect.  November 6, 2022 [ ]  Players now instantaneously teleport back to their island if the owner of the island they're on leaves the game or teleports away. title: November_7_2020
content: November 7, 2020 Basic Information Day released November 7th, 2020 Version number 25 Version Navigator Previous version Next version November 1, 2020 November 20, 2020 The November 7 update, more commonly known as the Build Limit+ update, was an update for Islands. This update brought an increased block limit, the Randomizer item, and the Desert Nomad NPC.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Items & Blocks [ ]  Added Randomizer .  Desert Island [ ]  Added Desert Nomad . Added dinosaur bones. Added a well that serves no purpose.  GUI [ ]  Added health bar above hotbar GUI.  Modifications [ ]  Building [ ]  Block Limit increased from 50,000 to 70,000 blocks per island.  Hub [ ]  Fixed odd rotation of Aquamarine and Coral .  Flower [ ]  Rejoining or watering flowers no longer resets flower breeding time. Improved flower watering effect. Picking up a flower plays an animation. Fixed picking up crocuses & daffodils. Cross-breeding flowers now always spawn a new flower.  Other [ ]  Improved fishing mechanics. Added fish animations. Hold click on food to keep eating. Removed 50B coin limit. title: Noxious_Stinger
content: Noxious Stinger Type Light Melee Physical class Piercing Magical class Toxin Attack damage 63 HP (Base/Throw) +32 HP (Critical) 8 - 15 HP per tick (Poison) Recipe 2 Skorp Serpent's Tooth 8 Skorp Serpent's Scale 12 Bone 10 Steel Ingot 5 Gilded Steel Rod Crafted with Anvil Required skill Level 55 Light Melee Description A very pointy spear. A noxious stinger is a light melee weapon in the piercing and toxin classes.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Noxious Stinger 2 Skorp Serpent's Tooth 8 Skorp Serpent's Scale 12 Bone 10 Steel Ingot 5 Gilded Steel Rod Anvil Level 55 Light Melee  Behavior [ ]  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Light Melee , the noxious stinger deals a base damage of 63 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. There is a small chance this weapon does a critical hit, meaning the attack will do an extra 32 HP of damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Light Melee skill and it is in the piercing and toxin classes.  Poison damage [ ]  There is a 20% - 40% chance that a mob will take poison damage after being hit. 8 - 15 damage will be dealt every 0.3 seconds 11 times, resulting in 88 - 165 additional damage points dealt.  Throwing [ ]  The noxious stinger can be thrown to attack mobs out of the player's reach by holding left click. This feature has a cooldown of 2 seconds.  History [ ]  March 17, 2023 Added noxious stingers.  Trivia [ ]  It is the first and only spear weapon in Islands . It is the third-strongest weapon in the game, with the second being the serpent's bane and the strongest being the reaper's scythe . When lagging, noxious stingers can make hostile mobs "fly". This is because the poison damage is being registered as having knockback. The Skorp Stinger from BedWars is based off this weapon.  This weapon is considered to be the best weapon by the community, due to it's high attack power and ranged ability.  It is the strongest Light Melee weapon.

title: No_images
content: Blocks are placeable objects that exist outside the player's inventory . Players can use blocks to build up their island .  List of blocks [ ]  Technical blocks [ ]  Technical blocks are blocks which serve various purposes during events within the game, or are unreleased/unused in-game. These blocks cannot be obtained in the player's inventory through gameplay and can only be spawned in through the use of exploits or by a developer.

title: Nutcracker
content: Nutcracker Red Green Blue Type of block Solid block Best tool Luminous Transparent The nutcracker is a furniture block that has a chance to be obtained from Christmas present 2021s . It comes in three color variants: red, green, and blue.  Obtaining [ ]  Christmas presents [ ]  Opening a Christmas present 2021 has an 18% chance of rewarding a red, green, or blue nutcracker.  Breaking [ ]  Nutcracker Breaking Data Hardness 5 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 8 Wooden 15 15 Stone 8 8 Iron 5 5 Gilded Steel 4 4 Diamond 3 3 Opal 2 2 Void Mattock 1  History [ ]  December 29, 2021 Added nutcrackers.

title: Oak_Tree
content: Oak Tree Oak Tree 1 Oak Tree 2 Oak Tree 3 Type Oak Tree Sapling Cost 50 coins Growth Duration 90 seconds The oak tree is a type of tree in game. Each player starts with 3 of these trees when they start the game. It drops Oak Wood and an Oak Sapling when chopped down or 2 leaves when harvested with leaf clippers .  Like any other species of trees, it must be placed 7 or more blocks away from another tree to grow.  Drops [ ]  When chopped, it drops:  3 - 4 Oak Wood 1 Sapling  When harvested by leaf clippers , it drops:  2 Leaves  Breaking [ ]  Oak Tree Breaking Data Hardness 8 Best Tool Axe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 12 Wooden 12 24 Stone 8 13 Iron 5 8 Gilded Steel 4 6 Diamond 3 4 Opal 2 4 Void Mattock 2  Trivia [ ]  Unlike most trees, the oak tree can grow into different shapes. The oak tree was originally known as the starter tree.

title: Oak_Walkway
content: Oak Walkway Type of block Solid block Recipe 1 Oak Plank Crafted with Furniture Workbench Best tool Luminous Transparent  Oak walkways are furniture blocks that can be crafted in a furniture workbench . It was added in the January 4, 2021 Furniture update.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  The crafting ratio is one plank to one walkway. title: Obby_Checkpoint
content: Obby Checkpoint Type of block Non-solid block; Interactable Recipe 10 Oak Wood 1 Blue Flower Crafted with Obby Kit Best tool Luminous Transparent  The Obby Checkpoint was added in the August 16, 2020 update. It is used to add checkpoints to in-game obbies, built on Player Islands .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Obby checkpoints can be crafted with 1 blue flower and 10 oak wood after the player buys the obby kit gamepass for 399 Robux  Name Recipe Crafting station Gamepass required Obby Checkpoint 1 Blue Flower 10 Oak Wood Obby Kit  Breaking [ ]  Obby Checkpoint Breaking Data Hardness 3 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 5 Wooden 9 5 Stone 5 3 Iron 3 2 Gilded Steel 3 2 Diamond 2 1 Opal 2 1 Void Mattock 1  Usage [ ]  Obbies [ ]  An obby checkpoint is used as a checkpoint so a player would not have to start from the obby start when they fall. Once a player touches this and after they fall into the void or restart, they will respawn on this instead of the obby start or the previous checkpoint.

title: Obby_Finish
content: Obby Finish Type of block Non-solid block; Interactable Recipe 10 Oak Wood 1 Red Flower Crafted with Obby Kit Best tool Luminous Transparent The obby finish is a block used in obbies . It was added in the August 16, 2020 Obby update.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Gamepass required Obby Finish 10 Oak Wood 1 Red Flower Obby Kit  Breaking [ ]  Obby Finish Breaking Data Hardness 1 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 2 Wooden 3 3 Stone 2 2 Iron 1 1 Gilded Steel 1 1 Diamond 1 1 Opal 1 1 Void Mattock 1  Usage [ ]  Obbies [ ]  Obby finishes are used to finish or beat an obby on a Player Island . A player must first touch an obby start , after touching a obby finish the player's time will be counted and added to a nearby obby leaderboard (If the player beat one of the top 3).

title: Obby_Kit
content: Obby Kit Block Gamepass Icon Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 11 Oak Wood Crafted with Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Buy cost (gamepass) 399 Robux Best tool Luminous Transparent Description "Create obby courses with checkpoints and leaderboards." The obby kit is a premium crafting station that is used to craft obby items.  Obtaining [ ]  Purchasing [ ]  Purchasing the obby kit gamepass will grant the player with one obby kit and access to use the crafting station.  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Gamepass required Obby Kit 11 Oak Wood Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Usage [ ]  Crafting recipes [ ]  Image Name Recipe Obby Leaderboard 40 Maple Wood 5 Gold Ingot Obby Checkpoint 1 Blue Flower 10 Oak Wood Obby Finish 1 Red Flower 10 Oak Wood Obby Start 1 Yellow Flower 10 Oak Wood  History [ ]  August 16, 2020 Added obby kits. July 23, 2021 Changed the crafting recipe from 10 oak wood to 11 wood.

title: Obby_Leaderboard
content: Obby Leaderboard Type of block Solid block Recipe 40 Maple Wood 5 Gold Ingot Crafted with Obby Kit Best tool Luminous Transparent  The obby leaderboard is a block used for obbies , built on Player Islands . It was added in the August 16, 2020 Obby update. It is used to display the top three players who beat an obby the fastest.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Gamepass required Obby Leaderboard 40 Maple Wood 5 Gold Ingot Obby Kit  Breaking [ ]  Obby Leaderboard Breaking Data Hardness 4 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 6 Wooden 12 12 Stone 7 7 Iron 4 4 Gilded Steel 3 3 Diamond 2 2 Opal 2 2 Void Mattock 1  Usage [ ]  Obbies [ ]  When a player completes an obby by touching an obby finish the time it took them to get from the obby start to the finish is calculated and if it is less then one of the top three on the leaderboard it is added to the list. Gold is first place, Silver is second, and bronze third. To reset the leaderboard break the obby start, breaking the leaderboard will NOT reset it.  Trivia [ ]  Like all obby blocks, this can be used/placed by any player.

title: Obby_Start
content: Obby Start Type of block Non-solid block; Interactable Recipe 10 Oak Wood 1 Yellow Flower Crafted with Obby Kit Best tool Luminous Transparent Description Starting flag for an obby. The obby start is a block used as a start point for obbies on player islands .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Obby Start 10 Oak Wood 1 Yellow Flower Obby Kit  Breaking [ ]  Obby Start Breaking Data Hardness 1 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 2 Wooden 3 3 Stone 2 2 Iron 1 1 Gilded Steel 1 1 Diamond 1 1 Opal 1 1 Void Mattock 1  Usage [ ]  Obbies [ ]  The obby start can be used as a start point for obbies. Once touched, a timer is started and will stop when an obby finish is touched. If players have not reached an obby checkpoint , they will respawn at the obby start.  History [ ]  August 16, 2020 Added obby starts.

title: Obsidian
content: Obsidian Obsidian Rock Type of block Solid block Dropped by Magma Blob Magma Golem Spawns Pirate Island Underworld Best tool Luminous Transparent Description A strong rock found only in the hottest places. Obsidian is a block that can be obtained by mining obsidian rocks on Pirate Island or the Underworld .  Obtaining [ ]  Mining [ ]  Obsidian rocks naturally spawn on Pirate Island's Volcano and throughout the Underworld . Mining an obsidian rock grants the player 2 - 3 obsidian and 9 Mining XP (18 with the 4x daily bonus) per stage, resulting in a total of 4 - 6 obsidian and 39 Mining XP (78 with the 4x daily bonus) per full rock. The rock has a 4% chance to yield a crystallized obsidian when the rock gets fully broken.  Totems [ ]  An obsidian totem will spawn obsidian rocks in a 5 block radius. After the totem has spawned 6 obsidian rocks or has run out of space, the totem will begin to mine the rocks and hold rewards equivalent to a half of an ore rock, which can be collected by interacting with the totem.  An obsidian totem placed next to a conveyor belt will drop obsidian onto the conveyor belt.  Mob drop [ ]  Magma blobs and magma golems have a 20% chance of dropping obsidian upon defeat.  Breaking [ ]  Obsidian Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 9 Stone 10 6 Iron 6 4 Gilded Steel 5 3 Diamond 3 2 Opal 3 2 Void Mattock 2 Obsidian Rock Breaking Data Hardness 75 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 113 Wooden 225 113 Stone 120 75 Iron 75 47 Gilded Steel 53 38 Diamond 38 23 Opal 30 15 Void Mattock 15  Usage [ ]  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Respawn Block 10 Magma Block 5 Crystallized Obsidian 20 Obsidian Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  History [ ]  July 17, 2021 Added obsidian. September 11, 2021 Obsidian can now be dropped from defeating magma blobs . October 9, 2021 Obsidian can now be obtained from obsidian totems . July 2, 2022 Obsidian can now be used to craft void blocks . July 23, 2022 Obsidian can now be dropped from defeating magma golems .

title: Obsidian_Greatsword
content: Obsidian Greatsword Type Heavy Melee Physical class Slashing Attack damage 24 HP (Base) +12 HP (Critical) Recipe 1 Obsidian Hilt 6 Crystallized Obsidian Crafted with Anvil Required skill Level 36 Heavy Melee Description A very heavy sword The obsidian greatsword is a heavy melee weapon in the slashing class.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Obsidian Greatsword 1 Obsidian Hilt 6 Crystallized Obsidian Anvil Level 36 Heavy Melee  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Heavy Melee , the obsidian greatsword deals a base damage of 24 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing and deals moderate knockback. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal an extra 12 HP of damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Heavy Melee skill and it is in the slashing class.  History [ ]  July 17, 2021 Added obsidian greatswords. September 17, 2022 Obsidian greatswords are now a slashing weapon. October 1, 2022 Changed the model of obsidian greatswords.

title: October_1_2022
content: October 1, 2022 Basic Information Day released October 1, 2022 Version number 101 Version Navigator Previous version Next version September 24, 2022 October 8, 2022 The October 1, 2022 update, also known as the weapon remodel update, is a minor update in Islands that added new quests , re-added auctions , and remodeled many weapons .  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added 5 new quests .  Modifications [ ]  Changed the model of the aquamarine sword , obsidian greatsword , obsidian hilt , antler hammer , rageblade , the captain's rapier , spellbook , and the tidal spellbook . Quinn now hosts auctions again. Increased the bee limit on player islands from six to ten. Increased the sell price of pineapples from 92 coins to 96 coins. Decreased the sell price of tomatoes from 9 coins to 4 coins.  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed a bug that prevented the number of arrows available to update. Fixed a bug that prevented the bow button on mobile from disappearing. Fixed a few weapon renders in the hotbar . Fixed an issue where quests would not count as completed after completion. Quests now correctly display their complete timer.  October 5, 2022 [ ]  Modifications [ ]  Temporarily disabled trading . title: October_16_2020
content: October 16, 2020 Basic Information Day released October 16th, 2020 Version number 23 Version Navigator Previous version Next version October 3, 2020 November 1, 2020 The Halloween update was released on October 16th, 2020 . This update is known for adding the Grand High Witch , along with 4 others, the witch trophy, a seasonal theme for the Town and a new Pumpkin crop. This is also the first update to be sponsored, with it being sponsored by HBO Max . This update was the first to include limited items and the first to be sponsored by a company.  Changes [ ]  Added [ ]  Witches are now in the game. The Grand High Witch is also the first boss mob to be added in the game. When beaten, you earn a new trophy for decoration. This coincides with the sponsored event that started when this update was released. A new potion called Formula 86 is also brewable, which is needed to beat the boss. 4 new hostile mobs are also added. These mobs are the Skeleton , the Armored Skeleton , the Pump , and the Pump King . When slaying the Pump and Pump King mobs, pumpkin seeds can be obtained. These seeds were only obtainable during the Halloween Event, until the Seasons update, when they were made obtainable again. Jack O' Lanterns are now available to be crafted. The Town now has a temporary Halloween theme, and the Mobs Islands are darker. title: October_22_2022
content: October 22, 2022 Basic Information Day released October 22, 2022 Version number 104 Version Navigator Previous version Next version October 15, 2022 October 28, 2022 The October 22, 2022 update, also known as the Halloween Event Update II, is a minor update in Islands added the spider pet , the spider candle mob, and many quality of life changes.  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added spider pets. Added spider pet spawn eggs . Added spider candles . Added scarecrows .  Modifications [ ]  Modified arrows. Arrows can now be purchased from Ivon . Arrows now have a chance to be returned after usage. Arrows that didn't hit an enemy after usage will be returned. Added a hotkey for mounts (C). Added icons next to regular cauldrons to differentiate from opened cauldrons . Coffins now have seats. Ghosts now float if the block beneath them was broken. Reduced the amount of Zombie Cletus tokens given from ember skulls . Zombie Cletus can now summon spider candles as one of his attacks. Other players can no longer break cauldrons that have rewarded trade-locked items displayed. Modified the collisions for butterfly event archways , skull gates , and fire chalices . Increased the sell price of cactus from 30 coins to 35 coins. Decreased the sell price of plums from 50 coins to 46 coins. Improved UI and SFX.  Bug fixes [ ]  Fixed a bug that caused higher-rarity fish to be unable to fished. Fixed a bug that caused players to access Fhanhorn 's battle arena after jumping into the void. Fixed a bug that allowed players to reach infinite damage with weapons. Fixed a bug that caused wooden mallets and granite hammers to not swing properly. Fixed a bug were mobs wouldn't drop items after being defeated. Fixed quests not advancing after completing "Defeat mobs" tasks. Fixed a bug that caused mounts to break multiple equipping and idle animations for weapons.  October 23, 2022 [ ]  Cauldrons now allow players to collect trade-locked items. Untradeable items can now be stored in storage blocks. Added a red padlock icon next to untradeable blocks that are inside storage blocks. Fixed a bug that caused players to input trade-locked items inside trash cans . Fixed a bug that allowed other players to take out items that are inside of the trash can. title: October_3_2020
content: October 3, 2020 Basic Information Day released October 3rd, 2020 Version number 22 Version Navigator Previous version Next version September 18, 2020 October 16, 2020 The October 2, 2020/October 3, 2020 update, or more commonly known as the Cows update, is an update in Islands. Although the update was planned to release on October 2nd it was delayed and actually released at 1:10 AM October 3rd PST. This update brings cows along with farm items. The update also brought a new industrial machine as well as a new ingot.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Items & Blocks [ ]  Added Gold Deposit . Added new weapon Rageblade along with the Rageblade Blueprint which is dropped from Buffalkors . Added Red Bronze Ingot Added Cheese Added Bucket that can be turned into a Milk Bucket when milking a cow.  NPC's [ ]  Added Taliyah who can be found near a barn on the Mainland .  Machines [ ]  Added Red Bronze Refinery to make Red Bronze Ingots  Animals & Farming [ ]  Added Cows Added Cheesemaker Added Wheat Trough Added Hay Bed Added Animal Well-being Kit Added Animal Bench  Modifications and bug fixes [ ]  Deposit islands spawn closer to your main island . title: October_8_2022
content: October 8, 2022 Basic Information Day released October 8, 2022 Version number 102 Version Navigator Previous version Next version October 1, 2022 October 15, 2022 The October 8, 2022 update, also known as the magic status effect update, is an update in Islands that added status effects to Magic weapons .  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added new status effects for Magic weapons : Burning ( Inferno ). Area of Effect ( Hydro ). Shock ( Storm ). Slowness ( Quake ). Healing ( Ethereal ). Weakness ( Void ).  Modifications [ ]  Changed the classes of some weapons: Ruby swords are no longer an ethereal weapon . Changed the ruby staff's magical type from ethereal to quake . Changed the Slime Queen's scepter magical type from quake to ethereal. Changed the model of the captain's rapier in the inventory and tool stands . Auctions now properly return correct bids. Increased the bee limit on player islands from ten to 12. Increased the bee hive limit on player islands from two to four. Vending machines now display "$" to depict the currency rather than " coins ". Using the spirit spellbook and ruby staff no longer heals the player. Increased the sell price of starfruit from 60 coins to 67 coins. Decreased the sell price of onions from 30 coins to 25 coins. title: Odlum
content: Odlum Location Pirate Island Purpose Offers quests that reward Doubloons Occupation Fisherman Pirate Odlum is a villager that offers quests to the player and purchases fish exclusive to Pirate Island . He was added in the July 17, 2021 update.  Shop [ ]  Selling [ ]  Image Name Sell Price Puffer Fish 50 coins Shark 1,000 coins  Quests [ ]  Upon completion, Doubloons can be claimed by the player when they return to Odlum.  Quest Reward Capture 3 puffer fish . 5 Doubloons Catch 10 fish from the Pirate Island Rivers. 10 Doubloons Capture 1 sharks [sic] . 5 Doubloons  Dialogue [ ]  Pirate Island [ ]  On the Pirate Island, Odlum will say this:  "Caught any fish for me, user ?" >View Shop End and opens shop. >View Quests End and opens quests.  Fishing Festival 2022 [ ]  At the Fishing Festival Island during the Fishing Festival 2022 , Odlum will say this:  "Y'arr, fishin' be me fav'rit thing ta do. Bring me tickets, 'n I'll reward ye for pleasin' an ol' pirate." >Redeem Tickets End and opens fishing festival shop. >View Shop End and opens shop.  History [ ]  July 17, 2021 Added Odlum. May 13, 2022 Introduced a bug that prevented Odlum's quests from saving. Removed Odlum's blank fourth quest slot. May 14, 2022 Fixed a bug that prevented Odlum's quests from saving. June 3, 2022 Removed Odlum's quests. July 23, 2022 Added Odlum to the Fishing Festival Island during the Fishing Festival 2022 event.

title: Oil
content: Oil may refer to:  Items [ ]  Oil Fuel ; a liquid item Oil Barrel ; a barrel of oil fuel Oil Resource Deed ; a deed that spawns an oil deposit  Blocks [ ]  Oil Deposit ; an oil source block Oil Refinery ; a machine used to turn oil fuel into petroleum fuel

title: Oily_Crops_(villager)
content: Oily Crops Location None (Formerly Hub ) Purpose Buys oily crops Oily Crops is a villager that was formerly located on the Hub before being removed in the February 26, 2021 update. Players could directly sell their oily crops to the villager instead of having to wash them and sell to Tom .  Shop [ ]  Image Name Sell price Oily Tomato 3 coins Oily Potato 4 coins Oily Carrot 10 coins Oily Onion 12 coins Oily Starfruit 20 coins  Trivia [ ]  Even though oily starfruit is not obtainable, the villager still had an option to sell oily starfruit. From October 9, 2021 to an unknown update, players were able to sell oily crops to him in the industrial merchant teleseller for 70% - 90% of the original profit.

title: Oil_Barrel
content: Oil Barrel Recipe 6 Oil Fuel Crafted with Fuel Barrel Filler Sell price 500 coins An oil barrel is an item that can be obtained by pumping oil into a fuel barrel filler .  Obtaining [ ]  Transforming [ ]  Oil barrels can be obtained by pumping oil through pipes into a fuel barrel filler . The oil barrels are outputted to the back of the industrial machine and onto a conveyor belt .  Input Item transformer Output 6 Oil Fuel ➡ Fuel Barrel Filler ➡ 1 Oil Barrel  Usage [ ]  Selling [ ]  Oil barrels can be sold to Doug for 500 coins each.  Transforming [ ]  Input Item transformer Output 1 Oil Barrel ➡ Fuel Barrel Extractor ➡ 6 Oil Fuel  History [ ]  August 15, 2021 Added oil barrels. August 16, 2021 Oil barrels can now be sold to Doug .

title: Oil_Deposit
content: Oil Deposit Type of block Solid block Spawns Resource Island Best tool Luminous Transparent An oil deposit is a resource block which generates in oil resource islands spawned using an oil resource deed .  Spawning [ ]  Resource islands [ ]  One temporary oil deposit naturally generates as part of oil resource islands spawned using oil resource deeds . Oil resource deeds will only spawn an oil resource island provided that a workbench tier 4 is present on their island and the limit of 15 resource islands of any kind has not been reached.  Breaking [ ]  Breaking an oil deposit will not drop the actual block nor will it drop any items.  Oil Deposit Breaking Data Hardness 100 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 150 Wooden 300 150 Stone 160 100 Iron 100 63 Gilded Steel 70 50 Diamond 50 30 Opal 40 20 Void Mattock 20  Pumping [ ]  Placing a pumpjack on top of an oil deposit and fueling it with coal or petrified petroleum will provide a constant supply of 1 oil fuel every 5 seconds. Oil deposits will run dry after producing 5,000 units of oil fuel.  Any natural oil resource islands spawned prior to the June 3, 2022 update will have an oil deposit with 12,000 units of oil fuel that is pumped out 3.3x slower than one spawned using an oil resource deed.  History [ ]  August 15, 2021 Added oil deposits. August 16, 2021 Oil resource islands can now be spawned using an oil resource deed . June 3, 2022 Oil resource islands no longer naturally spawn. June 10, 2022 Fixed a bug that prevented oil deposits from spawning when using an oil resource deed . Changed the limit of oil resource islands from two to 15 resource islands of any kind.

title: Oil_Fuel
content: Oil Fuel Recipe 1 Oil Barrel Crafted with Fuel Barrel Extractor Oil fuel is a liquid item that can be pumped out of an oil deposit using a pumpjack .  Obtaining [ ]  Pumping [ ]  Oil fuel can be pumped out of oil deposits by placing a pumpjack on top of the resource block and then powering it with coal or petrified petroleum . A player's original deposits will vanish after being pumped of 12,000 units of oil fuel, while any deposit spawned with a deed will vanish after 5,000 units of oil fuel have been pumped.  You cannot obtain the item itself as you can only obtain it through a glitch or exploits.  Transforming [ ]  Input Item transformer Output 1 Oil Barrel ➡ Fuel Barrel Extractor ➡ 6 Oil Fuel  Usage [ ]  Transforming [ ]  Input Item transformer Output 6 Oil Fuel ➡ Fuel Barrel Filler ➡ 1 Oil Barrel 1 Oil Fuel ➡ Oil Refinery ➡ 1 Petroleum Fuel  History [ ]  August 15, 2021 Added oil fuel. March 17, 2023 Oil fuels can now be used to craft quills . Oil fuels are no longer used to craft quills.

title: Oil_Refinery
content: Oil Refinery Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 10 Red Bronze Ingot 30 Steel Rod Crafted with Workbench Tier 4 Best tool Luminous Transparent An oil refinery is an industrial item transformer used to convert oil fuel into petroleum fuel .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Oil Refinery 10 Red Bronze Ingot 30 Steel Rod Workbench Tier 4  Breaking [ ]  Oil Refinery Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 9 Stone 10 6 Iron 6 4 Gilded Steel 5 3 Diamond 3 2 Opal 3 2 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Transforming [ ]  Oil refineries can be used to convert oil fuel into petroleum fuel . The oil refinery has one slot that can only hold up one oil fuel at a time, which must be inputted through the left input pipe at the front. The refinery, along with the petroleum petrifier , fuel barrel filler , and fuel barrel extractor , does not require fuel. As a result, the back conveyor belt currently serves no practical purpose. It takes 10 seconds to convert oil fuel into petroleum, which is then exported through the right pipe at the front.  Input Output 1 Oil Fuel ➡ 1 Petroleum Fuel  History [ ]  August 15, 2021 Added oil refineries. ? The oil refinery no longer needs to be fueled with coal or petrified petroleum to function.

title: Oil_Resource_Deed
content: Oil Resource Deed Buy cost 500,000 coins Description Creates a temporary oil resource deposit on your island, 3.3x faster than a regular deposit, capable of producing 5,000 units of oil. An oil resource deed is an item that can be bought from Doug . It cannot be dropped, traded , or put in vending machines and chests .  Obtaining [ ]  Purchasing [ ]  An oil resource deed can be bought for 500,000 coins from Doug , located in the Hub . The player can buy one every 4 hours.  Usage [ ]  Creating oil resources [ ]  Oil resource deeds create an oil resource island with a temporary oil deposit that produces 5.000 units of oil before depleting and disappearing. The resource island can be spawned by holding down with the deed equipped in the hotbar . The deed will only create the resource island if the player has a workbench tier 4 placed on their island and has not reached the max of 15 resource islands already.  History [ ]  August 15, 2021 Added oil field deeds. August 16, 2021 Changed the model of oil field deeds. Renamed oil field deeds to "Oil Resource Deed." Oil resource deeds are now sold by Doug . June 3, 2022 Purchasing an oil resource deed from Doug no longer immediately spawns an oil resource island . Oil resource deeds are now the only way to obtain an oil deposit Oil resource deeds can now be collected into the player's inventory . Oil resource deeds no longer function as intended and cannot spawn an oil resource island. June 10, 2022 Fixed a bug that caused oil resource deeds to not work. Oil resource deeds will only spawn an oil resource island if there are less than 15 resource islands on the player's island .

title: Oil_Tank
content: Oil Tank Type of block Solid block Recipe 100 Glass Block 100 Steel Ingot Crafted with Workbench Tier 4 Best tool Luminous Transparent  An oil tank is a block used to store oil .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Oil Tank 100 Glass Block 100 Steel Ingot Workbench Tier 4  Breaking [ ]  Oil Tank Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 9 Stone 10 6 Iron 6 4 Gilded Steel 5 3 Diamond 3 2 Opal 3 2 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Storing [ ]  Oil tanks are used to store oil and can hold 300 oil fuel per tank. Oil can be inputted in through the pipe at the front and outputted through the pipe at the back, functioning similarly to the input/output chest .  History [ ]  August 15, 2021 Added oil tanks.

title: Onion
content: Onion Onion Oily Seed cost 2,000 coins Planted on Farmland Sell price 30 coins Required skill Level 31 Farming (to sell) Oily description A crop that is covered in motor oil. Must be washed before selling Edible An onion is a crop that grows on farmland from onion seeds .  Obtaining [ ]  Harvesting [ ]  Harvesting an onion plant yields 1 - 3 onions, 1 - 2 onion seeds , and 15 Farming XP (63 XP with the 4x daily bonus). The chance of obtaining more than one onion per plant is increased by the player's Farming level and for owners of the VIP gamepass . The 5% chance of obtaining an extra onion seed is increased for owners of the pro gamepass .  Totems [ ]  An onion totem will collect and replant onions in a 3-block radius, which can then be collected by interacting it. An onion totem placed next to a conveyor belt will drop the onions onto the conveyor, but doing so will make them oily. This process cannot yield extra onion seeds.  Washing [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Onion 1 Oily Onion Washing Station  Input Item transformer Output 1 Oily Onion ➡ Industrial Washing Station ➡ 1 Onion  Growth [ ]  The growth time of onions can be shortened by 20% when watered with a watering can or basic sprinkler , or fertilized with basic fertilizer . If watered and fertilized, the growth time will be shortened by 30%.  Onion Growth Phases Phase 0 Phase 1 Phase 2 Phase 3 Time since planted 0m 0s 1m 40s 3m 20s 4m 50s Note: The durations of time above are on an unfertilized and unwatered plant Onion Growth Time Type Growth Time Normal 4m 50s Fertilized 3m 52s Watered 3m 52s Watered + Fertilized 3m 23s  Usage [ ]  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Tomato Soup 8 Tomato Sauce 4 Onion 1 Milk Bucket Cooking Table Food Processor Level 36 Cooking  Crate-packing [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Crate of Onions 100 Onion Crate Packer Large Crate of Onions 250 Onion Tier 2 Crate Packer  Eating [ ]  Eating an onion restores 8 HP.  Selling [ ]  Onions can be sold to Cletus for 30 coins each.  History [ ]  April 10, 2020 Added onions. May 10, 2020 Changed the sell price of onions from 35 coins to 30 coins . June 15, 2020 Added oily onions. Onions will now become oily when dropped onto a conveyor belt from a totem . Onions can now be obtained by washing oily onions. January 22, 2021 Onions now grant 15 Farming XP when harvested. Onions now require level 31 Farming to be sold to Tom . February 26, 2021 Oily onions can no longer be sold for coins . June 4, 2021 Onions can be packed into crates of onions . August 15, 2021 Onions can be packed into large crates of onions . June 3, 2022 Onions can now be sold to Cletus instead of Tom . August 27, 2022 Changed the sell price of onions from 30 coins to 24 coins . ? Changed the sell price of onions from 24 coins to 30 coins . October 8, 2022 Changed the sell price of onions from 30 coins to 25 coins . October 15, 2022 Onions can now be sold to Tom instead of Cletus. November 4, 2022 Onions can now be sold to Cletus instead of Tom.  Trivia [ ]  The name of the item in-game is "Onions". This was the highest-selling crop before starfruit was added.

title: Onion_Seeds
content: Onion Seeds Planted on Farmland Buy cost 2000 coins Required skill Level 31 Farming Onion seeds are seeds that can be grown into onions .  Obtaining [ ]  Purchasing [ ]  Onion seeds can be purchased from Cletus in the Hub for 2,000 coins each after reaching level 31 Farming .  Harvesting [ ]  Harvesting an onion crop will give 1 - 3 onion and 1 onion seed, with a 5% chance of getting an additional seed. This chance is increased with higher Farming levels and to owners of the pro gamepass .  Usage [ ]  Planting [ ]  Onion seeds can be planted on farmland to be grown into onions.  Growth [ ]  The growth time of onions can be shortened by 20% when watered with a watering can or basic sprinkler , or fertilized with basic fertilizer . If watered and fertilized, the growth time will be shortened by 30%.  Onion Seeds Growth Phases Phase 0 Phase 1 Phase 2 Phase 3 Time since planted 0m 0s 1m 40s 3m 20s 4m 50s Note: The durations of time above are on an unfertilized and unwatered plant Onion Seeds Growth Time Type Growth Time Normal 4m 50s Fertilized 3m 52s Watered 3m 52s Watered + Fertilized 3m 23s  History [ ]  April 10, 2020 Added onion seeds. January 22, 2021 Level 31 Farming is now required to purchase onion seeds. October 15, 2022 Onion seeds can now be purchased from Tom instead of Cletus . November 4, 2022 Onion seeds can now be purchased from Cletus instead of Tom.

title: Opal
content: Opal Opal Rock Dropped by Magma Blob Magma Golem Spawns Underworld Description A beautiful and rare rock. An opal is an item obtained by breaking its respective rock or by defeating magma blobs and magma golems . It is used to craft various opal tools .  Obtaining [ ]  Natural generation [ ]  Opal rocks naturally generate throughout the Underworld . Mining an opal rock yields 1 - 2 opals after each stage and 8 Mining XP (15 with the 4x daily bonus), resulting in a total of 2 - 4 opals and 16 Mining XP (30 with the 4x daily bonus) per rock. 1 - 5 underworld tokens will also be rewarded after mining the entire rock.  Mob drop [ ]  Magma blobs and magma golems have a 10% chance of dropping an opal upon defeat.  Dragon eggs [ ]  Opening an infernal dragon egg has a 23% chance of rewarding 10 - 50 opals, having a rarity of 'common'.  Breaking [ ]  Opal Rock Breaking Data Hardness 50 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 75 Wooden 150 75 Stone 80 50 Iron 50 32 Gilded Steel 35 25 Diamond 25 15 Opal 20 10 Void Mattock 10  Usage [ ]  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Opal Block 10 Opal Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 None Underworld Orb 10 Glass Block 20 Opal 5 Infernal Fish Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Level 55 Combat The Dragonslayer 1 Opal Sword Hilt 60 Opal 100 Iron Ingot Anvil Level 55 Heavy Melee Opal Pickaxe 1 Opal Pickaxe Hilt 50 Opal 100 Iron Ingot Anvil Level 55 Mining Opal Axe 1 Opal Axe Hilt 50 Opal 100 Iron Ingot Anvil Level 55 Woodcutting  History [ ]  September 11, 2021 Added opals. March 25, 2022 Opal can be used to craft opal blocks . April 1, 2022 Decreased spawn rate of opal rocks. April 9, 2022 Opal can now be used to craft Underworld orbs . July 23, 2022 Opals can now be dropped from defeating magma golems .

title: Opened_Cauldron
content: Opened Cauldron 2021 2022 Type of block Solid Block Dropped by Cauldron Best tool Luminous Transparent  An opened cauldron is a storage block that is obtained by opening a cauldron .  Obtaining [ ]  Cauldrons [ ]  After opening and collecting the rewarded item from any cauldron , the cauldron will automatically become an opened cauldron.  Breaking [ ]  Opened Cauldron Breaking Data Hardness 3 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 5 Wooden 9 9 Stone 5 5 Iron 3 3 Gilded Steel 3 3 Diamond 2 2 Opal 2 2 Void Mattock 1  Usage [ ]  Storage [ ]  A used cauldron has 9 slots that can fit up to 90 items per slot, adding up to a total of 810 items per cauldron. title: Opened_Treasure_Chest
content: Opened Treasure Chest Type of block Solid block; Interactable Best tool Luminous Transparent Description An empty treasure chest The opened treasure chest is a storage block that is obtained by opening a treasure chest .  Obtaining [ ]  Treasure chest [ ]  After opening and collecting the rewarded item from a treasure chest , the chest will automatically become an opened treasure chest.  Breaking [ ]  Breaking any type of opened treasure chest will reward the normal opened treasure chest, regardless of island variation.  Opened Treasure Chest Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 18 Stone 10 10 Iron 6 6 Gilded Steel 5 5 Diamond 3 3 Opal 3 3 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Storage [ ]  An opened treasure chest can hold 9 stacks of 60 items, adding up to a maximum of 540 items total.  History [ ]  July 17, 2021 Added opened treasure chests. October 18, 2021 Introduced a bug that caused opened treasure chests to constantly play the sound effect of being presented with an item from a treasure chest . December 10, 2021 Fixed a bug that caused opened treasure chests to constantly play the sound effect of being presented with an item from a treasure chest. December 29, 2021 Disabled manually placing items into opened treasure chests. January 2, 2022 Re-enabled manually placing items into opened treasure chests. January 3, 2022 Disabled manually placing items into opened treasure chests. Re-enabled manually placing items into opened treasure chests. April 29, 2022 Renamed opened Maple Island, Spirit Island, Slime Island, Buffalkor Island, Wizard Island, and Desert Island treasures to opened Maple Isles, Spirit Island, Slime Island, Buffalkor Island, Wizard Island, and Desert Island treasure chests respectively. Breaking an opened Maple Isles, Spirit Island, Slime Island, Buffalkor Island, Wizard Island, or Desert Island treasure chest will now reward an opened treasure chest.

title: Opuntia
content: Opuntia Seed cost 4,200 coins Planted on Farmland Sell price 42 coins Edible An opuntia is a crop that grows on farmland from opuntia seeds .  Obtaining [ ]  Harvesting [ ]  Harvesting a opuntia yields 1 - 3 opuntia, 1 opuntia seed , and 12 Farming XP (48 XP with the 4x daily bonus).  Growth [ ]  The growth time of opuntias can be shortened by 20% when watered with a watering can or basic sprinkler or fertilized with basic fertilizer . If watered and fertilized, the growth time will be shortened by 30%.  Opuntia Growth Phases Phase 0 Phase 1 Phase 2 Phase 3 Time since planted 0m 0s 5s 1m 5s 2m 10s Note: The durations of time above are on an unfertilized and unwatered plant Opuntia Growth Time Type Growth Time Normal 2m 10s Fertilized 1m 44s Watered 1m 44s Watered + Fertilized 1m 31s  Usage [ ]  Selling [ ]  Opuntias can be sold to Maria for 42 coins each.  History [ ]  March 17, 2023 Added opuntias.  Trivia [ ]  Opuntia is the genus name of several flowering cacti.

This chance may be increased for owners of the PRO Gamepass .  Usage [ ]  Planting [ ]  Opuntia seeds can be planted on farmland to grow into opuntias. title: Orange
content: Orange Heals 10 HP Sell price 20 coins Oranges are a fruit crop .  Obtaining [ ]  Harvesting [ ]  Oranges grow every season on orange trees and can be obtained by harvesting the trees. There can be up to three oranges on a tree at a time. When harvested, the player will obtain 1 orange, 6 Farming XP (24 with the 4x daily bonus), and a 3% chance for an additional orange tree sapling .  It takes 5 minutes for an orange to grow and 15 minutes for the three oranges to grow.  Usage [ ]  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Orange Cake Batter 1 Dough 3 Orange Cooking Table Level 25 Cooking Orange Honeycomb 8 Honeycomb 8 Orange Cooking Table Level 65 Cooking  Crate packing [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Crate of Oranges 100 Orange Crate Packer Large Crate of Oranges 250 Orange Tier 2 Crate Packer  Eating [ ]  Oranges can be eaten to restore 10 HP.  Animals [ ]  Oranges can be a cow's , sheep's , or pig's favorite food.  Selling [ ]  Oranges can be sold to Tom in the Hub for 20 coins each.  History [ ]  June 26, 2020 Added oranges. August 30, 2020 Oranges can now be used to craft orange honeycombs . January 22, 2021 Oranges now grant 6 Farming XP when harvested. Oranges can now be a sheep's favorite food. February 5, 2021 Oranges can now be a pig's favorite food. February 26, 2021 Oranges can now be a cow's favorite food. August 21, 2021 Oranges can now be packed into crates and large crates . June 3, 2022 Oranges can now be sold to Cletus instead of to Tom . August 13, 2022 Changed the sell price of oranges from 20 coins to 16 coins. August 20, 2022 Changed the sell price of oranges from 16 coins to 20 coins. October 15, 2022 Oranges can now be sold to Tom instead of Cletus . November 4, 2022 Oranges can now be sold to Cletus again.  Trivia [ ]  If an orange tree is chopped down while having oranges on it, it will only drop its sapling and 3 - 4 oak wood and not any oranges.

title: Orange_Tree
content: Orange Tree Sapling Spring Summer Fall Winter Type of block Solid block Spawns Player's Island Best tool Drops 3 - 4 Oak Wood 1 Orange Tree Sapling Luminous Transparent The orange tree is a fruit tree added in the June 26, 2020 update.  The canopies of orange trees change color based on the current in-game season ; dark green in spring , light green in summer , dark red in fall , and white in winter , but its sapling always has light green leaves on its canopy.  Obtaining [ ]  Natural generation [ ]  Players have a 25% chance of starting with an orange tree on their island upon island creation.  Harvesting [ ]  Orange tree saplings have a 3% chance of dropping whenever an orange is harvested from the tree. It can be planted on grass to be grown into an orange tree. It takes 1 minute and 50 seconds for an orange tree sapling to grow into an orange tree.  Breaking [ ]  Orange Tree Breaking Data Hardness 8 Best Tool Axe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 12 Wooden 12 24 Stone 8 13 Iron 5 8 Gilded Steel 4 6 Diamond 3 4 Opal 2 4 Void Mattock 2  Drops [ ]  When cut down, the player will recieve:  3 - 4 oak wood 1 orange tree sapling  Usage [ ]  Harvesting [ ]  Oranges grow every season on orange trees and can be obtained by harvesting them from the tree. There can be up to three oranges on a tree at a time, and whenever an orange is harvested, there is a 3% chance of getting an additional orange tree sapling. Harvesting an orange yields 6 Farming XP (24 XP with the 4x daily bonus). It takes x minutes for an orange tree to grow an orange, adding up to a total of xx minutes to grow three oranges.  Orange trees can be harvested with leaf clippers to drop 2 leaves .  History [ ]  June 26, 2020 Added orange trees.  Trivia [ ]  If an orange tree is chopped down while having oranges on it, it will only drop the sapling and not any of the oranges.

title: Orb
content: Orb Slime Island Player's Island Hub Pirate Island Maple Isles Spirit Island Buffalkor Island Diamond Mines Wizard Island Desert Island Underworld Void Isles Black Green Yellow Blue Lime Purple Pink Cyan Orange Red Slime King Fhanhorn Kor Wizard Boss Bhaa Infernal Dragon Slime Queen Void Serpent Recipe See Crafting Crafted with Island Orb: Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Personal Orb: Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Boss Orb: Workbench Tier 4 Required skill See Crafting Description Island Orb: Place in teleporter pad to unlock teleport access to [island]. Personal Orb: An orb that can be used in a teleporter to teleport to a specific location on your island. Use the item to set the location. Boss Orb: Place in teleporter pad to unlock teleport access to [boss]. An orb is an item that can placed into a teleporter pad to teleport the player to a certain location: island orbs teleport players to an island of their choice; personal orbs teleport players to a specific location on their island ; and boss orbs teleport players in front of a boss's spawn area. They cannot be dropped, traded , or put in vending machines and chests . Crystal 3 Serpent's Fang 3 Serpent's Scale Workbench Tier 4 Defeated the Void Serpent at least once.  Usage [ ]  Teleporting [ ]  Up to five orbs can be placed into a teleporter pad at once. Of the inserted orbs, the player can choose to teleport to any of the orb's respective location .  Island orbs allow the player to teleport to Slime Island , their own island , the Hub , Pirate Island , Maple Isles , Spirit Island , Buffalkor Island , the Diamond Mines , Wizard Island , Desert Island , the Underworld , or the Void Isles .  Personal orbs can be used to teleport the player to a certain location of their island. The location can be set by equipping the personal orb and holding down the left click button while in the desired destination before inserting into the teleporter pad. The personal orb's destination can be changed at any time. They can be renamed by clicking the edit button at the right end of the banner in the teleporter pad UI with a max character limit of 30.  Boss orbs can be used to teleport the player to the spawn area of the chosen boss .  Displaying [ ]  An orb stand can be used to display an orb as decoration.  History [ ]  April 9, 2022 Added Slime Island orbs, Island orbs, Hub Island orbs, Pirate Island orbs, Maple Isles orbs, Spirit Island orbs, Buffalkor Island orbs, Diamond Mines orbs, Wizard Island orbs, Desert Island orbs, and Underworld orbs. April 10, 2022 Orbs can no longer be dropped, traded , or put in vending machines and chests . Introduced a bug that prevents players from crafting any orb aside from Slime Island orbs. Grouped all island orbs into one group in the crafting UI. Changed the recipe of Slime Island orbs to require 5 glass blocks , down from 10. Changed the recipe of Buffalkor Island orbs to require 5 slate and marble each, down from 15 each. Changed the recipe of Desert Island orbs to require 2 ruby skorp scales , down from 5. Changed the recipe of Diamond Mines orbs to require 2 enchanted diamonds . Level 7 Combat is now required to craft and use Buffalkor Island orbs. Level 20 Combat is now required to craft and use Wizard Island orbs. Level 36 Combat is now required to craft and use Desert Island orbs. Level 46 Combat is now required to craft and use Diamond Mines orbs. Level 55 Combat is now required to craft and use Underworld orbs. April 16, 2022 Added black personal orbs, green personal orbs, yellow personal orbs, blue personal orbs, lime personal orbs, purple personal orbs, pink personal orbs, cyan personal orbs, orange personal orbs, red personal orbs, Slime King orbs, Fhanhorn orbs, Kor orbs, Wizard Boss orbs, Bhaa orbs, and Infernal Dragon orbs. April 29, 2022 Orbs inserted into teleporter pads and orb stands no longer have a hitbox. Fixed a model issue of the Hub Island orb. Certain personal orbs are no longer censored in the teleporter pad GUI. June 15, 2022 Fixed an issue regarding the Spirit Island orb's recipe. June 25, 2022 Personal orbs can now be renamed after being named. June 28, 2022 Fixed a bug that prevented personal orbs from being able to be renamed. July 2, 2022 Added Slime Queen orbs. July 9, 2022 Fixed a bug that caused Slime Queen orbs to crash servers. July 23, 2022 Fixed Slime Queen orb function and corrected the teleport location of it. July 30, 2022 Fixed Slime Queen orb collisions. August 13, 2022 Added Void Isles and Void Serpent orbs. August 27, 2022 Mob island orbs no longer give their respective boss orbs when on the island. ? Changed the recipe of Spirit Island orbs to require 30 spirit crystals , up from 20. September 26, 2023 Fixed a bug where you couldn't place or change positions of personal orbs.  Trivia [ ]  Holding a personal orb will show where the destination of the orb is. The black personal orb was incorrectly capitalized as "Black Personal orb" in-game. The purple personal orb was incorrectly referred to as a "Black Personal Orb" in-game. The Void Serpent orb is the only boss orb that does not require red bronze ingots .

title: Ore_Rock
content: Ore rocks (or unofficially, nodes ) are resources in Islands that can be broken to drop minerals or stone depending on the type of rock mined. Some rocks have a chance to drop rare items when fully mined. Electrite rocks used to spawn on the Hub Mountains , but this was changed in a later update so that they only spawn on Buffalkor Island . Electrite and enchanted diamonds are the only rocks that have a special glowing effect. Stone , coal , iron , and gold rocks used to spawn on Wizard Island before the April 4, 2021 update. The textures of the diorite , andesite , and granite ore rocks appear to have been swapped and do not match that of the actual block. Prior to the April 29, 2022 update, ore rocks would sometimes spawn inside of blocks .

title: Ornament
content: Ornament Pig Slime Red Green Orange Cow Cletus Blue Dropped by Slime Ornament: Green Slime , Blue Slime , Pink Slime Description Hang on a Christmas tree! An ornament is an item that can be hung on Christmas trees as decoration.  Obtaining [ ]  Christmas presents [ ]  Opening a Christmas present 2021 has a 10% chance of rewarding 1 - 2 red, orange, green, or blue ornaments, resulting in a 2.5% chance of receiving a specific ornament.  Harvesting [ ]  During the Christmas 2021 event, harvesting crops by hand or with a sickle had a 0.02% chance of rewarding a Cletus ornament.  Mob drop [ ]  During the Christmas 2021 event, green slimes , blue slimes , and pink slimes had a 1% chance of dropping a slime ornament upon defeat.  Cows [ ]  During the Christmas 2021 event, feeding, petting, or milking a cow had a 0.1% chance of rewarding a cow ornament.  Pigs [ ]  During the Christmas 2021 event, feeding, petting, or taking a truffle from a pig had a 0.1% chance of rewarding a pig ornament.  Usage [ ]  Hanging [ ]  Christmas trees may be decorated with up to 8 ornaments, unique or non-unique, each. title: Or_Gate
content: Or Gate Type of block Solid block; Logic gate Recipe 10 Iron Ingot 15 Electrite Crafted with Level 2 Electrical Workbench Best tool Luminous Transparent Description A logic gate that allows electrical passthrough, if EITHER inputs receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source.  The or gate is a logic gate block that is crafted with the electrical workbench .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Or Gate 10 Iron Ingot 15 Electrite Electrical Workbench (Level 2)  Breaking [ ]  Or Gate Breaking Data Hardness 3 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 5 Wooden 9 9 Stone 5 5 Iron 3 3 Gilded Steel 3 3 Diamond 2 2 Opal 2 2 Void Mattock 1  Usage [ ]  Players may connect an or gate to a power source from either input port to the succeeding electrical component from its passthrough (output) port using a wire tool .  If either of its two input ports receive power , it will passthrough the amount of power supplied. If both of its input ports receive power, it will passthrough the higher of the power supplied from each port. If neither of its input ports receive power, it will not passthrough any power. Or gates will still passthrough power with at least one powered wire connection (very similar to the combiner , but not the same (presumably).  History [ ]  December 11, 2020 Added or gates.

title: Output_Chest
content: Input/Output Chest Tier 1 Tier 2 Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe Tier 1: 1 Medium Chest 2 Conveyor Belt 50 Iron Ingot Tier 2: 1 Large Chest 2 Conveyor Belt Tier 2 5 Red Bronze Ingot Crafted with Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Required skill Tier 1: Level 40 Forging Tier 2: None Best tool Luminous Transparent Description Tier 1: Medium sized chest with double conveyor attachments. Tier 2: Large industrial chest with double conveyor attachments. The input/output chest is an automatable chest that dispenses items going through once it is full.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Input/Output Chest 1 Medium Chest 2 Conveyor Belt 50 Iron Ingot Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Level 40 Forging Input/Output Chest Tier 2 1 Large Chest 2 Conveyor Belt Tier 2 5 Red Bronze Ingot Workbench Tier 4 None  Breaking [ ]  Input/Output Chest Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 18 Stone 10 10 Iron 6 6 Gilded Steel 5 5 Diamond 3 3 Opal 3 3 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Automatic storage [ ]  Input/output chests can hold 9 stacks of 30 items, adding up to a total of 270 items, while input/output chest tier 2's can hold 12 stacks of 150 items, adding up to a total of 1,800 items. The items can be added in either manually or through a conveyor belt at the front. Once the chest reaches its item limit, it will begin to output any inputted items to the conveyor belt at the other side.  History [ ]  July 11, 2020 Added input/output chests. title: Palm_Tree
content: Palm Tree Type of block Solid block Spawns Player's Island Best tool Drops 3 - 4 Oak Wood 1 Palm Tree Sapling Luminous Transparent The Palm Tree is a Fruit Tree added during the Godzilla vs. Kong event. Unlike other trees, it can be planted on both grass and sand .  The canopies of palm trees never change during seasons.  Obtaining [ ]  Harvesting [ ]  Palm tree saplings have a 3% chance of dropping whenever a coconut is harvested from a palm tree on naturally-generated ones on Skull Island during the Godzilla vs. Kong event. It can be planted on grass or sand to be grown into a palm tree. It takes 1 minute and 25 seconds for a palm tree sapling to grow into a palm tree.  Breaking [ ]  Palm Tree Breaking Data Hardness 8 Best Tool Axe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 12 Wooden 12 24 Stone 8 13 Iron 5 8 Gilded Steel 4 6 Diamond 3 4 Opal 2 4 Void Mattock 2  Drops [ ]  When cut down, the player will recieve:  3 - 4 oak wood 1 palm tree sapling  Usage [ ]  Harvesting [ ]  Coconuts grow every season on palm trees and can be obtained by harvesting them from the tree. There can be up to three coconuts on a tree at a time, and, during the Godzilla vs. Kong event, there was a 3% chance of getting an additional palm tree sapling when harvesting a coconut. Harvesting a coconut yields 3 Farming XP (12 XP with the 4x daily bonus). It takes 6 minutes for a palm tree to grow a coconut, adding up to a total of 18 minutes to grow three coconuts.  Palm trees can be harvested with leaf clippers to drop 2 leaves .  History [ ]  March 19, 2021 Added palm trees. Fixed a bug causing players to be able to chop down the palm trees on Skull Island . Fixed a bug causing palm tree saplings to not drop from harvested coconuts . April 4, 2021 Palm tree saplings can no longer be obtainable on Skull Island. Palm trees may now spawn on player islands upon creation. May 21, 2021 Palm tree saplings can now be planted on sand . ? Palm trees may no longer spawn on player islands upon creation.  Trivia [ ]  If a palm tree is chopped down while having coconuts on it, it will only drop the sapling and not any of the coconuts. During the release of the Godzilla vs. Kong event, there was a glitch where players were able to chop down the palm trees on Skull Island , rendering the quest to collect 10 coconuts for Bosco to be very difficult. However, this was later patched around half an hour later. There was another bug that made palm trees unable to drop palm tree saplings when players harvested coconuts . This was shortly fixed in the same patch mentioned above. Before the official release of palm trees on March 19, 2021 , large palm trees can be found on Desert Island . However, players are unable to interact with them. Before the May 21, 2021 update, palm trees were only able to be grown on grass . The palm tree is the only tree that can be grown on anything other than grass .  Gallery [ ]

title: Patrick_Star_Event
content: Patrick Star Event Date July 2, 2021 - July 17, 2021 Description Patrick Star and his family have appeared in Islands! Visit Patrick in the Hub to complete quests and unlock limited edition items! The Patrick Star event , also known as Patrick Star Show event , was an event in Islands , sponsored by the The Patrick Star Show television series. During the event, players could complete quests for Patrick 's family to obtain the Patrick Star Trophy .  Added [ ]  Hub [ ]  Added an obby for quests. Added pancakes on top of the Hub's mountain , box of Kelpo in the fishing pond , orange juice in the cave, and cookies at the end of the obby for quests. Added buildings for recreational purposes.  NPCs [ ]  Patrick Bunny Cecil GrandPat Squidina  Other [ ]  Patrick Star Trophy Patrick Star Show Badge  Trivia [ ]  Despite the event description saying you can get limited edition items , you can only obtain one item, the Patrick Star Trophy . After the event had been removed, the GUI of treasure maps displayed an aerial view of the Hub during this event until October 18, 2021 instead of the default Hub.

The badge is awarded along with the Patrick Star trophy when the player has helped all members of the Star family.

title: Percival_the_Pumpkin_King
content: Percival the Pumpkin King Health 20,000 HP Behavior Hostile Attack strength 45 ( Vine Slam ; Boulder Throw ; Vine Whip ) 30 - 50 ( Pumpkin Roll ) Effect Stun Drops Cauldron Jukebox Disk Location Hub Percival the Pumpkin King was a boss that could have been summoned in the Hub during the Halloween 2021 event. It has no summon cooldown.  Description [ ]  Percival the Pumpkin King was a moderately-fast boss who specializes in wide-ranged attacks. It has 20,000 health and could have been summoned in its spawn area in the Hub for 500 Pumpkin Boss tokens during the Halloween 2021 event and without any Combat level requirement.  Like other bosses , if there are no players in the battle area, Percival the Pumpkin King will despawn and the player will have to spend another 500 Pumpkin Boss tokens to summon it.  Attacks [ ]  Vine Slam [ ]  Percival slams its vines on the ground, creating a shockwave of rocks. If hit, the rocks deal 45 damage to the player inflicts 5 seconds of the Stun effect.  Boulder Throw [ ]  Percival throws a boulder at a player, dealing 45 damage to any player who makes contact with the boulder. Players can be damaged multiple times by the boulder.  Pump Summon [ ]  Percival summons 2 - 8 pumps , with the number of pumps summoned in proportion to the number of players in the spawn area .  Pumpkin Roll [ ]  Percival rolls to a player and bursts out its appendages, dealing 30 - 50 damage to the player and a small amount of knockback if hit by it. It will roll in a random direction if no player are nearby.  Vine Whip [ ]  Percival strikes a player with its vines, dealing 45 damage if hit.  Drops [ ]  Percival the Pumpkin King rewards 1,251 (4,998 with the 4x daily bonus) Combat XP and 1,251 (4,998 with the 4x daily bonus) Light Melee , Heavy Melee , Magic , or Archery XP depending on the weapon the player used to defeat it.  Image Name Drop chance Cauldron 100% Jukebox Disks Red Jukebox Disk 0.35% Yellow Jukebox Disk 0.35% Blue Jukebox Disk 0.35% Green Jukebox Disk 0.01% Purple Jukebox Disk 0.01% Orange Jukebox Disk 0.01%  Damage reduction [ ]  Percival the Pumpkin King reduces the amount of damage dealt to it by 10% to 55% depending on the number of players (compounds) in the arena.  Number of players Damage reduction 1 0% 2 10% 3 25% 4 35% 5 45% 6+ 55%  Bugs and glitches [ ]  Like Fhanhorn , Percival the Pumpkin King can throw itself into the void or knock the entrance gate with its pumpkin roll attack, instantly killing itself. This doesn't reward the player with drops or XP. Percival has a chance to get permanently stuck when performing his pumpkin roll attack.  History [ ]  October 18, 2021 Added Percival the Pumpkin King. November 13, 2021 Percival The Pumpkin King can no longer be spawned.  Trivia [ ]  It was the first ever boss that can be fought in the Hub . Percival the Pumpkin King has the third most health out of any mob in the game, the second being Zombie Cletus and the first the Void Serpent with 50,000 HP. Percival the Pumpkin King was the second-fastest boss in the game in terms of speed, with the first being Fhanhorn . Percival the Pumpkin King was the second boss in Islands that don't have a summon cooldown, the first being the Infernal Dragon . It was the second boss in Islands that require its own token to be summoned. Percival the Pumpkin King rewards the same amount of XP as the Wizard Boss , Bhaa , Infernal Dragon, and Fhanhorn. Percival the Pumpkin King, the Slime King , Fhanhorn, Zombie Cletus, and the Lunar Rabbit are the only five bosses that can be summoned without a Combat level requirement. It might be a reference to Pumpking, from Terraria .

title: Pesticide_Spray
content: Pesticide Spray Attack damage 12HP (only to Void Crop Eaters ) A pesticide spray is an item used for protecting crops in Hardcore Mode .  Usage [ ]  Crop Protection [ ]  Spraying pesticide sprays on crops prevents them from being eaten by void crop eaters for 2 minutes and damages them by 12HP when the protected crops are attacked. It can be used indefinitely. Each crop protected by pesticide lasts 4 hits from void crop eaters , with the last hit damaging them by 47HP. title: Petroleum_Fuel
content: Petroleum Fuel Recipe 1 Oil Fuel / 1 Petroleum Barrel Crafted with Oil Refinery Fuel Barrel Extractor Petroleum fuel is a liquid item that was added in the August 15, 2021 update. title: Pets
content: Pets are a feature added on July 17, 2021 . They are passive mobs that can follow the player around everywhere they go. Pets can be equipped in the pets UI, opened with the button. Players are not able to have multiple pets equipped at a time.  Spawning [ ]  To spawn a pet using a pet spawn egg , the player must be the owner of the island they are currently on. While holding the egg, clicking or tapping anywhere on their screen will spawn the pet.  Pet UI [ ]  Pets can be equipped, unequipped, and named in the pet user interface, found on the left-hand side of the screen represented by a paw. Players are able to equip/unequip pets by clicking on the box of the unlocked pet and name it by typing in the box under the pet's icon. All pets have a default name of "Name Me!" when first spawned in.  Function [ ]  Pets currently have no beneficial functions. They will follow its owner around on any island , but will not aid in battling, mining, or any other action.  List of pets [ ]  This list below shows all of the pets currently available in-game. The player may only have one of each pet. title: Petur
content: Petur Location Hub Purpose Buys food Occupation Baker Petur is a villager located in the Hub . He buys food items for various prices.  Shop [ ]  Petur buys food for various prices in exchange for coins . Hot offers sell between 1.2x and 1.8x the normal price.  Image Name Normal price Lowest hot price Highest hot price Bread 20 - 30 coins 30 coins 45 coins Berry Pie 168 - 252 coins 252 coins 378 coins Pizza 64 - 96 coins 96 coins 165 coins Pineapple Pizza 124 - 186 coins 186 coins 279 coins Grape Jam 80 - 120 coins 120 coins 180 coins Jam Sandwich 640 - 960 coins 960 coins 1,440 coins Tomato Sauce 42 - 48 coins 48 coins 72 coins Tomato Soup 512 - 768 coins 768 coins 1,152 coins Carrot Cake 480 - 720 coins 720 coins 1,080 coins Baked Potato 24 - 36 coins 36 coins 54 coins Potato Salad 1,136 - 1,704 coins 1,704 coins 2,556 coins Apple Pie 120 - 180 coins 180 coins 270 coins Orange Cake 120 - 180 coins 180 coins 270 coins Lemon Bread 120 - 180 coins 180 coins 270 coins Avocado Toast 92 - 138 coins 138 coins 207 coins Starfruit Cake 688 - 1,032 coins 1,032 coins 1,548 coins Roasted Carrot 24 - 36 coins 36 coins 54 coins Honey Toast 56 - 84 coins 84 coins 126 coins Roasted Honey Carrot 336 - 504 coins 504 coins 756 coins Candy Apple 704 - 1,056 coins 1,056 coins 1,584 coins Lemon Puff 768 - 1,152 coins 1,152 coins 1,728 coins Orange Honeycomb 704 - 1,056 coins 1,056 coins 1,584 coins Deviled Eggs 1,984 - 2,976 coins 2,976 coins 4,460 coins  Legacy quests [ ]  Prior to the February 26, 2021 update, Petur offered random food related quests to players. Players would not be given the next quest until they had finished their current quest. Once a quest was completed, the player would be given a stronger bond with Petur. With each level gained, blocks , seeds , or a furniture blueprint would be randomly awarded.  Quest Craft 3 pieces of dough . Craft 3 pieces of berry dough . Eat 2 loaves of bread . Eat 3 berries . Craft 5 pieces of carrot cake batter . Craft 5 grape jams . Craft 10 potato salads . Craft 10 tomato sauces . Craft 10 tomato soups . Eat 20 loaves of bread . Sell 20 pieces of food . Eat 15 berries . Sell 30 berries . Eat 50 loaves of bread . Sell 125 pieces of food . Sell 100 berries . Sell 100 tomato sauces . Sell 40 jam sandwiches . Sell 50 pizzas . Sell 85 berry pies . Sell 120 baked potatoes . Sell 80 potato salads .  History [ ]  May 10, 2020 Added Baker.  Trivia [ ]  Before the March 13, 2021 update, Petur only offered to buy 5 different food items with one hot offer. After the update, most food items could be sold anytime and 5 - 6 hot offers would alternate every 24 hours. Hot offers used to simply be a higher price the food sells for. Now, the prices vary and are around a certain range. From January 8, 2022 to January 15, 2022 , all food prices were raised by x1.5. The industrial merchant teleseller cannot sell things to Petur due to his changing prices. Since the November 13, 2021 update, any newer food items are currently cannot be sold to Petur, except pineapple pizzas . The model of Petur is similar to the model of the Baker kit from Bedwars .

title: Pickaxe
content: Pickaxe Wooden Stone Iron Gilded Steel Diamond Opal Recipe Wooden : 3 Oak Wood Stone : 20 Stone , 10 Oak Wood Iron : 20 Iron Ingot , 10 Oak Wood Gilded Steel : 3 Gilded Steel Rod , 40 Iron Ingot , 100 Gold Ingot Diamond : 50 Diamond , 5 Gilded Steel Rod Opal: 1 Opal Pickaxe Hilt , 50 Opal , 100 Iron Ingot Crafted with Wooden: Workbench Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Stone: Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Iron, Gilded Steel, Diamond, & Opal: Anvil Required skill Wooden & Stone: None Iron : Level 4 Mining Gilded Steel : Level 24 Mining Diamond : Level 48 Mining Opal : Level 55 Mining Description Iron: Crafted using an Anvil Pickaxes are one of the most commonly used tools in the game. They allow the player to mine blocks , and the speed increases depending on its material and the Mining skill. Usage [ ]  Mining [ ]  Pickaxes can be used to break ore rocks and resource blocks . The number of hits required to break it is based on the player's Mining level. The rarity of the pickaxe also depend on the speed in which it breaks something, listed below from weakest to strongest:  Wood Stone Iron Gilded Steel Diamond Opal Void Mattock  Breaking blocks [ ]  Pickaxes can be used to break general blocks on a player island's . A player's Mining level DOES affect the number of hits it takes to break them.  Trivia [ ]  Jed and Ruby have pickaxes with their own unique models on their backs. Pickaxes, along with axes , had an animation early on in the game but were removed in an unknown update. This was likely to reduce lag. The Void Mattock is both an Axe and a Pickaxe.
