title: Red_Berries
content: Red Berries Planted on Grass Sell price 22 coins Edible Red berries (formerly berry ) are a food item collected from red berry bushes. A red berry bush is a plant that grows red berries and will occasionally produce an extra red berry seed when harvested by a player.  Obtaining [ ]  Natural generation [ ]  The player will begin with one red berry bush on their island upon creation.  Harvesting [ ]  Red berries can be grown on the player's island by planting red berry seeds on grass . Red berry bushes can be harvested by hand, sickle , or turkeys , although turkeys cannot reward extra red berry seeds. When harvested, the player will obtain 1 - 2 red berries, 0 - 1 red berry seeds, and 6 Farming XP (18 XP with the 4x daily bonus). The number of berries received per harvest can be increased to 2 - 3 with the VIP or pro gamepasses .  Totems [ ]  A red berry totem will collect red berries from bushes in a 3 block radius. The red berries can be collected by interacting with the totem. A red berry totem placed next to a conveyor belt will drop the red berries onto the conveyor. Red berry bushes harvested by totems cannot yield red berry seeds.  Christmas presents [ ]  Opening a Christmas present 2020 has a chance to reward an unknown range of red berries.  Spooking turkeys [ ]  Spooking turkeys on the Maple Isles will reward the player with 1 - 2 red berries or raspberries.  Growth [ ]  A red berry bush grows through three stages after it is planted. Its first growth stage is a small seed. It becomes a bush in its second stage and produces berries in its third growth stage. Its growth time is not affected by water nor basic fertilizer .  Red Berries Growth Phases Phase 0 Phase 1 Phase 2 Phase 3 Time since planted 0m 0s 2m 35s 7m 45s 5m 10s after harvesting Note: The durations of time above are on an unfertilized and unwatered plant Red Berries Growth Time Type Growth Time Normal 7m 45s Fertilized 7m 45s Watered 7m 45s Watered + Fertilized 7m 45s  Usage [ ]  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Berry Dough 1 Dough 5 Red Berries Cooking Table Food Processor Level 2 Cooking  Eating [ ]  Eating a red berry restores 20 HP.  Selling [ ]  Red berries can be sold to Cletus for 22 coins each.  Chickens [ ]  Red berries are the main food source of chickens . Feeding a red berry to a chicken will make the chicken lay eggs .  Frogs [ ]  Players are able to feed red berries to frogs by dropping them close to them. However, feeding them currently serves no purpose.  History [ ]  April 10, 2020 Added berries. May 10, 2020 Decreased the sell price of berries from 30 coins to 25 coins to Tom . Berry seeds could now only be dropped from berry bushes after 20 minutes of playtime. June 15, 2020 Red berry bushes can now be watered with watering cans and basic sprinklers . September 18, 2020 Decreased the sell price of berries from 25 coins to 22 coins. ? Waiting 20 minutes is no longer necessary to have a chance of receiving an extra berry seed. January 22, 2021 Red berry bushes now grant 6 Farming XP when harvested. February 26, 2021 Red berries can now be used to feed chickens . April 4, 2021 Red berry bushes can now be harvested with sickles . Red berries can now be used to feed frogs . July 30, 2021 Red berry bushes can now be harvested with Cletus' lucky sickle . October 9, 2021 Renamed berries to red berries. Red berries can be obtained and harvested from red berry totems . November 27, 2021 Red berries can be obtained by spooking turkeys . Red berry bushes can now be harvested by turkeys. Red berries can now be used to feed turkeys. June 3, 2022 Red berries can now be sold to Cletus instead of to Tom. October 15, 2022 Red berries can now be sold to Tom instead of to Cletus. November 4, 2022 Red berries can now be sold to Cletus instead of Tom.  Trivia [ ]  While it is possible to water berry bushes with the watering can and basic sprinkler , watering it will not have an effect on the growth time of berries. The developers hinted that Roblox YouTuber KonekoKitten brought the issue of berry farming using alts to their attention in his video, " i BROKE roblox skyblock by accident LOL ," thus causing them to add a 20 minute time period upon joining the game where the player cannot receive extra red berry seeds. This was later removed a few months later. A red berry bush , wheat , and a fruit tree are the three crops that naturally generate upon a new island creation. Turkeys cannot reward Farming XP and extra red berry seeds when harvesting red berry bushes.  Gallery [ ]

title: Red_Berry_Seeds
content: Red Berry Seeds Planted on Grass Red berry seeds are seeds used to grow red berry bushes .  Obtaining [ ]  Harvesting [ ]  Harvesting a red berry bush will give 1 - 2  red berries and a 1% chance of getting a red berry seed.  Starter pack [ ]  Players can obtain 1 red berry seed and other items by purchasing the Starter Pack for 199 Robux in the Robux Shop .  Usage [ ]  Planting [ ]  Red berry seeds can be planted only be planted on grass to be grown into a red berry bush.  Growth [ ]  A red berry bush grows through three stages after it is planted. Its first growth stage is a small seed. It becomes a bush in its second stage and produces berries in its third growth stage. Its growth time is not affected by water nor basic fertilizer .  Red Berry Seeds Growth Phases Phase 0 Phase 1 Phase 2 Phase 3 Time since planted 0m 0s 2m 35s 7m 45s 5m 10s after harvesting Note: The durations of time above are on an unfertilized and unwatered plant Red Berry Seeds Growth Time Type Growth Time Normal 7m 45s Fertilized 7m 45s Watered 7m 45s Watered + Fertilized 7m 45s  History [ ]  April 10, 2020 Added berry seeds. May 4, 2020 One berry seed can now be obtained by purchasing the Starter Pack . May 10, 2020 Berry seeds could now only be dropped from berry bushes after 20 minutes of playtime. Berry seeds can no longer be purchased from Cletus . ? Waiting 20 minutes is no longer necessary to have a chance of receiving an extra berry seed. October 9, 2021 Renamed berry seeds to red berry seeds. April 22, 2022 Introduced a bug that prevented players from placing red berry seeds into chests . April 29, 2022 Fixed a bug that prevented players from placing red berry seeds into chests.  Trivia [ ]  The developers hinted that Roblox YouTuber KonekoKitten brought the issue of berry farming using alts to their attention in his video, " i BROKE roblox skyblock by accident LOL ," thus causing them to add a 20 minute time period upon joining the game where the player cannot receive extra red berry seeds. This was later removed a few months later. The maximum number of red berry seeds a single player can have in their inventory at one time is 10,000. Joining a new server with more than the limit in the inventory or hotbar will reset it back to 10,000. Utilizing storage blocks such as chests can allow one to bypass the limit. Before May 10, 2020 , berry seeds could be purchased for 3,000 coins from Cletus .

Obtaining [ ]  Mining [ ]  Red sandstone rocks naturally spawn on Desert Island . Mining a red sandstone rock grants the player 1 - 2 red sandstone and 9 Mining XP (36 with the 4x daily bonus) per stage, resulting in a total of 2 - 4 red sandstone and 18 Mining XP (72 with the 4x daily bonus) per full rock.  Totems [ ]  A red sandstone totem will spawn red sandstone rocks in a 5 block radius. After the totem has spawned 6 red sandstone rocks or has run out of space, the totem will begin to mine the rocks and hold rewards equivalent to a half of an ore rock, which can be collected by interacting with the totem.  A red sandstone totem placed next to a conveyor belt will drop red sandstone onto the conveyor belt. title: Regeneration
content: Regeneration Causes The affected player will slowly regenerate health. Source Regen Potion Fortune Cookie Type Drink  Regeneration , also known as Regen , is an effect that causes the player to regenerate health over time.  Source [ ]  Drinking a regen potion will grant 5 seconds of Regeneration, and eating a fortune cookie has a 4.55% chance of granting 15 minutes of Regeneration.  Causes [ ]  The affected player will gain about 10 HP every second the effect is active, meaning that one regen potion would heal the player 50 HP and one fortune cookie 9,000 HP.  History [ ]  August 9, 2020 Added Regeneration. February 7, 2022 Regeneration can now be obtained from eating fortune cookies .  Trivia [ ]  Both Tree Fruit Harvest Yield and Logging Yield use same icon as Regeneration.

title: Resistance_Potion
content: Resistance Potion Required skill Level 58 Cooking Description Reduces incoming damage. The Resistance Potion was an uncraftable item that was meant to be unlocked after reaching Level 58 in the Cooking skill. However, it wasn't a craftable item even after reaching the needed level.  It was removed from the skill reward list in the February 5, 2021 update.  Effect [ ]  From its name and description, a guess could be made that it would supposedly reduce damage from hostile mobs and players on the mob islands and the PvP island when it was available.  As of February 7, 2022 , its effect can only be obtained by eating a fortune cookie .  History [ ]  January 22, 2021 Added resistance potions. February 5, 2021 Removed the resistance potion.

title: Resource_Island
content: Resource Island Copper Gold Oil Resources Oil Fuel Gold Ore Copper Ore A resource island is an island that is randomly located around the player's island , spawned by resource deeds . There are three different types of deposits that may spawn on resource islands: copper , gold , and oil .  Resource islands act as an extension of the main player island and may spawn rocks , tall grass , and flowers . A resource island cannot be spawned if the player has reached the block limit of 80,000 or the resource island limit (of any kind) of 15.  Copper resource islands [ ]  Copper resource islands can be spawned using copper resource deeds , with one copper deposit available per island.  Prior to the June 3, 2022 update, one copper resource island would naturally spawn without any necessary prerequisites but will only reach the limit of two once the player had a workbench tier 3 placed on their island.  Gold resource islands [ ]  Gold resource islands can be spawned using gold resource deeds , with one gold deposit available per island.  Prior to the June 3, 2022 update, up to two existing gold resource islands would naturally spawn once the player had two existing copper resource islands.  Oil resource islands [ ]  Oil resource islands can be spawned using oil resource deeds , with one temporary oil deposit capable of producing 5,000 units of oil fuel available per island.  Prior to the June 3, 2022 update, up to two existing oil resource islands would naturally spawn once the player had a workbench tier 4 placed on their island.  Trivia [ ]  Resource islands used to spawn further away from the player's island , but they were later changed to spawn closer to it. From the addition of oil resource islands on August 15, 2021 to June 3, 2022 , copper and gold resource islands would not spawn correctly if the player had placed a workbench tier 4 on their island as the game did not register it as a workbench tier 3 , thus causing the game to think that the requirement for copper deposits to spawn had not been reached. This could've been fixed by breaking the placed workbench tier 4 and placing a workbench tier 3 until a new deposit spawns. At the release of the September 25, 2021 update, there was a bug that caused the possibility of a third copper resource island to spawn, disregarding the previous limit of 2. Before the June 3, 2022 update was released, resource islands naturally spawned around the player's island with certain prerequisites and did not need to be spawned with deeds .

title: Rice
content: Rice Seed cost 3,300 coins Planted on Pond Planter Sell price 30 coins Edible Rice is a crop that grows in pond planters from rice seeds . The 5% chance of obtaining an extra rice seed is increased for owners of the VIP gamepass or PRO gamepass .  Growth [ ]  The growth time of rice can be shortened by 20% when watered with a watering can or basic sprinkler , or fertilized with basic fertilizer . If watered and fertilized, the growth time will be shortened by 30%. title: Rob
content: Rob Location Hub Purpose Selling furniture and storing extra coins for the player. Occupation Banker Rob is a villager located in the Hub . Players can buy economy-related furniture from them and also deposit or withdraw money into and from the player's bank.  Shop [ ]  Selling [ ]  Image Name Price Coin Pile 2,500 coins Cash Pile 5,000 coins Security Safe 15,000 coins Security Rope 7,500 coins Security Window 9,500 coins  Bank [ ]  Players can store and withdraw coins to Rob anytime with no charge per transaction or interest. There is a coin capacity that can be increased by upgrading the bank's current tier for coins. It will display the player's current balance in their account and on hand as well.  Upgrading [ ]  The formula for the upgrade cost is  P ( n ) = { 0 n < 1 2 n − 1 × 100,000 1 ≤ n < 5 2 n − 1 × 1,000,000 n ≥ 5 {\displaystyle P(n) = \begin{cases} 0 & n<1\\ 2^{n-1}\times100{,}000 & 1 \leq n < 5\\ 2^{n-1}\times1{,}000{,}000 & n \geq 5\end{cases} }  Where n {\displaystyle n} is the tier number.  Tier Upgrade cost Tier coin capacity 0 None 1B coins 1 100,000 coins 1.25B coins 2 200,000 coins 1.5B coins 3 400,000 coins 2B coins 4 800,000 coins 5B coins 5 16,000,000 coins 7.5B coins 6 32,000,000 coins 10B coins 7 64,000,000 coins 25B coins 8 128,000,000 coins 50B coins 9 256,000,000 coins 75B coins 10 512,000,000 coins 100B coins  Dialogue [ ]  "Well if it isn't my favorite client! What can I do you for?" >View Shop Leads to shop. >View Account Leads to the player's bank account.  History [ ]  November 25, 2022 Added Rob. December 2, 2022 Shared accounts can now be purchased from Rob.  Trivia [ ]  Their name may be a reference to the phrase "Rob the Bank".

title: Roblox_Battles
content: Roblox Battles Date November 26, 2020 - December 14, 2020 Description Complete the scavenger hunt by the NPC on your island to receive a trophy and a badge . The Roblox Battles is an official Roblox event where developers and YouTubers compete in different games on Roblox. Players in Islands could earn the Roblox Battles trophy and the Islands RB Battles Championship Badge during the event.  Trophy [ ]  To obtain the trophy, the player would have to talk to the Scavenger on their island and collect all the items on the scavenger list. When all the items were collected, the player could interact with the Scavenger to be awarded with the Roblox Battles trophy as well as the Islands RB Battles Championship Badge . The following items in the scavenger list needed to be collected:  5 stone 5 fish (any type) 2 bread 10 slime balls (any type) 5 coral (any type) 1 tomato

title: Roblox_Battles_Trophy
content: Roblox Battles Trophy Type of block Unsolid block Best tool Luminous Transparent Description Limited edition trophy found only during the 2020 Roblox Battles Event. The Roblox Battles trophy is a trophy that could have been obtained during the Roblox Battles event.  Obtaining [ ]  Scavenger list [ ]  The Roblox Battles trophy could have been obtained by completing the scavenger list given by the Scavenger on their island during the Roblox Battles event. Once completed, the player could interact with him to claim the trophy, causing him to leave after the trophy was claimed. To complete it, the following items needed to be collected:  5 stone 5 fish (any type) 2 bread 10 slime balls (any type) 5 coral (any type) 1 tomato  Breaking [ ]  Roblox Battles Trophy Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 18 Stone 10 10 Iron 6 6 Gilded Steel 5 5 Diamond 3 3 Opal 3 3 Void Mattock 2  History [ ]  November 26, 2020 Added Roblox Battles trophies. December 14, 2020 The Roblox Battles trophy is no longer obtainable.  Trivia [ ]  It is the only trophy that does not emit a sparkling particle effect when placed or held. It is the smallest trophy, with block dimensions of 1x1x1, whereas the other trophies take up a larger space. The Roblox Battles trophy lacks collision, meaning that players can phase through it as if there was nothing there.  Gallery [ ]

title: Robux_Shop
content: The Robux Shop is a UI element that can be opened by pressing its button on the left side of a player's screen. When opened, it plays a sound before displaying all the gamepasses and animal skins that are currently purchasable with robux — Roblox's official currency. They are separated into three tabs: Ranks, Unlocks, and Skins.  Ranks [ ]  This tab holds gamepasses that grant the player a rank in the chat and special boosts.  Unlocks [ ]  This tab holds the other gamepasses that give the player access to exclusive items.  On sale [ ]  Offsale: [ ]  Skins [ ]  This tab holds all the current animal skins for sale. While gamepasses can only be bought once, animal skins can be purchased without a limit.  On sale [ ]  Offsale [ ]  Trivia [ ]  There has only ever been 1 animal skin for sale at a time.

title: Rock
content: Rock Type of block Non-solid block Spawns On top of Grass and Stone Best tool Drops Stone Luminous Transparent  Rocks are naturally generating blocks that spawn on top of grass .  Obtaining [ ]  Natural generation [ ]  Rocks naturally spawn on top of grass at random occasions. Breaking the block will drop stone , and not the block itself.  Breaking [ ]  Rock Breaking Data Hardness 5 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 8 Wooden 15 15 Stone 8 8 Iron 5 5 Gilded Steel 4 4 Diamond 3 3 Opal 2 2 Void Mattock 1  Trivia [ ]  Breaking these rocks was previously required in a quest , but quests have since been removed. The only time when rocks can spawn on top of stone is when a resource island generates.

title: Rock_Mimic
content: Rock Mimic Coal Iron Gold Health Coal: 400 HP Iron: 450 HP Gold: 500 HP Behavior Hostile Attack strength Coal: 25 HP Iron: 30 HP Gold: 35 HP Drops Coal: Basalt , Coal , Jukebox Disk Iron: Basalt , Iron Ingot , Jukebox Disk Gold: Basalt , Gold Ingot , Jukebox Disk Location Buffalkor Island Diamond Mines A rock mimic is a hostile mob that spawns on Buffalkor Island and the Diamond Mines disguised as an ore rock .  Spawning [ ]  Rock mimics spawn on Buffalkor Island and in the Diamond Mines disguised as a coal , iron , or gold rock .  Behavior [ ]  Rock mimics will imitate coal rocks , iron rocks , or gold rocks and will stay hidden inside the ground until a player breaks their respective ore rock. Once a player fully breaks the rock, they will jump out from the ground and attack the player, dealing 25, 30, or 35 damage if it is a coal, iron, or gold rock mimic respectively. If the player is not in the vicinity of the rock mimic, it will burrow itself inside of the location where it is currently standing.  Drops [ ]  A rock mimic rewards 45 Combat XP (180 XP with the 4x daily bonus) and 45 Light Melee , Heavy Melee , Magic , or Archery XP (180 with the 4x daily bonus) depending on the weapon the player used to defeat it.  Using the captain's rapier or consuming a dragon roll or blueberry cookie to increase the player's luck does not increase the amount of basalt , coal , iron ingots , or gold ingots dropped.  Image Name Drop chance Basalt 4 - 7 Coal [Coal rock mimics only] 5 - 9 Iron Ingot [Iron rock mimics only] 9 - 15 Gold Ingot [Gold rock mimics only] 5 - 8 Jukebox Disks Red Jukebox Disk 0.35% Yellow Jukebox Disk 0.35% Blue Jukebox Disk 0.35% Green Jukebox Disk 0.01% Orange Jukebox Disk 0.01% Purple Jukebox Disk 0.01%  History [ ]  June 18, 2022 Added rock mimics. June 25, 2022 Added iron rock mimic and gold rock mimics. Modified the spawn method of rock mimics. Added sound effects to rock mimics. June 28, 2022 Iron rock mimics and gold rock mimics now drop iron ingots and gold ingots respectively. July 24, 2022 Rock mimics no longer spawn. July 30, 2022 Fixed a bug that caused rock mimics to duplicate. Rock mimics can now spawn again.  Resistances and Weaknesses [ ]  Coal and Iron [ ]  Resistances Weaknesses Physical Magical Physical Magical None Quake Striking Storm  Gold [ ]  Resistances Weaknesses Physical Magical Physical Magical Slashing Quake , Hydro Striking Storm , Inferno  Trivia [ ]  Rock mimics are the only hostile mobs that naturally spawn on more than one island .  Gallery [ ]

title: Ruby_Gauntlet
content: Ruby Gauntlet  The ruby gauntlet is an unused item in Islands .  Information [ ]  The ruby gauntlet was added to the game on August 9, 2020 along with skorps . The item cannot be obtained and does not have a use.  It was suspected to be used for the Roblox Battles event, however it was unused.

title: Ruby_Skorp
content: Ruby Skorp Health 1,200 HP Behavior Hostile Attack strength 45 HP Effect Food Poison Drops Ruby Skorp Scale Ruby Skorp Claw Ruby Skorp Stinger Desert Portal Shard Bhaa Token Jukebox Disk Location Desert Island The ruby skorp is a hostile mob that spawns on Desert Island along with iron skorps and gold skorps .  Spawning [ ]  Desert Island [ ]  Ruby skorps spawn on the outskirts of Desert Island 's central island, and are the rarest type of skorp , with a 5% chance to spawn.  Bhaa [ ]  Bhaa will summon a ruby skorp in quick succession after summoning an iron skorp and gold skorp if a sufficient number of players are simultaneously fighting him. Bhaa always has a chance to summon a ruby skorp regardless.  Behavior [ ]  Ruby skorps attack with quick, close ranged attacks that deal 45 HP of damage and inflict the Food Poison effect to the player if hit, which prevents the player from consuming food for 7 - 10 seconds. Regen potions and healing weapons can still be used to regenerate a player's health while having the Food Poison effect.  Drops [ ]  A ruby skorp rewards 501 Combat XP (1998 with the 4x daily bonus) and 501 Light Melee , Heavy Melee , Magic , or Archery XP (1998 with the 4x daily bonus) depending on the weapon the player used to defeat it.  Image Name Drop chance Ruby Skorp Scale 150% Ruby Skorp Claw 10% Ruby Skorp Stinger 10% Desert Portal Shard 0.05% Bhaa Token 2500% Jukebox Disks Red Jukebox Disk 0.35% Yellow Jukebox Disk 0.35% Blue Jukebox Disk 0.35% Green Jukebox Disk 0.01% Orange Jukebox Disk 0.01% Purple Jukebox Disk 0.01%  Resistances and Weaknesses [ ]  Resistances Weaknesses Physical Magical Physical Magical Piercing Storm , Ethereal Striking Quake , Void  History [ ]  August 9, 2020 Added ruby skorps. January 22, 2021 Ruby skorps now reward 501 Combat XP (1998 with the 4x daily bonus) and 501 Light Melee , Heavy Melee , Magic , or Archery XP (1998 with the 4x daily bonus) depending on the weapon the player used to defeat it. June 18, 2022 Ruby skorps are no longer able to drop ruby skorp stingers . Ruby skorps are now able to drop ruby skorp claws . ? Ruby skorps are now able to drop ruby skorp stingers again. September 17, 2022 Ruby skorps are no longer able to drop vamp bow blueprints .  Trivia [ ]  Before the July 9, 2022 update increased the Slime King 's health, ruby skorps were the only regular mob that had more health than a boss , having had 200 more HP than the Slime King.

title: Ruby_Staff
content: Ruby Staff Type Magic weapon Magical class Quake Magic weapon type Staff Attack damage 36 HP Recipe 10 Ruby 2 Gilded Steel Rod Crafted with Anvil Required skill Level 36 Magic Description A staff similar to Bhaa's, heals lowest health nearby player for 15 health on hit. [sic] The ruby staff is a ranged magic weapon added in the April 24, 2021 update. It is in the quake class.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required Skill Ruby Staff 10 Ruby 2 Gilded Steel Rod Anvil Level 36 Magic  Attacking [ ]  Casting [ ]  At level 1 Magic , fireballs can be shot from the ruby staff to deal a base damage of 36 HP every second. The fireballs are shot horizontally in the direction the player is facing, and its damage can be increased by levelling up the Magic skill.  History [ ]  April 24, 2021 Added ruby staffs. ? Reduced the ruby staff's healing power from 20 HP to 15 HP. May 27, 2022 Ruby staffs are now able to be charged to deal more damage. Level 36 Magic is now required to craft ruby staffs. Changed the appearance of projectiles fired by ruby staffs. Added the ability to aim projectiles. June 10, 2022 Nerfed the ruby staff's base damage from 50 HP to 42 HP. Nerfed the ruby staff's charging damage. September 17, 2022 Nerfed the ruby staff's base damage from 42 HP to 36 HP. Removed the ruby staff's charging ability. The ruby staff is now an ethereal weapon. ? The ruby staff's projectiles now explode instead of disappearing. October 8, 2022 The ruby staff is now a quake weapon. Removed the ruby staff's healing. Ruby staffs will now affect hostile mobs with the Slowness effect when attacked by this. December 23, 2022 Ruby staffs will now affect hostile mobs with the Vulnerability effect instead of Slowness when attacked by this.  Trivia [ ]  Although Bhaa holds his own ruby staff, he cannot heal himself nor the skorps he summons with it. This used to be the only magic weapon where its projectile doesn't explode after reaching a short distance; instead, it disappears. This weapon is likely inspired by the Ruby Staff from Terraria . The ruby staff deals the same amount of damage as the tidal spellbooks . The ruby staff could heal other players around the player who uses it prior to the October 8, 2022 update.

title: Ruby_Sword
content: Ruby Sword Type Light Melee Physical class Slashing Attack damage 60 HP (Base) +30 HP (Critical) Recipe 20 Ruby Skorp Scale 200 Iron Ingot 6 Ruby Crafted with Anvil Required skill Level 66 Light Melee Description Artifact crafted from shiny rubies. The ruby sword is a light melee weapon in the slashing class.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Ruby Sword 20 Ruby Skorp Scale 200 Iron Ingot 6 Ruby Anvil Level 66 Light Melee  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Light Melee , the ruby sword deals a base damage of 60 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal an extra 30 HP of damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Light Melee skill and it is in the slashing class.  Like other melee weapon , only one player can hit damage in each hostile mob. Multiple players cannot hit damage together.  History [ ]  June 25, 2022 Added ruby swords. ? Changed the description from "Artifact crafted from enchanted rubies." to "Artifact crafted from shiny rubies." September 17, 2022 Ruby swords are now a slashing weapon. September 24, 2022 Ruby swords are now an ethereal weapon. October 1, 2022 Level 66 Light Melee is now required to craft ruby swords instead of level 60 Combat . October 8, 2022 Ruby swords are no longer an ethereal weapon.  Trivia [ ]  The ruby sword is the fourth-strongest melee weapon in terms of base damage, only behind the noxious stinger , serpent's bane , and the reaper's scythe .

title: Sandstone
content: Sandstone Sandstone Rock Type of block Solid block Spawns Desert Island Best tool Luminous Transparent Sandstone is a block that can be mined from sandstone rocks .  Obtaining [ ]  Mining [ ]  Sandstone rocks naturally spawn in the Hub Desert and Desert Island . Mining a sandstone rock grants the player 1 - 2 sandstone and 8 Mining XP (33 with the 4x daily bonus) per stage, resulting in a total of 2 - 4 sandstone and 16 Mining XP (66 with the 4x daily bonus) per full rock.  Totems [ ]  A sandstone totem will spawn sandstone rocks in a 5 block radius. After the totem has spawned 6 sandstone rocks or has run out of space, the totem will begin to mine the rocks and hold rewards equivalent to a half of an ore rock, which can be collected by interacting with the totem.  A sandstone totem placed next to a conveyor belt will drop sandstone onto the conveyor belt. title: Santa
content: Santa Location Player's Island , Hub Purpose Selling christmas themed items and providing quests Santa was a limited-time villager located in the Hub during Christmas 2020 and the player's island during Christmas 2021 . During Christmas 2020 , the player could complete quests to earn Snowflakes, an exclusive currency, to buy various Christmas-themed items. During Christmas 2021 , the player could talk to him for a free Christmas tree.  Christmas 2021 [ ]  Dialogue [ ]  "Ho ho ho, happy holidays user ! It is great to see your island in person!" >Wow! "I brought you a big Christmas Tree for you to show off and decorate with ornaments! I hope you like it!" >Take Gift Santa gives the player a Christmas Tree . "I'll be dropping presents on your island to find goodies and ornaments for your tree! Have a Merry Christmas!" >Thanks! End.  I brought a gift for user . Could you let them know? [Will Do!] End  Christmas 2020 [ ]  Shop [ ]  Santa sold various items for Snowflakes, an exclusive currency that was obtained by completing quests.  Image Item Cost Wreath 40 Snowflakes Tall Snowman 80 Snowflakes Wide Snowman 80 Snowflakes Christmas Shovel 80 Snowflakes Snow Globe 220 Snowflakes  Quests [ ]  Santa offered 4 Quests at a time. Completing a quest would have rewarded the player with Snowflakes, an exclusive currency that was used to purchase decorations from Santa. When a quest was completed, the player had to wait 22 hours for the next quest in the place to pop up.  Quest Reward Break 15 ice spikes. 5 Snowflakes Gift a flower to 3 different players. 10 Snowflakes Gift food to 5 different players. 8 Snowflakes Defeat 5 frost slimes . 5 Snowflakes Pick up 3 presents on your island . 8 Snowflakes Shovel 15 piles of snow . 5 Snowflakes Gift a present to 5 different players. 12 Snowflakes  History [ ]  December 18, 2020 Added Santa. January 4, 2021 Removed Santa. December 18, 2021 Readded Santa. Updated Santa's appearance. January 8, 2022 Removed Santa.

title: Sapling
content: Sapling Apple Avocado Birch Hickory Lemon Maple Oak Orange Pine Palm Spirit Kiwi Plum Cherry Blossom Type of block Non-solid [ 1 ] block Buy cost See Purchasing Best tool Luminous Transparent A sapling is a non-solid [ 1 ] block that can grow into a tree .  Obtaining [ ]  Trees [ ]  All trees will drop 3 - 4 of their respective wood type when cut down and automatically replant themselves in the form of saplings. Turning off the auto-replant setting will make the chopped tree drop its sapling instead. Harvesting coconuts on Skull Island and kiwis on Pirate Island also had/have a 3% chance of rewarding a palm tree sapling and a kiwi tree sapling respectively. title: Sapling_Automatic_Planter
content: Sapling Automatic Planter Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 5 Red Bronze Ingot 2 Copper Plate 5 Copper Bolt Crafted with Workbench Tier 4 Best tool Luminous Transparent The sapling automatic planter is an industrial machine used to automatically plant saplings .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Sapling Automatic Planter 5 Red Bronze Ingot 2 Copper Plate 5 Copper Bolt Workbench Tier 4  Breaking [ ]  Sapling Automatic Planter Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 9 Stone 10 6 Iron 6 4 Gilded Steel 5 3 Diamond 3 2 Opal 3 2 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Planting saplings [ ]  The sapling automatic planter automatically plants a sapling on the block in-between its two "forks" if there is no pre-existing block there. Saplings can be inputted through the conveyor belt at one end and powered with petroleum fuel through the pipe at the other. The sapling automatic planter needs 1 unit of petroleum to begin running for approximately 1 minute.  History [ ]  August 15, 2021 Added sapling automatic planter. August 16, 2021 Sapling automatic planters now can plant any sapling. April 29, 2022 Fixed a bug where sapling automatic planters were able to place saplings on any block .  Trivia [ ]  When it was first introduced, there was a bug where the machine could only place down oak saplings . This was fixed the next day. Spirit saplings will not grow when planted next to the machine due to the hitbox being bigger. Spirit saplings also disappear when placed by the machine if a block is on the left or right side of the "forks".

title: Save_Slots
content: Save slots are a feature in Islands that allow players to have multiple "saves" or "profiles", each save includes its own separate: Player island , skill levels , wallet and player inventory . A player's save slots can be accessed by selecting the My Profiles button.  Features [ ]  New save [ ]  Players can create a new save by selecting an empty slot, this will open the "Save Settings" menu, which allows a player to select between a Solo slot or a Co-op slot, after selecting one the player will be sent to a new server on a starter island. It functions as though using a different account, except that all of a player's gamepasses apply to all saves.  Co-op saves [ ]  Co-op slots can have up to 7 "owners" which can all load into the island by themselves or join the existing one (If a member of that island is on the co-op save slot). To invite somebody to a co-op island open the save slots menu and select "invite", a player's invites can be found in this menu too.  Note: Co-op islands cannot be played on Private Servers.  Hardcore saves [ ]  Hardcore slots are similar to normal save slots, but some features are restricted/changed.  Restrictions/Changes in Hardcore slots: [ ]  Sidebar icons are colored red. Chat text color is purple for Hardcore players. Rules button under Profiles to view. Some icons are hidden to restrict Hardcore player access. Cannot use/craft Vending Machines . Mobs deal extra damage. Lose an amount of Coins upon death. Cannot give/receive build permissions. Void Crop Eater spawns on Player's Island at night.  Delete save [ ]  To delete a save the player must first be on a different save than the one they want to delete. At the top right of a save there is a trash can button, selecting it will give a warning and the option to delete it.  Switch save [ ]  To switch to another save players can open the save slots menu and select one of their other saves by selecting it. The player's current save is highlighted in blue.  Amount of saves [ ]  The number of saves a player can have depends on which ranked gamepasses they own.  Gamepasses Saves None 3 VIP Gamepass 6 PRO Gamepass 23 VIP and PRO 26  History [ ]  July 23, 2021 Save slots are added. August 8, 2021 Co-op save slots are added. December 29, 2021 Added the option to rename save slots. ? Changed the icon for save slots. July 9, 2022 Fixed a bug that caused the save slots UI to not appear. May 12, 2023 Hardcore save slots are added.  Trivia [ ]  The pictures above a slot’s name can be any one of these nine mobs : a Rabbit , Crab , Slime , Frog , Pig , Chicken , Sheep , Cow , or Bandit .

title: Scavenger
content: Scavenger Location None (Formerly Player's Island ) Purpose Offer a scavenger hunt during the Roblox Battles event The Scavenger was a villager that was located on the Player's Island during the Roblox Battles event in Islands . The villager offered a quest , which upon completing, rewarded the player with the Roblox Battles Trophy .  Quest [ ]  The following items were required to complete the quest.  5x Stone 5x Fish 2x Bread 10x Slime Balls 5x Coral 1x Tomato  Trivia [ ]  Unlike other villagers , the Scavenger does not have an animation. The Scavenger is the first villager able to visit a player's island , the second being Cletus , and the third being Fulco . Prior to July 2, 2022 , the Scavenger shared the same design as Jack .

title: Seasons
content: Seasons were introduced to Islands on March 13, 2021 . The spring, summer, fall, and winter seasons cycle every 24 hours, changing at 5 pm UTC ( 1 pm EDT / 10 am PDT ). During each season, grass and most trees change colors and certain villagers may visit the player's island to offer a limited amount of season-exclusive seeds .  The current season is indicated above the search bar when a player opens their inventory . Wind can also blow during any season, but it is aesthetic and serves no real purpose. Rain can fall during any season, but is more common in spring.  Seasons [ ]  Fall [ ]  During fall:  Cletus appears on the player's island . Pumpkin seeds can be bought for 1,040 coins . Pumpkins can be sold for 52 coins. Blueberry seeds can be purchased for 1,500 coins. Grass has a more yellow hue. Birch and oak trees have orange and yellow canopies. All fruit trees have a maroon-red canopy except for palm trees and kiwi trees .  Winter [ ]  During winter:  Fulco has a chance to visit the player's island . Fertile white roses can be bought for 450 coins . Grass has a white top layer. Rabbits can spawn. All trees have white leaves except for palm trees , kiwi trees , pine trees , and hickory trees .  Spring [ ]  During spring:  Cletus appears on the player's island . Radish seeds can be bought for 1,450 coins . Radishes can be sold for 59 coins. Blackberry seeds can be bought for 1,500 coins . With some possibility, Pineapple seeds can be bought for 2,850 coins . Pineapples can be sold for 96 coins . Tree canopies return to their usual green color. Grass returns to its normal green color. Rain has a higher chance of falling, thus frogs have a higher chance of spawning.  Summer [ ]  During summer:  Cletus has a 25% chance to visit the player's island . Watermelon seeds can be bought for 1,850 coins . Watermelons can be sold for 85 coins. Fulco appears on the player's island. Either fertile red roses or fertile blue roses can be bought for 220 coins. The canopies of oak , birch , and pine trees become more saturated. Grass has a brighter green color.  Trivia [ ]  Winter is the only season without a seasonal crop. All of the seasonal crops can be grown in any season.

title: Seaweed
content: Seaweed Planted on Pond Planter Edible Seaweed is a crop that grows in pond planters from seaweed seeds . Seaweed cannot be watered nor fertilized.  It currently cannot be sold to Cletus .  Obtaining [ ]  Harvesting [ ]  Harvesting a seaweed plant yields 1 - 4 seaweed, 1 seaweed seed , and 27 Farming XP (108 XP with the 4x daily bonus). The chance of obtaining more than one seaweed per plant is increased by the player's Farming level and for owners of the VIP gamepass . Extra seaweed seeds cannot be yielded. Watered ? Watered + Fertilized ?  History [ ]  November 13, 2021 Added seaweed seeds. May 27, 2022 Increased the chances of getting seaweed seeds when fishing . They are the only seeds that can be obtained from fishing. In real life, seaweeds do not produce seeds. When holding seaweed seeds, one fourth of the green icon turns white.

title: Seeds
content: Seeds are items that can be grown into various plants. There are two different types of seeds: crop seeds and flower seeds.  Crop seeds [ ]  Crop seeds are used to grow different crops that can then be harvested. Most seeds can be planted on farmland , but some can only be planted on grass , sand , trellises , or pond planters . title: Seed_Spreader
content: Seed Spreader Type Tool Description Use to speed up planting The seed spreader is an unimplemented item in Islands .  Obtaining [ ]  The seed spreader cannot be obtained by normal means. Only users with access to administrator commands can get this item.  Usage [ ]  Planting seeds [ ]  The seed spreader can be used to plant wheat seeds . When the seed spreader is used, it will plant wheat seeds on farmland that is in range of the player. It'll plant up to 12 seeds per use, but may plant less if the player does not have enough wheat seeds or the player is not in range of enough farmland. Only wheat seeds can be planted with this tool.  History [ ]  October 9, 2021 Added seed spreaders.  Trivia [ ]  The seed spreader uses the model of the diamond sickle as a placeholder.

title: September_10_2022
content: September 10, 2022 Basic Information Day released September 10, 2022 Version number 98 Version Navigator Previous version Next version September 3, 2022 September 17, 2022 The September 10, 2022 update, also known as the butterfly furniture update, is a minor update in Islands that added new butterfly-themed furniture and other small changes.  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added butterfly lanterns . Added new furniture blocks. Added gazebos with four different variants. Added frog topiary pots . Added rabbit topiary pots . title: September_17_2022
content: September 17, 2022 Basic Information Day released September 17, 2022 Version number 99 Version Navigator Previous version Next version September 10, 2022 September 24, 2022 The September 17, 2022 update, also known as the combat update part I, is a major update in Islands that revamped the combat system, adding many more mechanics, categories, and new weapons .  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added new weapon categories: Melee: Slashing. Striking. Piercing. Magic: Inferno. Hydro. Storm. Quake. Ethereal. Void. Added the Combat Catalogue . Added new idle, draw, and fire bow animations. Added golden shortbows . Added iron shortbows . Added stone short arrows . Added stone long arrows .  Modifications [ ]  Mobs are now weak, neutral, or resistant to certain weapon types. Revamped bows : The trajectory of arrows are now smoother. Bows now require specific types of arrows to use. Charging shots no longer increase the base power of projectiles of all magic weapons but the Slime Queen's scepter . Modified the base damage of many weapons: Static scepter : 2 HP/s → 8 HP/s. Spellbook : 45 HP → 22 HP. Tidal spellbook : 42 HP → 36 HP. Ruby staff : 42 HP → 36 HP. Staff of Godzilla : 25 HP → 20 HP. Spirit spellbook : White projectiles: 40 HP → 30 HP. Blue projectiles: 45 HP → 37 HP. Pink projectiles: 48 HP → 42 HP. Green projectiles: 55 HP → 46 HP. Slime Queen's scepter: 50 HP → 40 HP. Ranged weapons shoot in the direction of the player's cursor (PC only). The damage indicator changes color based on weapon type. Renamed the basic bow to "Wooden Shortbow". Renamed the artifact bow renamed to "Ancient Longbow". Renamed the vamp bow renamed to "Azarathian Longbow". Increased the sell price of potatoes from 11 coins to 17 coins. Decreased the sell price of radishes from 64 coins to 59 coins. title: September_18_2020
content: September 18, 2020 Basic Information Day released September 18th, 2020 Version number 21 Version Navigator Previous version Next version September 6, 2020 October 3, 2020 The September 18, 2020 update, or more commonly known as the Factory update, is the 21st update in Islands. This update added steel and copper as well as multiple new machines. It also brought new display blocks such as the Weapon Stand and Small Fish Tank .  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Items & Blocks [ ]  Added Copper ore . Added molds: Rod Factory Mold , Plate Factory Mold , and Bolt Factory Mold . Added steel and copper bolts, plates and rods. Added gearbox Added Weapon stand Added Small Fish Tank and Medium Fish Tank Added 4 fish tank decoration blueprints obtained from fishing and collecting coral . Fish Tank Castle , Fish Tank Shipwreck , Fish Tank Anchor & Fish Tank Treasure Chest  Machines [ ]  Added Drill Added Steel mill Added Steel press Added Copper press  Merchants [ ]  Added Mechanic Merchant that buys factory products in exchange for coins.  Modifications [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Moved display case recipes to the Carpentry Bench . Steel Rods now require Steel Ingots instead of Iron and Coal . Workbench Tier 3 now needs 450 iron instead of 20 steel rods Food processor now needs 10 gold , 5 green sticky gears , and 2 steel rods instead of 3 crystallized gold and 10 steel rods .  Nerfs/Buffs [ ]  Nerfed berry 's sell price. Gold node spawn rate increased and now drops more gold. Crystalized Iron drop rate decreased from 2% (1/50) to 1.5% (1/75)  Bug Fixes [ ]  Fixed worker blocks consuming all fuel items instead of just one. General bug fixes and performance improvements. title: September_24_2022
content: September 24, 2022 Basic Information Day released September 24, 2022 Version number 100 Version Navigator Previous version Next version September 17, 2022 October 1, 2022 The September 24, 2022 update, also known as the combat update part II, is a major update in Islands that balanced weapon categories and improved changes with bows .  Content [ ]  Additions [ ]  Added wood target blocks . Added iron target blocks . Added target stands . Added iron short arrows . Added iron long arrows . Added steel short arrows . Added steel long arrows . Players can now switch between arrows when using bows .  Modifications [ ]  Changed the weaknesses and resistances for all mobs . Void hounds no longer spawn on Desert Island . Bows can now be placed in tool stands . Arrows now show a trail when shot. The sound effect that plays when an arrow hits a mob now plays no matter the distance the player is. Changed the crafting recipe of stone short arrows and stone long arrows . Added damage indicator colors based on the effectiveness of a weapon. Nerfed the static scepter's damage from 8 HP to 5 HP. The Magic skill now grants +0.2 Magic damage per level instead of +3% Magic damage. The Archery skill now grants +0.2 Bow damage per level instead of +0.5 Bow damage. Increased the sell price of watermelon from 80 coins to 85 coins. Decreased the sell price of spinach from 18 coins to 14 coins. Changed ruby swords from slashing to ethereal weapons. title: September_6_2020
content: September 6, 2020 Basic Information Day released September 6, 2020 Version number 20 Version Navigator Previous version Next version August 30, 2020 September 18, 2020 The September 6, 2020 update, or more commonly known as the Firefly update, is the 20th update in Islands. This update added the firefly mob , new lighting blocks, a new tool to catch insects and much more.  Changes [ ]  Additions [ ]  Fireflies [ ]  Fireflies now appear during night time. A 2% chance for a rainbow firefly night event .  Items & Blocks [ ]  Net tool to catch bees and fireflies . Display case blocks to show off insects caught. Small display case & large display case . Added light source blocks that can be colored using caught fireflies. Added bee jars along with a variety of jars for fireflies.  Lighting [ ]  Added firefly garden light and firefly wall lamp to the lighting station . Added the firefly lantern to free workbenches.  Audio & Effects [ ]  Added special music while in combat. Added a blueprint learn effect. Industrial smelters and sawmills effects overhaul.  Modifications [ ]  Bug Fixes [ ]  Fixed an issue that caused interaction to break on mobile. Fixed several inventory issues on Xbox. Fixed a bug that caused worker block production to only take 5 seconds. We'll keep an eye on this to make sure the new timers aren't too long.  Other changes [ ]  New chest model and animations. Rewrote the interact system. Changed the way factories handle physics to improve server performance. Worker blocks ( Campfire , furnace , etc) now have progress bars. Added a quick collect shortcut to worker blocks. title: Serpent27s_Bane
content: Serpent's Bane Type Heavy Melee Physical class Slashing Attack damage 65 HP (Base) +33 (Critical) Recipe 3 Serpent's Scale 40 Amethyst Crystal 200 Iron Ingot 10 Gilded Steel Rod Crafted with Anvil Required skill Level 68 Heavy Melee Description An almighty powerful greatsword forged from the Serpent's scales! The serpent's bane is a heavy melee weapon in the slashing class.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Serpent's Bane 3 Serpent's Scale 40 Amethyst Crystal 200 Iron Ingot 10 Gilded Steel Rod Anvil Level 68 Heavy Melee  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Heavy Melee , the serpent's bane deals a base damage of 65 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal an extra 33 HP of damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Heavy Melee skill and it is in the slashing class.  Like other melee weapon , only one player can hit damage in each hostile mob. Multiple players cannot hit damage together.  History [ ]  August 13, 2022 Added serpent's banes. September 17, 2022 Serpent's banes are now a slashing weapon. October 1, 2022 Level 68 Heavy Melee is now required to craft serpent's banes instead of level 68 Combat .  Trivia [ ]  The serpent's bane is the second strongest melee weapon , with the reaper's scythe being the first. Unlike serpent's hooks and the reaper's scythes, it is not in the void class despite having void attributes.

title: Serpent27s_Fang
content: Serpent's Fang Dropped by Void Serpent Description Rare drop from the Void Serpent used for crafting. A serpent's fang is an item rarely dropped by the Void Serpent .  Obtaining [ ]  Mob drop [ ]  The Void Serpent has a 5% chance of dropping a serpent's fang upon defeat. title: Serpent27s_Hook
content: Serpent's Hook Type Light Melee Physical class Slashing Magical class Void Attack damage 55 HP (Base) +28 HP (Critical) 14 HP (Spin) Recipe 3 Serpent's Fang 30 Amethyst Crystal 100 Iron Ingot 5 Gilded Steel Rod Crafted with Anvil Required skill Level 68 Light Melee Description A rapid style blade forged from the Serpent's fang! The serpent's hook is a light melee weapon in the slashing and void classes.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Serpent's Hook 3 Serpent's Fang 30 Amethyst Crystal 100 Iron Ingot 5 Gilded Steel Rod Anvil Level 68 Light Melee  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Light Melee , the serpent's hook deals a base damage of 55 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal an extra 28 HP of damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Light Melee skill and it is in the slashing and void classes.  Like other melee weapon , only one player can hit damage in each hostile mob. Multiple players cannot hit damage together.  Spinning [ ]  Holding down while the serpent's hook is equipped will cause it to do a spin attack, dealing 14 HP of damage and hits twice per second but cannot deal critical hits . Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Light Melee skill.  History [ ]  August 13, 2022 Added serpent's hooks. September 17, 2022 Serpent's hooks are now a slashing weapon. September 24, 2022 Serpent's hooks are now a void weapon. October 1, 2022 Level 68 Light Melee is now required to craft serpent's hooks instead of level 68 Combat . October 8, 2022 Serpent's hooks now weaken attacks from hostile mobs whenever the mobs are attacked.  Trivia [ ]  It is also one of the only weapons with a physical and magical classification, with the others being the frost hammer , the frost sword , the infernal hammer , the trout's fury , the reaper's scythe , and the jolly dagger . If the mob has a weakness or resistance to both of its classification, then the damage multiplier will be either higher or lower than normal. While if the mob has a weakness and resistance to each of its classification, then neutral damage will apply.

title: Serpent_Egg
content: Serpent Egg Unopened Opened Type of block Solid block; Interactable Dropped by Void Serpent Best tool Luminous Transparent A serpent egg is a roulette block that can be obtained by defeating the Void Serpent .  Obtaining [ ]  Mob drop [ ]  The Void Serpent is guaranteed to drop one serpent egg upon defeat. However, if too many players are fighting the serpent, only a set amount of players will receive an egg.  Loot [ ]  Serpent eggs can be opened by holding "F" on PC, holding the button on mobile, or holding X on Xbox while hovering over it. Once opened, the serpent egg will scroll through the items like a roulette wheel and reward one item, similar to treasure chests .  The listed reward chances are community made and may not be accurate .  Item Rarity Estimated % chance Void Serpent Pet Spawn Egg Mythic 1% Void Mattock Hilt Rare 2% Void Parasite Seeds Rare 2% 3 Void Fish Rare 5% 15 - 30 Void Serpent Token Uncommon 15% 14 - 30 Amethyst Crystal Common 75%  Note: Once opened, breaking a serpent egg will NOT be returned to the player's inventory . After collecting the rewarded item, the egg will act as a storage block with a single slot able to hold 100 items.  History [ ]  August 20, 2022 Added serpent eggs. October 22, 2022 Added a present icon next to unopened serpent eggs.

title: Settings_Menu
content: The Settings Menu is UI element added on March 13, 2021 . The settings menu can be opened by pressing the gear icon on the left side of the player's screen.  Settings  Sound  Music  A 10-position slider that adjusts the volume of the in-game music .  Atmosphere  A 10-position slider that adjusts the volume atmospheric/ambient sounds, such as the cave noises in the Diamond Mines .  Sound effects  A 10-position slider that adjusts the volume of items that emit sounds.  Graphics  Enable shadows  Toggles shadows (turning shadows off can reduce lag)  Social  Invite notifications  Stops island invite notifications from appearing if disabled.  Friend join notifications  Stops the notifications that appear when a friend joins the game if disabled.  Gameplay  Auto replant saplings  Stops tree saplings from automatically replanting after a player cuts one down if disabled.  PVP  Enables PvP if turned on.  Hide Icons  Hides the icon of a player's status over a player's island if turned on.  History  March 13, 2021 Added settings menu. July 23, 2021 Added auto replant sapling setting. November 18, 2022 Added the PVP setting. Moved the Hide Icons setting from the Permissions Menu to the Settings Menu. November 25, 2022 Removed animations from the Settings Menu.  Gallery  Trivia  The sound effects for Weapons , Kor , Breaking Rock Nodes, and industrial machines do not fall into a category and will therefore still make noise regardless of a player's settings. There is a bug where settings does not save while leave server or teleport to other servers sometimes.

title: Sheep
content: Sheep Sheep Sheared Birthday Behavior Passive Location Player's Island  A sheep is a large passive mob that can be spawned using a sheep spawn egg once the player is level 21 in Animal Care . It can grow up into adult sheep after roughly 12 hours.  It is the second animal passive mob in Islands .  Obtaining [ ]  Sheep are obtainable by buying sheep spawn eggs at Taliyah's store at level 21 in Animal Care.  Animal skin [ ]  A sheep's skin can be changed to the birthday skin if the player bought it for 399 Robux .  Interaction [ ]  Shearing [ ]  Using shears , players can shear a sheep for wool . Note: unlike the bucket , players do not lose the shears after using them. Wool blocks resemble a snow block and can be placed and used as a building or decoration block . Once players are level 24 in Animal Care, the cloth loom , which turns wool to cloth , is unlocked. Wool and cloth can be sold to Taliyah respectively for 120 and 350 coins. When a sheep's coat grows, it will walk to a scratching post and scratch it off, leaving one wool.  Feeding [ ]  Sheep can be fed approximately every 90-100 seconds (multiple times if its hunger is sufficiently depleted). Sheep eat potatoes , but will also each have its own favorite foods. The foods a sheep can have as their favorites are apple pie , lemon bread , candy apple , lemon puff , orange cake , and orange honeycomb . Feeding a sheep one of their favorite foods will increase the amount of wool the fed sheep produces, as well as increase the happiness/friendship status of the sheep.  A wooden , metal trough , or automated trough can also be used to feed a sheep.  Like other animals , if no troughs are in its vicinity, it will eat from a grass block , but doing so will not replenish its hunger meter nor give Animal Care XP.  Mounting [ ]  A sheep can be mounted using the inspection menu. When players level 8 in animal care, they can ride a sheep to anywhere when mounting including the hub, mob islands etc. To get off, press the dismount button on the right of the screen. Players can use tools / weapons when mounting. If a player falls in the void when riding, their animal will respawn. If a player dismounts their animal in other people's island or a mob island, it will respawn in their base. Mounting a sheep does not grant any boosts.  History [ ]  January 22, 2021 Added sheep. Introduced where sheep are now able to eat grass blocks if no troughs are nearby. January 25, 2021 Sheep fall asleep much later in the day. Sheep can no longer be fed while asleep. February 19, 2021 Added birthday sheep skin. Sheep can now be mounted. February 26, 2021 The birthday sheep skin is made unobtainable.  Trivia [ ]  Sheep are the first and only animal that when harvested directly gives a block. Like all other animals, sheep may eat from a grass block instead of from troughs, but doing so will not replenish their hunger meter nor give Animal Care XP. This can be done if no troughs are nearby. The eating sound of sheep is reduced when eating a grass block. Sheep are the second animal passive mob in Islands , the first being cows . Sheep share many things with other animals . Sheep share the same eating sound as cows, pigs , turkey , yaks , and horses . Sheep have the same animations as cows, pigs, and yaks. Sheep have the same eye model as cows, pigs, chickens , frogs , and rabbits . Sheep are able to move with the sleeping animation, but this can be fixed by mounting and dismounting them. The hitbox of players is slightly increased when mounting a sheep. Sheep have the highest number of favorite foods , with the second being chickens and ducks .

title: Sheep_Spawn_Egg
content: Sheep Spawn Egg Buy cost (Tier 1) 5500 coins Required skill Level 21 Animal Care (to purchase tier 1) Description Spawn a sheep with tier 1/2/3 trait maximums. Eats potatoes. The sheep spawn egg is an Animal spawn egg used to spawn sheep on a player's island . There are 3 tiers of sheep spawn egg, one can be purchased while the other two can only be obtained through breeding.  Obtaining [ ]  Tier 1 [ ]  Tier 1 sheep spawn eggs can be purchased from Taliyah for 5,500 Coins after a player reaches level 21 in the Animal Care skill. They can also be obtained through breeding two sheep with low traits (See Tier 2 and 3).  Tier 2 and 3 [ ]  Tier 2 and 3 sheep spawn eggs can only be obtained through breeding two sheep with high traits. To breed sheep feed each one of them a potion of fertility during the day (in-game). If the sheep have high enough traits it will produce a tier 3 egg, while very low traits make a tier 1 and a tier 2 with medium traits.  Usage [ ]  Spawning sheep [ ]  To spawn a sheep on a Player Island , the player must be the owner of that island. And they must also have a big enough max large animal island size. And then the player must click/tap anywhere while holding the egg.  History [ ]  January 22, 2021 Added sheep spawn eggs.

title: Sign
content: Sign Oak Birch Pine Maple Hickory Spirit Cherry Blossom Type of block Non-solid block Recipe 3 Log Crafted with Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Best tool Luminous Transparent A sign is a non-solid block that can display text. A sign can be placed on both the ground and on a wall. There are 7 variations of signs: oak , birch , pine , maple , hickory , spirit , and cherry blossom .  Text [ ]  When a player places a sign, their camera will zoom in on the sign at a fixed position. A sign can hold up to 64 characters (4 lines) and also supports emojis and ASCII (somewhat) entirely.  Text written on the sign may be censored by ROBLOX and may be tagged after completing writing.  Despite it not being visible, the user can select text within the sign using Ctrl + A / the Arrow Keys in order to copy and paste or quickly delete text. title: Skill_Levels
content: Skill levels , also known as XP levels, is a feature that was added in the January 22, 2021 update. Players can gain XP towards different categories by doing different actions. Upon obtaining a sufficient amount of XP, players may level up and obtain access to new villager trades or crafting recipes. The amount of XP needed to gain a level increases with every level-up.  Every day, there is a daily bonus that quadruples XP gain until a certain amount is reached, this is called your Daily Bonus. The max amount required to finish the daily bonus scales with the level, meaning that higher levels have a higher daily bonus. Upon the end of your Daily Bonus you will not receive its boost. But at the start of each new day it will reset for you to continue using your Daily Bonus. To increase the boost amount, players can also pay 99 Robux for a 50% boost only on one skill, another skill boost would cost another 99 Robux.  Skills are divided into 3 groups differentiated by color: brown, green and red. Brown skills are related to gathering resources/coins, greens are aimed at the production of goods and reds train mostly everything related to combat.  To open the skill levels menu, tap on the three bars icon on the left, or tap the "J" key for PC players. Tidal Spellbook recipe (Lvl. 20) Ruby Staff recipe (Lvl. 36) Spirit Spellbook recipe (Lvl. 40)  Gallery [ ]  Trivia [ ]  The maximum level for every skill is 100. Prior to February 3, 2023 , it was 99. The XP and experience orb particles will still be given even if the player has maxed out their skill levels. The "4x daily bonus" will be unavailable and decreased to "0/0". However, the effect of Experience Boost will still affect the amount received of XP. If the player receives 15 XP or less, the amount received of XP will not appear and nothing happens. If the player receives 18 XP or more, the amount received of XP will still appear. However, the amount displayed of XP will be decreased to 20%, 17.5%, 15%, 12.5%, and then 10%. 10% is the minimum amount displayed of XP when receives 501 XP or more. Despite being a "4x daily bonus", the bonus is not always 4x the original amount. The background image of the error message appearing if the player doesn't have the required level to use and item or block used to have a picture from Minecraft Dungeons . This was later changed to the November 1, 2020 update banner. The Economy and Forging are the only two skills that don't have any base stats. Prior to November 13, 2021 , the Cooking skill didn't have a base stat.

title: Skull_Island
content: Skull Island Resources Palm Tree Villagers Bosco Skull Island was accessible during the Godzilla Vs. Kong event which took place on March 19, 2021 . It was where the Kong quests were located. It was accessed by it's portal in the Hub or by pressing the Kong event button, found on the right of a player's screen.  Resources [ ]  Only two resources could have been found on Skull Island :  Palm Tree Coconuts  Mobs [ ]  The only "mob" found on this island was Kong, who just walked around the island. Kong stopped to drink occasionally, but players were never able to go on him, because he was not a functional object. As he was not a hostile mob, he was immune to any form of weapon damage and had no collision.  Villagers [ ]  Bosco gave quests during the event rewarding the player with the Kong Trophy , Kong's Axe , and the Kong Badge .  Terrain [ ]  Skull River [ ]  A river flows around the middle of the island which Kong walks in, it wasn't deep enough to swim in and didn't hold any Fish .  Bone Piles [ ]  There are 8 bone piles scattered around the island they look exactly like the bones on Desert Island , Bosco's has a quest to study 5 of them. Note: There are bigger bone formations that cannot be studied .  Skull Mountain [ ]  A giant skull can be found atop a mountain to the right of spawn, Bosco asks player's to retrieve his pouch from it.  Mountains [ ]  There are 5 mountains scattered about the island 3 of which have binoculars on them, 1 for the skull and 1 that is useless and extremely hard to climb.  Trivia [ ]  There was originally a glitch that allowed Palm Trees to be chopped down for Oak Wood , but they never respawned. This was fixed minutes after it was found. During the event, exploiters using fly or teleport hacks were rampant. They would teleport and harvest coconuts from trees as soon as they spawned in order to farm saplings. The bone piles are based on the remains of Kong's Family and relatives killed by the Skullcrawlers .

title: Slab

Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  The slab crafting ratio is 1:2, meaning that 1 plank , brick , or other material will make 2 of its respective slab type. In the crafting UI, the oak slabs, stone brick slabs, and slate slabs recipes contain the crafting recipes of slabs made with wooden planks, minerals smoothed and/or cut, and minerals neither smoothed nor cut, respectively.  The mossy , cobblestone , and void stone slab variant recipes are separated from the three slab categories above. Gilded Steel 5 5 Diamond 3 3 Opal 3 3 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Placement [ ]  Slabs can occupy either the top half or the bottom half of a block, or both:  Placing a slab on top of a block or in the lower half of a block's side surface creates a bottom slab. Placing a slab on the underside of a block or on the top half of the side surface creates a top slab. Two slabs cannot be placed in the same block.  Slabs cannot be oriented vertically.  History [ ]  May 26, 2020 Added oak , pine , birch , maple , stone brick , and brick slabs. August 2, 2020 Added hickory slabs. August 9, 2020 Added red sandstone and red sandstone brick slabs. April 4, 2021 Added slate , slate brick , marble , aquamarine , and aquamarine brick slabs. April 24, 2021 Added sandstone and sandstone brick slabs. May 8, 2021 Added marble brick slabs. Changed the texture of oak, pine, birch, maple, hickory, red sandstone brick, and aquamarine brick slabs. May 21, 2021 Reverted modified slab textures. Renamed prismarine slabs to aquamarine slabs. June 4, 2021 Added smooth sandstone , smooth sandstone brick , smooth red sandstone , smooth red sandstone brick , smooth aquamarine , and smooth aquamarine brick slabs. June 30, 2021 Added spirit slabs. March 6, 2022 Added andesite , andesite brick , diorite , diorite brick , granite , and granite brick slabs. March 6, 2022 Added basalt and basalt brick slabs. July 16, 2022 Added mossy , cobblestone , and mossy cobblestone slabs. August 27, 2022 Added void stone , void stone cobble , void stone polished , void stone brick , void stone tiled , and void stone carved slabs. November 25, 2022 Added colored solid and pastel slabs. January 20, 2023 Added cherry blossom slabs.  Trivia [ ]  Before the May 21, 2021 update, aquamarine slabs were incorrectly titled as prismarine slabs. Andesite , diorite , granite , and basalt slabs are placed in the wrong slab category in the crafting UI. All slabs added after the July 16, 2022 update are not included under the three main slab categories; instead, they are present in their own crafting box. Animals cannot jump over slabs and may instead get stuck in them.

title: Slate
content: Slate Slate Rock Spawns Buffalkor Island Best tool Luminous Transparent Slate is a block that can be mined from slate rocks .  Obtaining [ ]  Mining [ ]  Slate rocks naturally generate on Buffalkor Island in the hole in front of the Slime Portal . Mining a slate rock yields 1 - 3 slate after each stage and 6 Mining XP (24 with the 4x daily bonus), resulting in a total of 2 - 6 slate and 12 Mining XP (48 with the 4x daily bonus) per rock.  Totems [ ]  Slate totems can be purchased from Arius in the Hub for 30,000 coins after reaching level 32 Mining . A slate totem will spawn slate rocks around it when placed, or if placed next to a conveyor belt , the totem will drop slate directly onto the conveyor. Image Item Drop chance Red Jukebox Disk 0.35% Yellow Jukebox Disk 0.35% Blue Jukebox Disk 0.35% Green Jukebox Disk 0.01% Orange Jukebox Disk 0.01% Purple Jukebox Disk 0.01%  Statistics [ ]  Image Name Damage Health Speed Resistances Weaknesses Physical Magical Physical Magical Green Slime 5 HP 100 HP 4 None Hydro Slashing Inferno Blue Slime 5 HP 100 HP 4 None Hydro Slashing Inferno Pink Slime 5 HP 100 HP 4 None Hydro Slashing Inferno Frost Slime 5 HP 100 HP 4 None Hydro Slashing Inferno Slime King 5 - 25 HP 1,500 HP 2 Striking Hydro Slashing Inferno Slime Queen 20 HP 14,000 HP 3 Striking Hydro , Ethereal Slashing Inferno , Void  Trivia [ ]  Slimes used to have different damage and health values. Slimes used to be able to drop buffalkor island keys , but stopped after island keys were removed in the February 5, 2021 update. Slimes currently have the highest amount of variants, being 6. Slimes had a chance to drop a slime ornament during the Christmas 2021 event. The rarities of slimes from most common to rarest is the same as in Terraria (green being the most common and pink being the rarest in both games). The Slime King used be the only boss to have less health than a regular mob , having 200 less health than the ruby skorp before July 9, 2022 . At the release of the update, its health was buffed and is now higher than the ruby skorp's. The Slime Queen shares the same magical resistances and weaknesses as Fhanhorn . They are also the only bosses with the ability to heal themselves.

title: Slime_Ball
content: Slime Ball Green Blue Pink Frosty Dropped by Green Slime Blue Slime Pink Slime Frost Slime Slime King Slime Queen Sell price Green: 5 coins Blue: 35 coins Pink: 125 coins Description Green, Blue, Pink: Gooey. Frosty: Remainder of a frozen slime. A slime ball is an item dropped by slimes . There are 4 variations dropped by their respective slime type, being the green, blue, pink, and frosty slime balls. Aside from frosty slime balls, they can be sold for coins to Ivon .  Obtaining [ ]  Mob drop [ ]  Green slimes , blue slimes , and pink slimes are guaranteed to drop 1 of their respective slime ball upon defeat and a 50% chance of dropping 2. The Slime King is guaranteed to drop 20 green slime balls upon defeat, and the Slime Queen is guaranteed to drop 4 - 8 pink slime balls upon defeat.  During the Christmas 2020 event, players could defeat frost slimes for a guaranteed chance of 1 frosty slime ball and a 50% chance of 2.
