title: Steel_Ingot
content: Steel Ingot Recipe 1 Iron Ingot Crafted with Steel Mill Blast Furnace Description Refined steel ingot. Used for crafting. A steel ingot is a primary industrial material made with iron ingots in a steel mill or a blast furnace .  Obtaining [ ]  Transforming [ ]  Iron ingots can be transformed into steel ingots in a steel mill or a blast furnace . December 11, 2020 Steel ingots can now be used to upgrade the electrical workbench . August 15, 2021 Steel ingots can now be used to craft pipe junctions , petroleum tanks , and oil tanks . April 9, 2022 Steel ingots can now be used to craft teleporter pads and orb stands . May 20, 2022 Steel ingots can now be obtained through blast furnaces . 20 steel ingots are now required to craft steel rods , down from 25. September 17, 2022 Steel ingots can now be used to craft ancient longbows and azarathian longbows . September 24, 2022 Steel ingots can now be used to craft steel short arrows and steel long arrows . title: Steel_Long_Arrow
content: Steel Long Arrow Type Large arrow Physical class Piercing Attack damage 20 - 27 HP 34 - 46 HP (Fully charged) Recipe 4 Hickory Wood 2 Steel Ingot Crafted with Anvil Required skill Level 37 Archery Description An elegant arrow that can be shot from longbows.  Steel long arrows are large arrows that can be shot from longbows .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill 2 Steel Long Arrow 4 Hickory Wood 2 Steel Ingot Anvil Level 37 Archery  Usage [ ]  Ammunition [ ]  Steel long arrows are used as ammunition in longbows , as at least one is required to be in the player's inventory in order for the bow to fire. Shooting a steel long arrow deals an extra 20 - 27 HP to mobs .  Steel long arrows are a one-time use item , meaning they cannot be retrieved after they have been shot.  History [ ]  September 24, 2022 Added steel long arrows. ? Changed the recipe from 6 hickory wood and 4 steel ingot to 4 hickory wood and 2 steel ingot.  Trivia [ ]  Unlike stone short arrows , the limit of steel long arrows is 2,000 instead of 20,000.

title: Steel_Mill
content: Steel Mill Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 100 Iron Ingot 50 Gold Ingot Crafted with Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Best tool Luminous Transparent The steel mill is an industrial machine used to convert iron ingots into steel ingots .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Steel Mill 100 Iron Ingot 50 Gold Ingot Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Breaking [ ]  Steel Mill Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 9 Stone 10 6 Iron 6 4 Gilded Steel 5 3 Diamond 3 2 Opal 3 2 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Transforming [ ]  Steel mills convert iron ingots into steel ingots . There are a total of four slots inside the machine, each able to hold only one item - one for iron ingots and the other 3 for fuel. It takes approximately 20 seconds to completely transform an iron ingot into a steel ingot.  The input conveyor must be receiving coal or petrified petroleum as fuel and iron ingots to turn into steel ingots. Iron ore will NOT work. After an iron ingot is turned into a steel ingot, the steel ingot will be outputted through the conveyor belt at the other side of the machine. It also yields 3 Forging XP (18 with the 4x daily bonus) for each ingot transformed.  Input Output 1 Iron Ingot ➡ 1 Steel Ingot  History [ ]  September 18, 2020 Added steel mills. December 29, 2021 Disabled the ability to manually place items into steel mills. January 2, 2022 Re-enabled the ability to manually place items into steel mills. January 3, 2022 Disabled the ability to manually place items into steel mills. Re-enabled the ability to manually place items into steel mills. January 4, 2022 Disabled the ability to manually place items into steel mills. January 6, 2022 Re-enabled the ability to manually place items into steel mills.  Trivia [ ]  The steel mill shares the same model as the red bronze refinery but with a slightly different texture and color. When the steel mill is active, smoke comes out from the top.

title: Steel_Ore
content: Steel Ore Steel ore is an unused ore in Islands . It cannot be obtained and does not have a use. It was likely meant to be smelted into steel ingots, and therefore used in rods and other parts, but was replaced by the steel mill .  History [ ]  September 18, 2020 Added steel ore.

May 17, 2020 Steel rods can now be used to craft industrial stonecutters , gilded steel rods , and iron war axes . Steel rods can now be molded with 25 steel ingots using a steel press and rod factory mold . Steel rods can now be used to craft steel presses, copper presses , drills , and red bronze refineries . title: Stone
content: Stone Stone Rock Spawns Player's Island Hub Slime Island Best tool Luminous Transparent Stone is a block that can be mined from wild rocks or stone rocks in the Hub and Slime Island .  Obtaining [ ]  Natural generation [ ]  The player automatically starts with 3,047 blocks of stone on their island .  Mining [ ]  Stone rocks naturally spawn in the Hub and on Slime Island . Mining a stone rock grants 4 - 6 stone and 3 Mining XP (6 with the 4x daily bonus) per stage, resulting in a total of 8 - 12 stone and 6 Mining XP (12 with the 4x daily bonus) per rock.  Additionally, mining a wild rock on the player's island will drop 1 stone.  Mining a fossil rock grants the player ??-?? stone.  Totems [ ]  Stone totems can be purchased from Arius in the Hub for 2,000 coins after reaching level 10 Mining . A stone totem will spawn stone rocks around it when placed, or if placed next to a conveyor belt , the totem will drop stone directly onto the conveyor. title: Stonecutter
content: Stonecutter Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 40 Iron Ingot Crafted with Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Best tool Luminous Transparent Description Converts stone into stone bricks. The stonecutter is an item transformer used to cut blocks into their brick, tiled, or carved variant.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Stonecutter 40 Iron Ingot Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Breaking [ ]  Stonecutter Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 9 Stone 10 6 Iron 6 4 Gilded Steel 5 3 Diamond 3 2 Opal 3 2 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Transforming [ ]  Stonecutters can be used to cut certain blocks into their brick, tiled, or carved variant. It has three slots able to hold one item each in its user interface—two for unprocessed blocks and one for fuel. When powered with coal or petrified petroleum , the stonecutter will activate for approximately 50 seconds. During this time, it will begin cutting any uncut blocks inside, taking 16 seconds per block.  If a stonecutter is depleted of fuel while cutting, any unprocessed blocks remaining inside will keep their conversion progress. Progress is lost upon removing the incomplete material or if the owner of the island the stonecutter is located on leaves. July 11, 2020 Stonecutters can now cut aquamarine blocks . August 9, 2020 Stonecutters can now cut red sandstone . September 6, 2020 Added a progress bar for blocks being transformed in the stonecutter. Added a quick collect shortcut. Fixed a bug causing blocks to become cut in 5 seconds instead of 16. September 8, 2020 Removed the stonecutter's working animation. Blocks no longer despawn inside stonecutters. September 18, 2020 Fixed a bug causing the stonecutter to consume all fuel items instead of just one. April 4, 2021 Stonecutters can now cut slate and marble . April 24, 2021 Stonecutters can now cut sandstone . June 4, 2021 Stonecutters can now cut smooth aquamarine , smooth sandstone , and smooth red sandstone . August 15, 2021 Stonecutters can now be powered with petrified petroleum . August 16, 2021 Fixed an issue preventing the progress bars of blocks from updating. December 18, 2021 Stonecutters can now cut compact ice . February 19, 2022 Stonecutters can now cut stone bricks , aquamarine bricks , slate bricks , marble bricks , stone tiles , aquamarine tiles , slate tiles , and marble tiles . March 6, 2022 Stonecutters can now cut andesite , diorite , granite , andesite bricks , diorite bricks , granite bricks , andesite tiles , diorite tiles , and granite tiles . April 1, 2022 Updated the GUI to have one slot for the unheated item, one for the final product, and one for the fuel instead of two for items and one for fuel. 50 items can now queued to be heated in a slot, up from 2. June 18, 2022 Stonecutters can now cut basalt , basalt bricks , and basalt tiles . August 27, 2022 Stonecutters can now cut void stone blocks , void stone bricks , void stone cobbles , void stone polished , and void stone carved .  Trivia [ ]  Despite the fact that stonecutters are able to cut various blocks since its release, its description remains unchanged, only stating that it can convert stone into stone bricks .

title: Stone_Long_Arrow
content: Stone Long Arrow Type Large arrow Physical class Piercing Attack damage 13 - 18 HP 22 - 31 HP (Fully charged) Recipe 4 Oak Wood 2 Stone Crafted with Anvil Description A basic arrow that can be shot from longbows  Stone long arrows are large arrows that can be shot from longbows .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station 2 Stone Long Arrow 4 Oak Wood 2 Stone Anvil  Usage [ ]  Ammunition [ ]  Stone long arrows are used as ammunition in longbows , as at least one is required to be in the player's inventory in order for the bow to fire. Shooting a stone long arrow deals an extra 13 - 18 HP to mobs .  Stone long arrows are a one-time use item , meaning they cannot be retrieved after they have been shot.  History [ ]  September 17, 2022 Added stone long arrows. September 24, 2022 Changed the recipe from 3 oak wood and 6 stone to 6 oak wood and 2 stone. ? Changed the recipe from 6 oak wood to 4 oak wood.  Trivia [ ]  Unlike stone short arrows , the limit of stone long arrows is 2,000 instead of 20,000.  See also [ ]  Iron Long Arrow Steel Long Arrow

title: Stone_Shovel
content: Stone Shovel Type Tool Recipe 20 Stone 10 Oak Wood Crafted with Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Description Used to collect snow from snow piles in the Hub. A stone shovel is a tool that is used to collect snow and dig up treasure chests . It functions the same as the Christmas shovel , and only visually differs from it.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Stone Shovel 20 Stone 10 Oak Wood Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Davey [ ]  Upon the release of the July 17, 2021 update, players could obtain a stone shovel when first interacting with Davey on the player's island . However, Davey no longer gave the player a stone shovel since the following day.  Usage [ ]  The stone shovel can be used to shovel piles of snow on the Hub's Mountain or dig up buried treasure chests found through the help of a treasure map . If there is nothing to be shoveled, it will emit grey particles after an animation, but if there is, a different animation will play and the shovel will emit snowflake-shaped particles. Stone shovels can also be used to break blocks on the player's island.  History [ ]  December 18, 2020 Added stone shovels. July 17, 2021 A stone shovel can be received when first interacting with Davey on the player's island . July 18, 2021 A stone shovel can no longer be received when first interacting with Davey on the player's island. July 30, 2021 The stone shovel can now break blocks on your island. December 10, 2021 Removed animations of stone shovel due to lag. ? Re-added the stone shovel's animations.  Trivia [ ]  The stone shovel has the least efficiency among other tools like wood, stone, iron, glided steel. The efficiency is close to wooden tools.

title: Stone_Sword
content: Stone Sword Type Light Melee Physical class Slashing Attack damage 15 HP (Base) +8 HP (Critical) Recipe 40 Stone 10 Oak Wood Crafted with Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 The stone sword is a light melee weapon in the slashing class.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Stone Sword 40 Stone 10 Oak Wood Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Light Melee , the stone sword deals a base damage of 15 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal an extra 8 HP of damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Light Melee skill and it is in the slashing class.  Like other melee weapon , only one player can hit damage in each hostile mob. Multiple players cannot hit damage together.  History [ ]  July 9, 2021 Added stone swords. September 17, 2022 Stone swords are now a slashing weapon.  Trivia [ ]  The stone sword deals the same amount of damage as the iron sword .

title: Strength
content: Strength Causes The affected player to deal 30% more damage with any Melee Weapon . Source Strength Potion Type Drink  Strength is one of the 5 Effects in Islands , it can be obtained by drinking Strength Potions or Fortune Cookies .  Source [ ]  Strength can be obtained by drinking Strength Potions for 1 minute and 30 seconds. You can also get Strength by eating Fortune Cookies .  Causes [ ]  The affected player will deal 30% more damage while active. For example a player at Light Melee Level 1 with Wooden Sword deals 10 damage normally and 15 critically, so with the Strength effect active that same player would deal 13 damage normally and 19.5 critically.  Trivia [ ]  This is one of the 3 Effects that can be obtained from Potions , the others being Polymorph , and Regeneration .

title: Strength_Potion
content: Strength Potion Recipe 1 Gold Skorp Claw 1 Red Mushroom 1 Empty Potion Bottle Crafted with Brewing Stand Effect Strength A strength potion is an item that grants strength when consumed. Drinking the potion will not return the potion bottle .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Strength Potion 1 Gold Skorp Claw 1 Red Mushroom 1 Empty Potion Bottle Brewing Stand  Usage [ ]  Drinking [ ]  Drinking a strength potion grants the player 90 seconds of Strength . Strength gives the player a 30% damage boost for all melee weapons . Damage dealt by ranged weapons is not affected.  History [ ]  August 9, 2020 Added strength potions. ? Decreased damage bonus from 50% to 30%.

title: Stun
content: Stun Causes The player's movement speed is decreased by 50% or unable to sprint. Source Kor 's Stomp attack Bhaa 's Sandstone Hurl or Sandstone Spike attack Slime Queen Primordial Slime 's Smash attack Type Attack Stun is an effect that causes the player's movement speed to be decreased by 50% or unable to sprint. It can only be obtained from the Slime Queen , Bhaa , Kor , and Primordial Slime.  Source [ ]  Stun can be obtained by either touching the Slime Queen , Bhaa's Sandstone Spike attack, Bhaa's Sandstone Hurl attack, Kor's Stomp attack, and Primoridial Slime's Smash attack. The effect lasts roughly 6 seconds.  Causes [ ]  Stun causes the player's movement speed to be decreased by 50% or unable to sprint, making them an easier target for the following attacks from the opposing boss .  History [ ]  February 12, 2021 Added Stun. June 3, 2022 Removed jump power decreases.  Trivia [ ]  Like Polymorph , 50% attack speed , and Slowed , Stun shares the same icon as Food Poison . Players may be unaffected by the effect when playing on a mobile device. Players are able to bypass the Stun effect by obtaining the Speed effect afterwards. Stun is the first and only status effect in Islands which prevent the inflicted target from sprinting. When the player mounting a horse , the player's movement speed is slightly decreased.

title: Survey
content: A survey was a sort-of quiz which usually asks the survey taker some questions about a place/thing/product. In Islands, there was only one NPC who takes a survey, which was the Mailman. However, on April 1, 2022 , the Mailman has been removed, hence surveys are now inaccessible.  Survey [ ]  Beginning [ ]  In order to begin, the player must talk to the Mailman to start the survey. The player must select  the "Do the Survey" option.  Survey Questions [ ]  What is your favorite play-style for Islands?  Building Economy & Trading Collecting & Scavenging Combat & Exploration Factory & Farming Other  2. What is your second favorite play-style for Islands?  Factory & Farming Building Combat & Exploration Economy Collecting & Scavenging Other  Completion [ ]  Once the player completes the survey, they will be rewarded 200 coins and will no longer be able to take the survey.  Trivia [ ]  There was a bug where the Mailman may spawn multiple times, allowing users to complete the survey multiple times. The second question is the same as the first question, but removing the choice of your previous answer.

title: Switch
content: Switch Type of block Solid block; Interactable; Electrical Recipe 5 Iron Ingot 20 Electrite Crafted with Electrical Workbench (Level 1) Best tool Luminous Transparent Description Electricity only flows when the switch is on.  A switch is an electrical component used to turn the flow of electricity on/off in machinery.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Switch 5 Iron Ingot 20 Electrite Electrical Workbench (Level 1)  Breaking [ ]  Switch Breaking Data Hardness 5.5 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 17 9 Stone 9 6 Iron 6 4 Gilded Steel 4 3 Diamond 3 2 Opal 3 2 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Electrical [ ]  It has one input, and when the switch is on, the electricity will flow to the other side. If off, the electricity is cut. This is good for turning on and off circuits without disconnecting a wire or using a button that automatically turns off.  History [ ]  December 11, 2020 Added switches.  Trivia [ ]  The switch changes to the "off" position upon re-joining the game without actually turning off the flow of power .

content: Sword in Stone Type of block Solid block Recipe 2 Stone 1 Iron Sword Crafted with Furniture Workbench Best tool Luminous Transparent The sword in stone is a furniture block that can be crafted in the furniture workbench . title: Syrup_Bottler
content: Syrup Bottler Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 1 Pink Sticky Gear 3 Steel Plate 20 Copper Ingot Crafted with Maple Workbench Best tool Luminous Transparent The syrup bottler is an industrial machine used to bottle maple syrup into maple syrup bottles .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  The recipe for syrup bottlers will automatically be unlocked after completing Bailey 's second quest.  Name Recipe Crafting station Blueprint required Syrup Bottler 1 Pink Sticky Gear 3 Steel Plate 20 Copper Ingot Maple Workbench  Quests [ ]  The player will receive a syrup bottler and a sap boiler from Bailey upon completion of her second quest.  Breaking [ ]  Syrup Bottler Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 9 Stone 10 6 Iron 6 4 Gilded Steel 5 3 Diamond 3 2 Opal 3 2 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Transforming [ ]  Syrup bottlers are used to bottle maple syrup into maple syrup bottles . It has six slots able to hold one maple syrup per slot. It takes about 5 seconds to bottle the syrup. As maple syrup cannot be collected to the player's inventory , the syrup must be directly transported from a sap boiler to the syrup bottler via wood tubes .  Input Output 1 Maple Syrup ➡ 1 Maple Syrup Bottle  History [ ]  November 27, 2021 Added syrup bottlers.  Trivia [ ]  The conveyor part of the syrup bottler allows foilage such as tall grass , flowers , rocks , and dirt piles to spawn in it due to it not being a full block .

title: Taffy
content: Taffy Heals Unknown Taffy is an unused food item in Islands .  Information [ ]  Taffy was most likely created for the Halloween 2020 event, but was left unused along with the yellow candy .  History [ ]  October 16, 2020 Added taffy.

title: Tai_Nigiri
content: Tai Nigiri Recipe 10 Rice 2 Cut Red Snapper Crafted with Cooking Table Food Processor Effect +10% more output when crafting food Required skill Level 63 Cooking Description Eat for +10% more output when crafting food. A tai nigiri is a food item that grants +10% more output when crafting food in a cooking table .  It currently cannot be sold to Petur .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Tai Nigiri 10 Rice 2 Cut Red Snapper Cooking Table Food Processor Level 63 Cooking  Usage [ ]  Eating [ ]  Eating a tai nigiri grants +10% more output when crafting food in a cooking table for 15 minutes. Only foods that can be eaten directly are affected by the bonus, meaning that uncooked foods aren't affected.  History [ ]  November 13, 2021 Added tai nigiris. Introduced where tai nigiris now cannot be sold to Petur .  Trivia [ ]  Tai nigiris currently cannot be sold to Petur .

title: Taliyah
content: Taliyah Location Hub Purpose Buys and sells animal-related items Occupation Animals Taliyah is a villager in the Hub . Players can sell and buy various animal-related items from her.  Shop [ ]  Taliyah buys and sells animal-related items in exchange for coins .  Buy [ ]  Image Name Price Required skill Potion of Fertility 1,500 coins None Cow Spawn Egg Tier 1 3,500 coins Level 2 Animal Care Chicken Spawn Egg Tier 1 4,500 coins Level 12 Animal Care Sheep Spawn Egg Tier 1 5,500 coins Level 21 Animal Care Pig Spawn Egg Tier 1 12,500 coins Level 31 Animal Care White Truffle 1 Token Level 38 Animal Care Duck Spawn Egg Tier 1 15,000 coins Level 40 Animal Care Yak Spawn Egg Tier 1 17,500 coins Level 49 Animal Care Horse Spawn Egg Tier 1 20,000 coins Level 51 Animal Care  Sell [ ]  Image Name Sell price Required skill Milk Bucket 80 coins None Jar of Honey 20 coins Level 6 Animal Care Cheese 100 coins Level 8 Animal Care Egg 145 coins Level 12 Animal Care Mayonnaise Jar 240 coins Level 18 Animal Care White Wool 160 coins Level 21 Animal Care Cloth 380 coins Level 24 Animal Care Black Truffle 220 coins Level 37 Animal Care White Truffle 550 coins Level 38 Animal Care Duck Egg 300 coins Level 40 Animal Care Yak Milk Bucket 360 coins Level 49 Animal Care  Quests [ ]  Before the January 4, 2021 update, Taliyah provided quests to unlock certain offers, alike other villagers. Taliyah's quests were removed and replaced with attaining certain skill levels to unlock merchant offers instead.  However, her quests were readded on November 13, 2021 update. Completing  her quests gives tokens. Though they were removed once again on the November 27, 2021 update.  Dialogue [ ]  "Hey user ! What's on your mind?" >View Shop Opens shop menu. >Tell me about animals "I have so many animals! I love them all the same... But Lucy is my favorite!" "I'm trying to get an order of new animals... This town could use more of them! I'm just not sure what kind yet." "Cows can't resist a handful of wheat. That's how I get Lucy into her bath!" "Did you know happy cows produce milk more often? Mmm... Now I want a glass of milk!" "Make sure to feed your animals every day. Lucy usually get hungry in the morning." "Some animals have favorite foods. My cow Lucy loves oranges... They always cheer her up!" "Animals love to sleep on hay beds. If you place one in a cozy spot I'm sure your animal will love you for it!" >Okay! "What can I do for you?" Repeat. >Quests Opens quest menu.  During the Godzilla vs. Kong Event [ ]  "Hey user !.. What a wild time.. Just remember, all creatures are sacred." >View offer Opens shop. >Tell me about animals "I have so many animals! I love them all the same... But Lucy is my favorite" "I'm trying to get an order of new animals... This town could use more of them! I'm just not sure what kind yet" "Cows can't resist a handful of wheat. That's how I get Lucy into her bath!" "Did you know happy cows produce milk more often? Mmm... Now I want a glass of milk!" "Make sure to feed your animals every day. Lucy usually get hungry in the morning." "Some animals have favorite foods. My cow Lucy loves oranges... They always cheer her up!" "Animals love to sleep on hay beds. If you place one in a cozy spot I'm sure your animal will love you for it!" >Okay! "What can I do for you?" Repeat.  First Anniversary Event [ ]  "It's the Islands anniversary week! One year of Islands .. I can't believe it!" >Wow! "Lucy and I baked you an Anniversary Cake to celebrate it! Hope you like it!" >Thanks! Player receives an Islands anniversary cake and Taliyah leaves the player's island .  "I brought a gift for user . Could you let them know?  " >[Will Do!] End.  Second Anniversary Event [ ]  "It's the Islands anniversary week! Two years of Islands ... I can't believe it!" >That's awesome! "I baked you an Anniversary Cake to celebrate it! Hope you like it!" >[Take Gift] "Enjoy!" >Thanks! Player receives an Islands second anniversary cake and Taliyah leaves the player's island.  "I brought a gift for user . Could you let them know?" >[Will Do!] End.  Third Anniversary Event [ ]  "It's the three year anniversary of Islands ! I can't believe it!" >That's amazing! "Enjoy your new pet and other gifts I have for you! Take care!" >Thanks! End.  On the Farming Festival island [ ]  If a player talked to Taliyah on the Farming Festival Island she would say one of the three lines below.  "This harvest could last my animals all winter!" >Great! End.  "This would be a great place to build a barn!" >Totally! End.  "I'm not sure which of my animals is going to eat these chili peppers!" >Oh no End.  During the mystery [ ]  "Hey user ! What's on your mind?" >Talk about mystery "The animals at the barn aren't sleeping well, something's got them spooked!" >Oh dear... End.  History [ ]  October 3, 2020 Added Taliyah. ? Taliyah now hosts a shop. Added new dialogue. January 22, 2021 Taliyah now sells cow spawn eggs , sheep spawn eggs , and potions of fertility . Taliyah now buys wool and cloth . Added new dialogue. Removed Taliyah's quests. ? Taliyah now buys jars of honey . February 5, 2021 Taliyah now sells pig spawn eggs . Taliyah now buys black truffles and white truffles . February 26, 2021 Taliyah now sells chicken spawn eggs . Taliyah now buys eggs and mayonnaise jars . November 13, 2021 Taliyah now sells white truffles for 1 token. Added new quests. November 27, 2021 Removed Taliyah's quests. February 19, 2022 Taliyah now sells duck spawn eggs Taliyah now buys duck eggs . March 25, 2022 Taliyah now sells yak spawn eggs . Taliyah now buys yak milk buckets . April 9, 2022 Taliyah now arrives on player islands to grant an Islands second anniversary cake . April 16, 2022 Taliyah no longer arrives on player islands to grant an Islands second anniversary cake. June 3, 2022 Taliyah now sells horse spawn eggs . April 14, 2023 Taliyah now arrives on player islands to grant an Islands third anniversary cake .  Trivia [ ]  Taliyah is the first character to have a unique GUI when talked to, and also have a character design unique from the rest of the villagers' design. Taliyah was the first named NPC. Taliyah uses the Freckles face texture while loading. Jed seems to have a crush on Taliyah, indicated by his dialogue during the Fishing Festival . In celebration of Islands' 1 year anniversary , Taliyah would visit the player's island and reward them an Islands anniversary cake when interacted with. In the Skill UI , it reads that players are able to sell mud piles to her, but this is not possible. In the November 13, 2021 update, players could buy white truffles from her for one token. Though tokens are not obtainable as her quests are inaccessible. It has been confirmed that Lucy is a cow. However, she likes oranges, a food no longer liked or eaten by cows.

title: Tall_Grass
content: Tall Grass Type of block Non-solid block Spawns Player's Island Best tool Luminous Transparent Tall grass is a foliage block that randomly spawns on top of unoccupied grass blocks on player islands .  Obtaining [ ]  Natural generation [ ]  There is a random chance for tall grass to spawn on grass blocks on player islands that aren't occupied by other blocks. They can be broken and will drop a single tall grass. The exact spawn chance is unknown.  Breaking [ ]  Tall Grass Breaking Data Hardness 1 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 2 Wooden 3 2 Stone 2 1 Iron 1 1 Gilded Steel 1 1 Diamond 1 1 Opal 1 1 Void Mattock 1  Usage [ ]  Tall grass can only be placed on grass for decoration. It can also be used in some crafting recipes.  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Mossy Stone Brick 4 Stone Brick 1 Tall Grass Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 None 4 Mossy Block 4 Tall Grass Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 None 4 Mossy Cobblestone Block 8 Stone 4 Tall Grass Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 None Trellis 30 Birch Wood 1 Tall Grass Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Level 35 Farming Mud Pile 2 Tall Grass 20 Grass 1 Black Truffle Animal Bench Level 37 Animal Care '70s Lime Table 30 Birch Wood 1 Tall Grass Furniture Workbench None Aquamarine Potted Plant 2 Tall Grass 10 Aquamarine Shard 5 Grass Furniture Workbench None  History [ ]  April 10, 2020 Added tall grass. May 10, 2020 Tall grass can now be used to craft trellises . May 26, 2020 Tall grass can now be used to craft mossy stone bricks . May 31, 2020 Tall grass can now be used to craft '70s lime table . January 29, 2021 Tall grass can now be used to craft aquamarine potted plants . February 5, 2021 Tall grass can now be used to craft mud piles . June 4, 2021 Rabbits are now able to eat tall grass. July 16, 2022 Tall grass can now be used to craft mossy blocks and mossy cobblestone blocks .  Trivia [ ]  Seasons change the color of some natural blocks like grass and trees , but not tall grass. Rabbits may eat from a tall grass, similar to cows , sheep , pigs , chickens , turkeys , ducks , yaks , and horses eating from a grass block . Rabbits do not break the non-soild block while eating tall grass.

title: Teleporter_Pad
content: Teleporter Pad Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 20 Iron Ingot 10 Steel Ingot 30 Aquamarine Shard Crafted with Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Best tool Luminous Transparent Description Place on your island and unlock teleportation access to islands using craftable teleport orbs. A teleporter pad is a block that teleports players to different locations based on the inserted orbs .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Teleporter Pad 20 Iron Ingot 10 Steel Ingot 30 Aquamarine Shard Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Breaking [ ]  Teleporter Pad Breaking Data Hardness 15 Best Tool Pickaxe Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 23 Wooden 45 23 Stone 24 15 Iron 15 10 Gilded Steel 11 8 Diamond 8 5 Opal 6 3 Void Mattock 3  Usage [ ]  Teleporting [ ]  Players can place up to five different orbs inside the teleporter pad and choose to teleport to a desired location based on the inserted orbs. Teleporter pads can be found next to the spawn point of Slime Island , the Hub , Pirate Island , Maple Isles , Spirit Island , Buffalkor Island , Diamond Mines , Wizard Island , Desert Island , and the Underworld . Using a teleporter pad does not consume orbs.  History [ ]  April 9, 2022 Added teleporter pads. April 16, 2022 Black personal orbs , green personal orbs , yellow personal orbs , blue personal orbs , lime personal orbs , purple personal orbs , pink personal orbs , cyan personal orbs , orange personal orbs , red personal orbs , Slime King orbs , Fhanhorn orbs , Kor orbs , Wizard Boss orbs , Bhaa orbs , and Infernal Dragon orbs can now be placed into teleporter pads. April 17, 2022 Boss orbs now display the boss' name in the teleporter pad GUI. Teleporter pads can now be used to teleport players to boss spawn locations from their own island . Teleporter pads now orientate the player to face the boss spawn area after using a boss orb. Renamed the teleport display of Diamond Mines orbs in the teleporter pad GUI from "Diamond Mine Island" to "Diamond Mines." April 29, 2022 Updated the banner of the Hub Island orb in the teleporter pad GUI. Orbs on teleporter pads no longer have a hitbox. Changed the banner of the Fhanhorn orb in the teleporter pad GUI to Bhaa's . May 1, 2022 Reverted the Fhanhorn orb's banner change. July 2, 2022 Slime Queen orbs can now be placed into teleporter pads. August 13, 2022 Void Serpent orbs and Void Isles orbs can now be placed into teleporter pads. August 27, 2022 Fixed public teleporter pads displaying the incorrect name of an orb. September 3, 2022 Players can teleport to Butterfly Festival Island using public teleporter pads. September 10, 2022 Players can no longer teleport to Butterfly Festival Island using public teleporter pads.  Trivia [ ]  From April 16, 2022 to April 29, 2022 , the banner of the Hub Island orb in the teleporter pad's GUI showed the Hub during Islands' second year anniversary instead of the current version. Prior to the April 29, 2022 update, certain personal orbs were censored and tagged by ROBLOX in the teleporter pad GUI.

title: The_Captain27s_Rapier
content: The Captain's Rapier Type Light Melee Physical class Piercing Attack damage 30 HP (Base) 45 HP (Critical) Description The Captain's Rapier, giving you 20% better reward luck in combat! The captain’s rapier is a light melee weapon in the piercing classes.  Obtaining [ ]  Treasure chest [ ]  Opening a treasure chest has a 0.25% chance of rewarding the captain's rapier, having a rarity of 'mythic'.  Behavior [ ]  Attacking [ ]  At Light Melee level 1, the captain's rapier deals a base damage of 30 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing and deals very high knockback. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal an extra 15 HP of damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Light Melee skill and it is in the piercing classes.  Looting [ ]  Upon defeating a mob, the captain's rapier increases the chance of mob drops by 20% of its original value, meaning it multiplies the drop rate of items from mobs by 1.2x. For example, an item with a 0.35% drop chance will now have a 0.42% chance of dropping. Items with a 100% drop rate will be increased to 120%, meaning that it has a guaranteed chance of dropping one and an additional 20% chance of dropping another.  Its looting bonus can be stacked with the luck effect granted from consuming a dragon roll and blueberry cookie , allowing a maximum increase of 80%, or 1.8x, to be applied to a mob drop.  Drop table [ ]  Hover your mouse over the drop chances to see specific details about the drops. September 17, 2022 The captain's rapier is now a slashing weapon. September 24, 2022 The captain's rapier is now a piercing weapon instead of a slashing weapon. October 1, 2022 Changed the model of the captain's rapier. October 8, 2022 Corrected the model of the captain's rapier while inside the inventory and tool stands .  Trivia [ ]  Due to its extremely high knockback, it is possible for players to ‘fly’ on a large mob such as a skorp , something that was only previously possible with the rageblade and the gilded steel hammer . It is the first and only weapon that can modify the drop chances of mob drops . This weapon is one of the only melee weapons to have two melee classifications changed and a piercing classification, the other being the cactus spike .

title: The_Cursed_Wraith
content: Cursed Wraith Boss [ ]  The Cursed Wraith is the main boss of the Halloween Event 2023.  Attacks [ ]  He has two attacks, one where he slashes the closest players with his scythe, and the second attack is to swipe at the player with its hand, both dealing knockback with the scythe attack dealing 30hp and swipe attack dealing 20hp.  He has two skills, one where he duplicate himself into 2 semi-transparent copies of himself and rushes at the player, using its scythe attack.             For the other skill, he sprays poison gas in an area around him that does 5 damage per second when your in it.  Ticket distribution [ ]  Every hit on the boss rewards you with 1 point . Landing the last hit will reward you with an extra 40 points .  Tickets are distributed based on how much points a player has in ranking. (hold tab to view leaderboard in-game)  The Ticket Leaderboard [ ]  1st Place 100 1 Cauldron (2023) 2nd Place 40 Halloween Event Tickets 1 Cauldron (2023) 3rd Place 30 Halloween Event Tickets 1 Cauldron (2023) 4th Place 20 Halloween Event Tickets 1 Cauldron (2023)  (Not dealing any damage to the Boss rewards you nothing.)  You can use tickets to buy Halloween Items from the Hooded Figure in the lobby.

title: The_Divine_Dao
content: The Divine Dao Type Light Melee Physical class Slashing Magical class Toxin Attack damage 56 HP (Base) +28 HP (Critical) 11 - 16 HP per tick (Poison) Description Limited time Dao from the Mushroom Obby The divine dao is a light melee weapon in the slashing and toxin classes. It was added on August 18, 2023 along with the Mushroom Obby Event .  Obtaining [ ]  Purchasing [ ]  The Divine Dao could be obtained by redeeming from Jim for 800 mushroom obby tickets in the Hub , until August 25 2023, where Jim has been removed and trading is the only way to get it currently.  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Light Melee , The divine dao deals a base damage of 56 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. There is a small chance this weapon does a critical hit, meaning the attack will do an extra 28 HP of damage. The weapon also deals the poison effect to mobs attacked causing the mobs to take damage of 11-16 HP periodically for 4 seconds. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Light Melee skill and its in the slashing and toxin classes  Trivia [ ]  The divine dao is one of few melee weapons with a magical classification, with the others being the jolly dagger , the frost hammer , the frost sword , the infernal hammer , the trout's fury , the serpent's hook , the reaper's scythe , and the noxious stinger . If the mob has a weakness or resistance to both of its classification, then the damage multiplier will be either higher or lower than normal. While if the mob has a weakness and resistance to each of its classification, then neutral damage will apply.  History [ ]  August 18, 2023 Added divine daos. August 25 2023 Removed Jim, making the Divine Dao unobtainable.

title: The_Dragonslayer
content: The Dragonslayer Type Heavy Melee Physical class Slashing Attack damage 45 HP (Base) +23 (Critical) Recipe 1 Opal Sword Hilt 60 Opal 100 Iron Ingot Crafted with Anvil Required skill Level 55 Heavy Melee Description A fine sword crafted to kill the dragon in the underworld. The dragonslayer is a heavy melee weapon in the slashing class.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill The Dragonslayer 1 Opal Sword Hilt 60 Opal 100 Iron Ingot Anvil Level 55 Heavy Melee  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Heavy Melee , the dragonslayer deals a base damage of 45 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal an extra 23 HP of damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Heavy Melee skill and it is in the slashing class.  Like other melee weapon , only one player can hit damage in each hostile mob. Multiple players cannot hit damage together.  History [ ]  September 11, 2021 Added the dragonslayer. May 27, 2022 Level 55 Combat is now required to craft the dragonslayer. September 17, 2022 The dragonslayer is now a slashing weapon.  Trivia [ ]  Contrary to its description, it does not deal any extra damage to the Infernal Dragon .

title: The_Reaper27s_Crossbow
content: The Reaper's Crossbow Type Crossbow Attack damage 38 HP 54 HP (Fully charged) 57 - 66 HP ( Long Crossbow Bolt ) 97 - 112 HP (Long Crossbow Bolt; Fully charged) Description Limited time Reaper Crossbow from the Halloween 2022 Event The reaper's crossbow is a crossbow that shoots long crossbow bolts .  Obtaining [ ]  Cauldron [ ]  Opening a cauldron has a 1% chance of rewarding the reaper's crossbow, having a rarity of 'mythic'.  Attacking [ ]  To shoot the crossbow, at least one long crossbow bolt must be in the player's inventory . The crossbow can be charged by holding left click on PC or holding the fire button down on mobile and the damage dealt by the bolt will increase in proportion to the time the crossbow is charged.  At level 1 Archery , the reaper's crossbow deals a base damage of 38 HP to mobs , and its damage can be increased by leveling up the Archery skill.  Charging [ ]  Charging a shot will increase the amount of damage dealt by 1.7x at full charge. This additional damage can be increased by leveling up the Archery skill.  History [ ]  October 15, 2022 Added the reaper's crossbow. November 4, 2022 The reaper’s crossbow is no longer trade-locked.  Trivia [ ]  This is the first and only crossbow in Islands . This is also the only archery weapon with a magical classification. Along with Nature's Divine Longbow The Reaper's Crossbow is the only archery weapon obtained from an event.

title: The_Reaper27s_Scythe
content: The Reaper's Scythe Type Heavy Melee Physical class Slashing Magical class Void Attack damage 68 HP (Base) +34 HP (Critical) The reaper's scythe is a heavy melee weapon in the slashing and void classes. As of November 4, 2022 , it can now be dropped, placed on another player's island , or put in vending machines and chests .  Obtaining [ ]  Cauldron [ ]  Opening a cauldron from the Halloween 2022 event has a 1% chance of rewarding the reaper's scythe, having a rarity of 'mythic'. On November 4, 2022, the event ended making the only way to obtain it by trading to obtain cauldrons or to obtain the reaper's scythe directly.  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Heavy Melee , the reaper's scythe deals a base damage of 68 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing and deals knockback. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal an extra 34 HP of damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Heavy Melee skill and it is in the slashing and void classes.  Like other melee weapon , only one player can hit damage in each hostile mob. Multiple players cannot hit damage together.  Trivia [ ]  There used to be a bug where players with short avatars will get ragdolled or teleport to the players' last location when using this. The bug was fixed on the next day. The reaper's scythe is the strongest melee weapon in terms of base damage, with the serpent's bane being the second. The reaper's scythe is one of the only melee weapons with a magical classification, with the others being the frost hammer , the frost sword , the infernal hammer , the trout's fury , the serpent's hook , and the jolly dagger . If the mob has a weakness or resistance to both of its classification, then the damage multiplier will be either higher or lower than normal. While if the mob has a weakness and resistance to each of its classification, then neutral damage will apply.  History [ ]  October 15, 2022 Added the reaper's scythe. October 16, 2022 Scaled down the reaper's scythe's model to counter ragdolling issues. November 4, 2022 The reaper’s scythe is no longer trade-locked.

Any subsequent defeats would not have rewarded the trophy. The statue depicts the Grand High Witch in its first/second phases. In the first few hours of the October 16, 2020 update, players could receive the trophy every single time they fought the Grand High Witch. This was fixed shortly after the event was released. The Witches trophy is the first trophy added into the game.

title: Thomas
content: Thomas Location Hub Fishing Festival Island Farming Festival Island Purpose Buys fish Occupation Fisherman Thomas is a villager located in the Hub . Players can sell fish to him in exchange for coins .  Shop [ ]  Thomas buys fish in exchange for coins.  Image Name Price Required skill Salmon 3 coins None Trout 20 coins None Carp 3 coins None Catfish 5 coins None Red Snapper 20 coins None Blue Tang 35 coins None Clownfish 35 coins None Tilapia 80 coins None Grouper 60 coins None Tuna 1,000 coins None Spirit Fish 333 coins None Pearl 777 coins None Infernal Fish 1,000 coins None Void Fish 1,300 None Eel 300 coins Level 22 Fishing Swordfish 800 coins Level 25 Fishing  Dialogue [ ]  Current [ ]  Thomas currently has three random lines of dialogue when the player talks to him at his shack in the Hub .  "Everyday's a good day for fishin!" >View Shop Opens shop . "The water be perfect for fishin!" >View Shop Opens shop . "Fish be extra hungry today user !" >View Shop Opens shop .  During the Godzilla vs. Kong event [ ]  "No roof, no sign, but the fish 'r still swimmin'!" >View Shop Opens shop .  At the Fishing Festival [ ]  At the Fishing Festival, Thomas explains how the festival worked at Fishing Festival Island . When first talking to Thomas, he would grant the player 10 sea tickets.  "Hiya user ! I'm hostin' a contest to find the best fisherman in town!." >Okay "Each contest lasts 15 minutes. Whoever catches the most fish wins sea tickets!" >Sounds Fun! "My buddy Oscar will trade your sea tickets for some rare items. Good Luck!"" >Yay! End.  On Farming Festival Island [ ]  Thomas would say one of the four lines below if interacted with on Farming Festival Island :  "Hiya user ! Looks to be a fine river here for fishin'!" >Yep! End.  "It's a really hot day today, hope the fish are cool!" >Hopefully! End.  "I don't know about much about farmin', but it's a fine day for fishin'" >Yeah End.  "Thought I saw a giant fish in that river over there, might've just been my imagination." >Okay... End.  History [ ]  June 15, 2020 Added the Fisherman. November 20, 2020 The Fisherman now sells the wooden and stone axe for 15 shells. ? The wooden and stone axe are removed from his shop. February 26, 2021 Renamed the Fisherman to Thomas. Thomas now pays more for fish. June 30, 2021 Added sale offer for spirit fish . September 11, 2021 Added sale offer for infernal fish . November 13, 2021 Added sale offer for tuna . June 18, 2022 Added sale offer for pearls . July 2, 2022 Updated Thomas' appearance. August 20, 2022 Added sale offer for void fish .

title: Thomas27_Lucky_Fishing_Rod
content: Thomas' Lucky Fishing Rod Type Tool Buy cost 600 Fishing Tickets Description Fisherman Thomas' lucky fishing rod - which gives 25% more luck while fishing using it. Thomas' lucky fishing rod is a tool used for fishing .  Obtaining [ ]  Purchasing [ ]  Thomas' lucky fishing rod could have been purchased from Thomas on Fishing Festival Island for 600 fishing tickets during the 2022 Fishing Festival event.  Usage [ ]  Fishing [ ]  Fishing rods can be cast into bodies of water . After a short period of time, a fish shadow will approach the bobber and “bite” it. A UI will appear above the player's hotbar where they must keep a red block within a certain area until the yellow progress bar reaches the end. If the player fails to fill the bar within 25 seconds, the fish will disappear and the rod will reel itself in.  History [ ]  July 23, 2022 Added Thomas' lucky fishing rods. July 30, 2022 Thomas' lucky fishing rod is now unobtainable. August 1, 2022 Thomas' lucky fishing rod can now be dropped, traded , and put in vending machines and chests .  Trivia [ ]  It is a reskinned version of the iron fishing rod .

title: Tidal_Spellbook
content: Tidal Spellbook Type Magic weapon Magical class Hydro Magic weapon type Spellbook Attack damage 36 HP Recipe 1 Spellbook 2 Crystallized Aquamarine Crafted with Anvil Required skill Level 20 Magic Description Cast ocean spells. The tidal spellbook is a ranged magic weapon in the hydro class that can shoot solidified balls of water horizontally.  Obtaining [ ]  Blueprint [ ]  Prior to the June 3, 2022 update, wizard lizards and the Wizard Boss had a 0.025% chance of dropping a tidal spellbook blueprint upon defeat.  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Tidal Spellbook 1 Spellbook 2 Crystallized Aquamarine Anvil Level 20 Magic  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Magic , fireballs can be shot from the tidal spellbook to deal a base damage of 36 HP every second. The fireballs are shot horizontally in the direction the player is facing, or where the camera is pointing in first person mode. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Magic skill and it is in the hydro class.  History [ ]  July 25, 2020 Added tidal spellbooks. February 12, 2021 Nerfed the base damage from 60 HP to 50 HP. March 19, 2021 Changed the animation played from using the spellbook from "two hand shove" to the melee swing animation. September 18, 2021 Introduced a bug that prevented projectiles shot from tidal spellbooks from disappearing. September 21, 2021 Introduced a bug that prevented tidal spellbooks from dealing damage in private servers. December 18, 2021 Reduced sound on tidal spellbooks. ? Fixed a bug that prevented tidal spellbooks from dealing damage. ? Fixed a bug that prevented tidal spellbook projectiles from disappearing. April 22, 2022 Tidal spellbooks can now be placed in tool stands . May 27, 2022 Tidal spellbooks can now be charged up to deal more damage to mobs. Tidal spellbooks now require level 20 Magic to craft. Changed the appearance of projectiles fired by tidal spellbooks. June 3, 2022 Wizard lizards and the Wizard Boss are no longer able to drop tidal spellbook blueprints upon defeat. June 10, 2022 Nerfed tidal spellbook damage from 50 to 42. Tidal spellbook can no longer do AOE damage. Nerfed charging damage. September 17, 2022 Nerfed tidal spellbook damage from 42 HP to 36 HP. Removed the tidal spellbook's charging ability. Tidal spellbooks are now a hydro weapon. October 1, 2022 Changed the model of tidal spellbooks. October 8, 2022 Gave Tidal Spellbook AOE damage, along with all Hydro weapons.  Trivia [ ]  The tidal spellbook was the first weapon that required a blueprint to craft. It was also the first weapon able to deal AOE damage, and second being the staff of Godzilla . The tidal spellbook's animation used to be a "two hand shove" animation. However, it was changed to the melee swing animation after the March 19, 2021 update. Players were able to defeat the Grand High Witch using the tidal spellbook's AOE damage instead of using the intended method of throwing a potion of formula 86 . This and the Slime Queen's scepter are the only weapons that require another weapon to craft. This weapon used to have the same damage as the spellbook, but was nerfed in a later update. The angle the fireball launches is slightly delayed from the player's actual rotation, making shots inaccurate if the player is moving their camera very quickly. The tidal spellbook deals the same amount of damage as the ruby staffs. Since the June 10, 2022 update, the tidal spellbook no longer deals AOE damage, however as of the October 8, 2022 , it was given back the ability to do AOE damage with an animation of splashing water.

title: Token
content: Tokens are items used to summon their respective bosses or bypass the summon cooldown (the exception was the first and only one boss with 1-hour cooldown due to it having no tokens ). In the February 7, 2022 update, boss tokens were changed to be tradeable. Since the October 28, 2022 update, the token requirement is indicated on each boss' summoning UI.  Note: Tokens are currently unavailable for the Grand High Witch , Fhanhorn , the Lunar Rabbit , the Azarathian Serpent , the Primordial Slime , and The Cursed Wraith , as they do not have any token to summon a boss or bypass the summon cooldown of Fhanhorn (1-hour) until the cooldown ends.  Tokens [ ]  No tokens [ ]  Grand High Witch Fhanhorn (Its 1-hour summon cooldown cannot be bypassed until the cooldown ends) Lunar Rabbit Azarathian Serpent Primordial Slime The Cursed Wraith  Trivia [ ]  The Underworld token was the first token added to Islands . Fhanhorn was the first and only regular boss currently in Islands whose summon cooldown cannot be bypassed with tokens, as it does not have its own token . Spooking any turkey will rewards no token as Fhanhorn's first introduced. Unlike most bosses with their respective " Failed to Summon " notifications, if any player attempts to summon Fhanhorn while on cooldown, as it does not have its own token, nothing happens. Due to fact of nothing happens if any player attempts to summon Fhanhorn while on cooldown, Fhanhorn was the first and only regular boss in Islands that doesn't have the " Failed to Summon " notification, as it does not have its own token. Since the October 28, 2022 update, Fhanhorn does not have any token requirement on its summoning UI while on cooldown, as it does not have its own token. The Grand High Witch , the Lunar Rabbit , and The Cursed Wraith are the only event bosses that do not have their own token. The Void Serpent token , the Zombie Cletus token , and the Bat Boss token are the only tokens that can be obtained by defeating their respective bosses. The Pumpkin Boss token , the Zombie Cletus token, and the Bat Boss token are the only limited tokens. The Underworld token, the Pumpkin Boss token, and the Bat Boss token are the only ones not named "[Boss Name] Token". The Void Serpent token is the only token that is untradeable.

title: Tom
content: Tom Location Hub Player's Island Purpose Buys crops , fruits , and other items Occupation Sell Crops Tom was a villager located in the Hub . Players could have sold crops and fruits to him for coins before he was removed on June 3, 2022 and on November 4, 2022 . Since the aforementioned update, his shop menu has been given to Cletus , although during the Halloween 2022 event he operated Cletus' shop. title: Tomato
content: Tomato Tomato Oily Seed cost 250 coins Planted on Farmland Sell price 4 coins Required skill Level 5 Farming (to sell) Oily description A crop that is covered in motor oil. Must be washed before selling. Edible A tomato is a crop that grows on farmland from tomato seeds and naturally spawns on Buffalkor Island as foliage .  Obtaining [ ]  Harvesting [ ]  Harvesting a tomato plant yields 1 - 3 tomatoes, 1 - 2 tomato seeds , and 9 Farming XP (36 XP with the 4x daily bonus). The chance of obtaining more than one tomato per plant is increased by the player's Farming level and for owners of the VIP gamepass . The 5% chance of obtaining an extra tomato seed is increased for owners of the pro gamepass .  Tomatoes also naturally spawn throughout Buffalkor Island as foliage , but harvesting these cannot yield tomato seeds.  Totems [ ]  A tomato totem will collect and replant tomatoes in a 3-block radius, which can then be collected by interacting it. A tomato totem placed next to a conveyor belt will drop the tomatoes onto the conveyor, but doing so will make them oily. This process cannot yield extra tomato seeds.  Washing [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Tomato 1 Oily Tomato Washing Station  Input Item transformer Output 1 Oily Tomato ➡ Industrial Washing Station ➡ 1 Tomato  Growth [ ]  The growth time of tomatoes can be shortened by 20% when watered with a watering can or basic sprinkler , or fertilized with basic fertilizer . If watered and fertilized, the growth time will be shortened by 30%.  Tomato Growth Phases Phase 0 Phase 1 Phase 2 Phase 3 Time since planted 0m 0s 2m 10s 4m 15s 6m 20s Note: The durations of time above are on an unfertilized and unwatered plant Tomato Growth Time Type Growth Time Normal 6m 20s Fertilized 5m 4s Watered 5m 4s Watered + Fertilized 4m 26s  Usage [ ]  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Tier 1 Bait 10 Tomato Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 None Tomato Sauce 3 Tomato Cooking Table Food Processor Level 3 Cooking Potato Salad 12 Potato 4 Tomato 4 Mayonnaise Jar Cooking Table Food Processor Level 13 Cooking Gondo Datshi 1 Tomato 1 Yak Butter 2 Chili Pepper 1 Egg Cooking Table Food Processor Level 49 Cooking  Crate-packing [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Crate of Tomatoes 100 Tomato Crate Packer Large Crate of Tomatoes 250 Tomato Tier 2 Crate Packer  Eating [ ]  Eating a tomato restores 10 HP.  Selling [ ]  Tomatoes can be sold to Cletus for 9 coins each after reaching level 3 Farming .  History [ ]  April 27, 2020 Added tomatoes. May 17, 2020 Tomatoes now naturally spawn on Buffalkor Island . May 26, 2020 Tomatoes can now be used to craft potato salads . June 15, 2020 Tomatoes now become oily when dropped onto a conveyor belt . ? Tomatoes on Buffalkor Island can no longer yield a tomato seed . January 22, 2021 Tomatoes now grant 9 Farming XP when harvested. Level 3 Farming is now required to sell tomatoes to Tom . June 4, 2021 Tomatoes can be packed into crates of tomatoes . August 15, 2021 Tomatoes can be packed into large crates of tomatoes . November 13, 2021 4 tomatoes are now required to craft potato salads, up from 1. March 6, 2022 Changed the model of tomatoes. March 25, 2022 Changed the sell price of tomatoes from 8 coins to 15 coins. Tomatoes can now be used to craft gondo datshis . April 22, 2022 Changed the sell price of tomatoes from 15 coins to 9 coins. May 13, 2022 Tomatoes can now be used to craft tier 1 bait . June 18, 2022 Tomatoes can now be sold to Cletus instead of Tom . June 25, 2022 Changed the sell price of tomatoes from 9 coins to 14 coins. July 2, 2022 Changed the sell price of tomatoes from 14 coins to 9 coins. September 10, 2022 Changed the sell price of tomatoes from 9 coins to 5 coins. October 1, 2022 Changed the sell price of tomatoes from 9 coins to 4 coins. October 15, 2022 Tomatoes can now be sold to Tom instead of to Cletus . November 4, 2022 Tomatoes can now be sold to Cletus again. November 25, 2022 Changed the sell price of tomatoes from 9 coins to 14 coins.  Trivia [ ]  Oily tomatoes were the only oily oily crop that didn't sell for 40% of its clean crop value to the Oily Crops villager . Instead, it sold for 33.3% of its clean crop value (i.e. 3 coins ). Tomatoes on Buffalkor Island used to have a chance to grant tomato seeds .  Gallery [ ]

title: Tomato_Seeds
content: Tomato Seeds Planted on Farmland Buy cost 250 coins Required skill Level 5 Farming Tomato seeds are seeds used to farm for tomatoes .  Obtaining [ ]  Purchasing [ ]  Tomato seeds can be bought from Tom for 250 coins after reaching level 5 in Farming .  Harvesting [ ]  When a player harvests a tomato crop, the crop yields at least 1 tomato seed, with a 5% (1 in 20) chance of getting 2 seeds upon harvesting. This chance may be increased for owners of the PRO Gamepass .  Usage [ ]  Planting [ ]  Tomato Seeds can be planted or placed on farmland to grow and farm tomatoes.  Growing [ ]  Tomato Seeds Growth Phases Phase 0 Phase 1 Phase 2 Phase 3 Time since planted 0m 0s 1m 45s 3m 15s 5m 0s Note: The durations of time above are on an unfertilized and unwatered plant  History [ ]  April 27, 2020 Added tomato seeds. October 15, 2022 Tomato seeds can now be bought from Tom .  Trivia [ ]  Despite real tomatoes growing on vines, tomato cannot be grown on a trellis .

title: Totem
content: A totem is used to automatically farm crops or minerals . Each totem has a 1x3x1 hitbox and can be purchased from Arius in the Hub using coins .  Totems can store items; once their storage is full, they will stop collecting items until the player empties them. When placed next to a conveyor , totems will automatically drop its items onto it to be transported to industrial machines . A totem is disabled if it within 10 blocks of a totem disabler .  Crop Totems [ ]  Crop totems collect and replant crops in a 3-block radius but do not produce additional seeds . They have 6 slots, each able to hold one crop. Once full, the totem will not harvest or replant crops until the player empties it. At level 1, a crop totem takes 30 seconds to harvest one crop and an additional 30 seconds to drop it onto a conveyor . They grant Farming XP despite the absence of XP particles.  Dispensed tomatoes , potatoes , carrots , and onions become oily , requiring washing in a washing station or an industrial washing station before it can be used or sold.  Cacti , chili peppers , rice , seaweed , raspberries , candy canes , and void parasites don't have a totem.  Totem Output Cost Required skill Natural Oily Wheat Totem 3,000 coins Level 16 Farming Tomato Totem 5,000 coins Level 24 Farming Radish Totem 12,500 coins Level 26 Farming Potato Totem 5,500 coins Level 28 Farming Pumpkin Totem 14,000 coins Level 29 Farming Watermelon Totem 20,000 coins Level 32 Farming Red Berry Totem 20,000 coins (removed) None Blueberry Totem 25,000 coins (removed) None Blackberry Totem 30,000 coins (removed) None Pineapple Totem 35,000 coins Level 37 Farming Carrot Totem 6,000 coins Level 33 Farming Onion Totem 8,000 coins Level 40 Farming Grape Totem 7,500 coins Level 42 Farming Spinach Totem 10,000 coins Level 48 Farming Starfruit Totem 150,000 coins Level 52 Farming Dragonfruit Totem 10,000 coins Level 56 Farming  Mineral Totems [ ]  Mineral totems spawn their respective ore rocks in a 3-block radius. These rocks have the same properties and chances of spawning rare drops (e.g. crystallized iron ) as naturally-spawning ore rocks on other islands ). Mineral totems have 6 slots, each holding 3 items, and a 20-second cooldown between spawning and harvesting. When placed next to a conveyor , they dispense minerals every 30 seconds instead of spawning rocks, but rare drops cannot be obtained this way.  Totem Output Cost Required skill Ore Crystallized Stone Totem 2,000 coins Level 10 Mining Iron Totem 4,000 coins Level 18 Mining Coal Totem 3,000 coins Level 14 Mining Marble Totem 22,000 Coins Level 28 Mining Slate Totem 30,000 coins Level 38 Mining Clay Totem 10,000 coins Level 16 Mining Andesite Totem 8,000 coins Level 12 Mining Diorite Totem 8,000 coins Level 12 Mining Granite Totem 8,000 coins Level 12 Mining Aquamarine Totem 100,000 coins Level 20 Mining Sandstone Totem 250,000 coins Level 36 Mining Red Sandstone Totem 250,000 coins Level 36 Mining Obsidian Totem 600 doubloons None Test Totem N/A N/A  Test Totem [ ]  The test totem was a developer item used for testing purposes and later duped in large quantities. It previously functioned as a faster iron totem with a higher chance to drop crystallized iron , but it now shares equal stats as iron totems. It is only obtainable through trading .  Prior to November 1, 2020 , the test totem model was invisible when held and disappeared if dropped, leaving an invisible hitbox on mobile.  Totem Upgrades [ ]  Most totems, except test totems and berry totems ( red berry , blueberry , and blackberry ) can be upgraded with coins and specific minerals. Players can access the upgrade menu via the "Upgrade" button in totem's storage UI, and its stats can be viewed on the left side of its upgrade menu. The totem's appearance changes every 20 levels and at the final level (level 53).  Breaking an upgraded totem refunds all resources spent on upgrades.  Upgrade Types [ ]  Utility [ ]  Nearby crop grow rate: This stat is exclusive to crop totems. It boosts the grow rate of all crops within an 8-block radius, including those of different types and crops that do not have a corresponding crop totem. The boost can be stacked with other totems with this stat. Block hit damage when near: This upgrade stat is exclusive to mineral totems. It boosts players' block hit damage within a 15-block radius, meaning the player can break any block (or tree ) with less hits. The boost can be stacked with other totems with this stat.  Efficiency [ ]  Action speed: This stat boosts the rate of action made by totem, i.e. spawning/breaking ore rocks and harvesting crops . The speed of dropping items on a conveyor IS affected by this upgrade. Action speed at night: This stat upgrade occurs on every 6th efficiency upgrade level. It is similar to the action speed upgrade but only applies at night.  Quality [ ]  Product yield: This stat increases the production yield of totems. Items picked up manually or deposited into a chest reflect the bonus yield. However, machines such as food processors and industrial ovens will only register the item as a single unit, regardless of the bonus. Product yield for each unique nearby totem type: This stat upgrade occurs on every 6th efficiency upgrade level and is exclusive to crop totems. It increases the production yield based on the number of different crop totem types within an 8-block radius. However, berry totems ( red berry , blueberry , and blackberry ) do not contribute to the yield bonus. For example, if a wheat totem has 5% of this stat and there is 1 potato totem, 1 carrot totem, and 2 tomato totems nearby, the wheat totem will gain +20% product yield (5% from each of the four unique totems, including itself).
