title: Washing_Station
content: Washing Station Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 1 Crystallized Iron 100 Maple Wood 30 Iron Ingot Crafted with Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Best tool Luminous Transparent Description Clean oily crops. The washing station is a crafting station that can be used to wash oily crops . Water is not actually needed to wash crops. The washing station can clean up to 100 oily crops at a time.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Washing Station 1 Crystallized Iron 100 Maple Wood 30 Iron Ingot Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Breaking [ ]  Washing Station Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 18 Stone 10 10 Iron 6 6 Gilded Steel 5 5 Diamond 3 3 Opal 3 3 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Washing [ ]  Crops can be washed in increments of 1 - 100.  History [ ]  June 15, 2020 Added washing stations. January 8, 2022 Washing stations can now wash oily pineapples . May 13, 2022 Changed the recipe of washing machines to require 1 crystallized iron instead of 3 pearls .  Please Note - You do not need to run pineapples through a washing machine anymore.  Trivia [ ]  This is the fastest way to wash oily crops , but cannot be automated. This can wash oily crops as many as 100 at a time, while the industrial washing station can only wash 3. Even though oily starfruit was removed from the game, its recipe is still in the UI.

title: Water
content: Water Type of block Liquid Best tool Luminous Transparent Water is a fluid block . Since the September 24, 2024 update, it could no longer be created by placing water buckets .  Obtaining [ ]  Prior to the September 24, 2024 update, water was created by placing water buckets . Any water source blocks placed before the update will still exist on the island .  Usage [ ]  Swimming [ ]  Players can swim in water like they can in normal Roblox water terrain.  Villagers in water do not swim, but walk through it instead.  Spreading [ ]  Water spreads horizontally and downward. Water can spread downward infinitely until stopped by a block, and 4 blocks horizontally from a source block on a flat surface.  Spreading water generally doesn't affect nearby blocks or items, but will break plowed grass , causing it to return to normal grass.  Sound effects [ ]  Source Audio Flowing water https://robloxislands.fandom.com/wiki/File:Audio-water.ogg Jumping into water https://robloxislands.fandom.com/wiki/File:Audio-water2.ogg  History [ ]  April 8, 2021 Water is shown by the developers in a tweet . May 8, 2021 Added water. SnickTrix talks about potential additions such as fishing and item floating physics. Fixed bug that caused the jump button to not appear on mobile devices while swimming in water. September 24, 2024 Water source blocks can no longer be created by placing water buckets .  Trivia [ ]  This was the first placeable liquid in the game, the second being lava . Water cannot be obtained with water catchers and cannot be stored in water barrels . Before the September 24, 2024 update, water buckets were able to be placed inside a water source block, but doing so would have resulted in a net loss of one water source block.

title: Watering_Can
content: Watering Can Default Lucky Type Farming Tool Recipe 10 Oak Wood Crafted with Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Description Lucky: Limited edition watering can earned only during the Farming Festival 2021 event! A watering can is a tool used to water crops and fertile flowers . It has the same function as the basic sprinkler , except that it doesn't require a water storage block, is manual, and is also portable.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Watering Can 10 Oak Wood Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Purchasing [ ]  Cletus' lucky watering could have been purchased from Cletus on Farming Festival Island for 7,500 crops .  Usage [ ]  Watering crops [ ]  The watering can shortens the growth time of crops by 33%. It does not have an effect on trees , berries , cacti , or grapes .  Icon Crop Growth time Without water With water Wheat 3:00 2:00 Tomato 5:00 3:20 Grape 3:05 2:28 Potato 6:00 4:00 Carrot 5:00 3:20 Spinach 4:35 3:50 Onion 4:00 2:40 Starfruit 5:50 4:00 Radish 6:00 4:00 Watermelon 5:00 3:20 Pumpkin 3:25 2:00 Chili Pepper 4:05 2:45 Pineapple 5:15 4:12 Dragon Fruit 3:15 2:36  Flowers [ ]  Watering a fertile flower next to another flower allows them to breed. Re-watering the flowers does not affect breeding time nor color chances. After some time, a new flower will appear in an open space adjacent to its fertile parent. Basic sprinklers cannot be used to breed flowers.  History [ ]  June 15, 2020 Added watering cans. November 1, 2020 The model for watering cans changed. Watering cans no longer need to be refilled. Watering cans can now water flowers. July 30, 2021 Added Cletus' lucky watering can. August 3, 2021 Cletus' lucky watering can is made unobtainable. September 25, 2021 Cletus' lucky watering can can be purchased from Cletus again. September 29, 2021 Cletus' lucky watering can is made unobtainable again.  Trivia [ ]  This is the first item that speed up the growth time of crops , the second being basic fertilizer . Prior to November 1, 2020 update, the watering can could not be used on legacy flowers and had a limited amount of water. To show the amount of water left in the can, a blue bar would appear above the watering can. With every use, the blue bar would deplete and reveal a white color to show how much was emptied. If the watering can was full, it would have a maximum amount of 15 uses before needing to be refilled. Watering cans can still be filled with water, but this does not do anything other than deplete the amount of water in the water storage block. Unlike most tools , watering cans can be immediately dropped and does not require the player to hold down "Q."

title: Watermelon
content: Watermelon Seed cost 1,850 coins Planted on Farmland Sell price 85 coins Description A tasty melon grown in the summer Edible A watermelon is a placeable crop that grows on farmland from watermelon seeds .  Obtaining [ ]  Harvesting [ ]  Harvesting a watermelon plant yields 1 - 3 watermelons, 1 watermelon seed , and 6 Farming XP (24 XP with the 4x daily bonus). The chance of obtaining more than one waterlemon per plant is increased by the player's Farming level and for owners of the VIP gamepass . Extra watermelon seeds cannot be yielded.  Totems [ ]  A watermelon totem will collect and replant watermelons in a 3-block radius, which can then be collected by interacting it. A watermelon totem placed next to a conveyor belt will drop the watermelons onto the conveyor. This process cannot yield extra watermelon seeds.  Breaking [ ]  Watermelon Breaking Data Hardness 4 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 6 Wooden 12 12 Stone 7 7 Iron 4 4 Gilded Steel 3 3 Diamond 2 2 Opal 2 2 Void Mattock 1  Growth [ ]  The growth time of watermelons can be shortened by 20% when watered with a watering can or basic sprinkler , or fertilized with basic fertilizer . If watered and fertilized, the growth time will be shortened by 30%.  Watermelon Growth Phases Phase 0 Phase 1 Phase 2 Phase 3 Time since planted 0m 0s 1m 45s 3m 33s 5m Note: The durations of time above are on an unfertilized and unwatered plant Watermelon Growth Time Type Growth Time Normal 5m Fertilized 4m Watered 4m Watered + Fertilized 3m 30s  Trivia [ ]  It is one of the five only crops that cannot be crafted into any food product, aside from Pumpkins , Blackberries , Plums , and Radishes .  Crate-packing [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Crate of Melons 100 Watermelon Crate Packer Large Crate of Melons 250 Watermelon Tier 2 Crate Packer  Selling [ ]  Watermelon can be sold to Tom during the summer on the player's island for 85 coins each.  History [ ]  April 4, 2021 Added watermelons. June 4, 2021 Watermelons can be packed into crates of melons . Changed the sell price of watermelons from 105 coins to 95 coins. August 15, 2021 Watermelons can be packed into large crates of melons . January 8, 2022 Changed the sell price of watermelons from 95 coins to 80 coins. May 13, 2022 Changed the sell price of watermelons from 80 coins to 75 coins. July 30, 2022 Changed the sell price of watermelons from 75 coins to 85 coins. ? Changed the sell price of watermelons from 85 coins to 80 coins. September 24, 2022 Changed the sell price of watermelons from 80 coins to 85 coins. October 15, 2022 Watermelons can now be sold to Tom instead of to Cletus. November 4, 2022 Watermelons can now be sold to Cletus again. December 23, 2022 Changed the sell price of watermelons from 80 coins to 85 coins.  Trivia [ ]  Despite being a seasonal crop, watermelons can grow in any season . Besides the seed and the actual watermelon, all growth stages of the watermelon are nearly identical to that of pumpkins . The watermelon's second to last stage of growth has a melon that is slightly darker than the final harvestable crop. Despite the fact that Cletus says the player can eat it as a "refreshing snack," and the description saying it is a "tasty melon", watermelons currently cannot be eaten. Prior to the January 8, 2022 update, watermelons sold for the highest amount of coins out of any crop . The second to last stage of the watermelon is slightly floating.  Gallery [ ]

title: Watermelon_Seeds
content: Watermelon Seeds Planted on Farmland Buy cost 1,850 coins Description Watermelon can only grow in the summer season. Watermelon seeds are seeds used to grow watermelons .  Obtaining [ ]  Purchasing [ ]  Watermelon seeds can be obtained during summer if Cletus visits the player's island , whom has a 25% chance of visiting, selling one for 1,850 coins . Players can only purchase 3 seeds before Cletus has to restock.  Harvesting [ ]  Harvesting a watermelon crop will give 1 watermelon seed and 1 - 3 watermelons .  Note: Harvesting watermelons does not give you any more watermelon seeds.  Usage [ ]  Planting [ ]  Watermelon seeds can be planted on farmland and will take 5 minutes to grow. The growing process can be sped up by 20% by watering the crop with a watering can or basic sprinkler, by 20% using basic fertilizer , or by 30% when using both methods.  Growing [ ]  Watermelon seeds have 4 growth phases, starting at a seed to a full watermelon.  History [ ]  April 4, 2021 Added watermelon seeds. January 8, 2022 Reduced watermelon seeds price from 2,150 to 1,850 coins. October 15, 2022 Watermelon seeds can now be bought from Tom . November 4, 2022 Watermelon seeds can now be bought from Cletus instead of Tom  Trivia [ ]  The third growth stage of the watermelon will hover slightly above the dirt it's planted on. Contrary to its description, watermelon is not restricted to growing in summer and can be grown in any season .

title: Water_Bucket
content: Water Bucket Buy cost 100 coins A water bucket is a bucket filled with water . Since the September 24, 2024 update, water buckets can no longer be purchased or placed to create a water source block.  Obtaining [ ]  Filling [ ]  To fill an empty bucket with water, use it on a water source block. The block is consumed in the process. Flowing water does not fill a bucket. Buckets can also be filled in bodies of water on various islands . title: Water_Catcher
content: Water Catcher Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 10 Iron Ingot 10 Oak Wood Crafted with Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Best tool Luminous Transparent  The water catcher is a block that was added in the June 15, 2020 update . It is used to take water from the environment to fill water jugs or basic sprinklers .  Note: rain does NOT affect water catchers.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Water Catcher 10 Iron Ingot 10 Oak Wood Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Breaking [ ]  Water Catcher Breaking Data Hardness 10 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 15 Wooden 30 30 Stone 16 16 Iron 10 10 Gilded Steel 7 7 Diamond 5 5 Opal 4 4 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Collecting water [ ]  Water catchers will collect water over time, regardless of the current in-game weather or season . To fill a water jug , interact with the water catcher and hold a water jug then click/tap the fill button. This can be used to transport the water to another water catcher or water barrel .  Filling sprinklers [ ]  Placing a water catcher within a 10 block radius of a basic sprinkler will automatically fill it, which will then water any farmland within a 1 block radius.  History [ ]  June 15, 2020 Added water catchers.  Trivia [ ]  Despite the water catcher having a funnel for collecting rainfall and the fact that Islands does have rain , the water catcher will catch water any time, any weather, and anywhere (even indoors). When the Water Catcher was first released, there was a bug that allowed the player to have a set amount of water and you could keep on replacing it to get more. This has since then been patched in the following bug fix update. Watering cans used to be fillable in a water catcher, but this was changed in the November 1, 2020 update, which made them have an infinite amount of water.

title: Weakness
content: Weakness Causes Weakens enemies Source Weapons whose magical class is void Type Attack  Weakness is an effect that affects hostile mobs when attacked by weapons whose magical class is void .  Source [ ]  Weakness will come in effect when attacking hostile mobs with a weapon whose magical class is void such as the spirit spellbook , serpent's hook , and the reaper's scythe .  Causes [ ]  Weakness adds a weakened effect that reduces enemy damage by 20% while under the effect, which can stack. The enemy is also surrounded by purple gas when under the effect.  History [ ]  October 8, 2022 Added Weakness.

title: Weapon
content: Weapons are items that are used to attack and defeat mobs or other players if PVP is enabled. There are four different categories of weapons: Light Melee , Heavy Melee , Archery , and Magic . Defeating hostile mobs will award the player with Combat XP and XP for the combat skill of the weapon currently held. If no weapon is held, no weapon class XP will be awarded. The damage for each weapon increases for each level of the corresponding weapon skill that the players have.  When multiple players simultaneously attack a hostile mob, only the damage dealt by a randomly selected player will register.  Weapons [ ]  Melee weapons are weapons specialized for close-combat attacks. They have a chance to do critical hits which increases damage by 50% of the base damage.  Heavy Melee weapons [ ]  Heavy Melee weapons generally deal more damage than Light Melee weapons .  Light Melee weapons [ ]  Light Melee weapons generally deal less damage than Heavy Melee weapons. Most of these weapons have the same attack speed as Heavy Melee weapons, but the rageblade has the fastest attack speed.  Shields [ ]  Shields are weapons that can damage and reduce damage from mobs. They can also push mobs in a straight line.  Ranged weapons [ ]  Ranged weapons are not as effective in close combat, but more so at attacking mobs from a distance.  Archery [ ]  Bows deal different amounts of damage depending on the duration that the bow has been drawn and the player's Archery level. Full charges will deal full damage, while short charges deal less. Bows require arrows to fire, using 1 arrow per released charge.  Magic [ ]  Magic weapons do not need ammunition of any sort. Some magic weapons, such as the Slime Queen's scepter , may heal the player when an enemy is hit.  Critical hits [ ]  Melee weapons have a chance of dealing a critical hit (referred to as "star strikes" by Ivon ). Critical hits deal 1.5x of the weapon's base damage. All ranged weapons except for the lightning scepter do not possess the ability to land critical hits.  Since the January 22, 2021 update, critical hits from melee weapons will deal a fixed amount of damage instead of a ranged amount.  Event weapons [ ]  Event weapons are limited items that can no longer be obtained after their respective events have ended. They can still be obtained through trading with other players. title: Wheat
content: Wheat Seed cost 125 coins Planted on Farmland Sell price 7 coins Edible Wheat is the cheapest crop in Islands that naturally generates on the creation of new player islands .  Obtaining [ ]  Natural generation [ ]  New player islands will spawn with 6 fully-grown wheat next to a plow .  Harvesting [ ]  Harvesting wheat yields 1 - 3 wheat, 1 - 2 wheat seeds , and 6 Farming XP (18 with the 4x daily bonus). The chance of obtaining more than one wheat per plant is increased by the player's Farming level and for owners of the VIP gamepass . The 5% chance of obtaining an extra wheat seed is increased for owners of the pro gamepass .  Totems [ ]  A wheat totem will collect and replant wheat in a 3-block radius, which can then be collected by interacting it. A wheat totem placed next to a conveyor belt will drop the wheat onto the conveyor. This process cannot yield extra wheat seeds.  Growth [ ]  The growth time of wheat can be shortened by 20% when watered with a watering can or basic sprinkler , or fertilized with basic fertilizer . If watered and fertilized, the growth time will be shortened by 30%.  Wheat Growth Phases Phase 0 Phase 1 Phase 2 Phase 3 Time since planted 0m 0s 1m 5s 2m 10s 3m 15s Note: The durations of time above are on an unfertilized and unwatered plant Wheat Growth Time Type Growth Time Normal 3m 15s Fertilized 2m 36s Watered 2m 36s Watered + Fertilized 2m 17s  Usage [ ]  Crafting ingredient [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Dough 3 Wheat Cooking Table Food Processor None Hay Bed 50 Wheat Animal Bench Level 11 Animal Care Nest 40 Wheat 20 Oak Plank Animal Bench Level 19 Animal Care Blueprint required Pancake Dough 9 Wheat Cooking Table Food Processor None  Crate-packing [ ]  Image Name Recipe Crafting station Crate of Wheat 100 Wheat Crate Packer Large Crate of Wheat 250 Wheat Tier 2 Crate Packer  Cows [ ]  Holding wheat will make any cow in the nearby vicinity to approach the player. Wheat can also be fed to cows manually or through a wooden , metal , or automated trough . title: White_Truffle
content: White Truffle Sell price 550 coins Buy cost 1 Token Required skill (to sell) Level 38 Animal Care Description Rare truffle pulled out of tree roots by happy pigs. A white truffle is an item that can be obtained from pigs . It is the rarer counterpart of the black truffle and requires Level 38 Animal Care to sell to Taliyah .  Obtaining [ ]  Pigs [ ]  White truffles are obtained when pigs pull out the roots of a tree then collecting the truffle, you have a small chance of getting a white truffle instead of a black truffle. If the pig's hunger is 25% or less, it will consume it and you will not receive the truffle. Pigs will have a higher chance of digging up a white truffle if their happiness level is high or guaranteed while happiness level is maxed out.  Buying [ ]  White truffles can be bought for 1 token from Taliyah , though tokens cannot be earned due to Taliyah's quests being inaccessible.  Usage [ ]  Selling [ ]  White truffles can be sold to Taliyah for 550 coins .  History [ ]  February 5, 2021 Added white truffles. November 13, 2021 White truffles can now be bought for 1 token.  Trivia [ ]  White truffles sell for the highest price out of any item in Taliyah 's shop. Unlike black truffles , white truffles cannot be used to craft other items.

title: Wind
content: Wind was the first weather type added to the game, it was introduced in the March 13, 2021 update. It usually appears during Spring, but it can happen during any season .  Appearance [ ]  Wind is portrayed by translucent white lines of light blue moving horizontally. The lines of wind can curve freely.  Behavior [ ]  Wind can appear during any season. It can be seen throughout the entire map, including the Player's Island , Hub , and mob islands. Wind does not have a current use.  History [ ]  March 13, 2021 Added wind. April 4, 2021 Adjusted wind. June 30, 2021 Shifted wind above players heads.  Trivia [ ]  Wind is the first weather occurrence, the second being rain . Similar to rain , wind can be seen inside the Diamond Mines .

title: Winter_Build_Trophy
content: Winter Build Trophy Type of block Solid block Best tool Luminous Transparent Description Given to 3 winners of 2020 Winter Build Competition The winter build trophy is a block obtained by winning the 2020 or 2021 Winter Build Competition, hosted in the official Islands Discord server. Only three copies were originally given out to the winners, but due to the developers supposedly spawning in more copies, there exists more than the intended amount.  It cannot be dropped, traded , placed on another player's island , or put in vending machines and chests .  Winners of the 2020 Winter Build Competition [ ]  These are the 3 users that won the contest and were awarded the trophy.  MistTheYouTuber (1st place) 3_med (2nd place) Fr2nky (3rd place)  Winners of the 2021 Winter Build Competition [ ]  These are the 3 users that won the contest and were awarded the trophy.  EAGLEEYE9010 (1st place) rainbowpandahedgehog (2nd place) Makramee11111 (3rd place)  History [ ]  January 7, 2020 Added 2020 winter build trophies. ? Renamed 2020 winter build trophies to "Winter Build Trophy".

title: Wire_Tool
content: Wire Tool Type Tool Recipe 10 Iron Ingot Crafted with Electrical Workbench Description Used to configure wiring on electrical items. The wire tool is a tool used to configure wiring on electrical items.  Usage [ ]  The wire tool is used to wire electrical items. Players can connect two sockets by clicking on the first and then clicking on the socket of the desired destination. The wire can pass through blocks and there is no length restriction.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Wire Tool 10 Iron Ingot Electrical Workbench  History [ ]  December 11, 2020 Added wire tools.

title: Witch27s_Broom
content: Witch's Broom The witch's broom is a mount that was added in the October 15, 2022 update. Players can ride it to receive a 65% speed boost.  Obtaining [ ]  Quest [ ]  Completing the "The Wicked Witch" quest will unlock the witch's broom for usage.  Usage [ ]  Mounting [ ]  Players can mount the witch's broom by selecting the bicycle button next to the backpack button. Once mounted, players will receive a 65% speed boost whilst on it. The speed boost can stack with other items that provide speed boost as well. Players can manually dismount the witch's broom or when they receive damage. Dismounting it will lose the speed boost, but the witch's broom will linger around the player so they can mount it again.  History [ ]  October 15, 2022 Added witch's brooms. October 16, 2022 Removed the 5 second cooldown on mounting when receiving damage.  Trivia [ ]  The witch's broom is the second-fastest mount, with the fastest being horses .

title: Witch_Island
content: Witch Island Mobs Skeleton Armored Skeleton Pump Pump King Grand High Witch  The Witch Island is an island that was accessible during the Halloween 2020 event. It was accessible by going through the portal in front of the Halloween mansion in the Hub .  Mobs [ ]  The Witch Island had 4 hostile mobs all with relatively equal spawn chances. The island also had the Grand High Witch which was the first boss added to Islands.  Skeleton Armored Skeleton Pump Pump King Grand High Witch  Trivia [ ]  This was the first event exclusive location in Islands. This island was the first island to have a boss mob.

title: Wizard_Boss
content: Wizard Boss Health 2,500 HP Behavior Hostile Attack strength 5 per hit ( Static ) 40 ( Explosion ) Drops Empty Potion Bottle Red Page Blue Page Green Page Spellbook Lightning Scepter Wizard Portal Shard Mysterious Fragment #3 Wizard Boss Pet Spawn Egg Jukebox Disk Location Wizard Island The Wizard Boss is a boss that was added in the April 4, 2021 update. It has 2,500 health and can be summoned on Wizard Island . It has a 45 minute summon cooldown and can be summoned with at least level 20 Combat .  As of September 18, 2021 , its summon cooldown can be bypassed with at least 500 Wizard Boss tokens .  Description [ ]  The Wizard Boss is a boss that only uses ranged attacks. It can be summoned on Wizard Island by holding F or tap-holding the button near the entrance to the boss platform. It can be summoned once every 45 minutes in its spawn arena .  As of September 18, 2021 , the summon cooldown of the Wizard Boss now can be bypassed by using at least 500 Wizard Boss tokens .  When a player summons the Wizard Boss, a blue message appears in chat, reading:  "[SERVER] Wizard Boss summoning in 5 seconds!"  After 5 seconds, another blue message appears in chat, reading:  "[SERVER] Wizard Boss has summoned!"  If a player attempts to summon the Wizard Boss while has less than 500 Wizard Boss tokens and on cooldown, the notification appears the screen, reading:  "Failed to Summon - You need 500x Wizard Boss Tokens to summon this boss!"  Like other bosses , if there are no players in the battle area, if the player is idle for too long, or if the battle takes more than 10 minutes, the Wizard Boss will despawn and the player will have to wait 45 minutes or spend at least 500 Wizard Boss tokens before being able to battle it.  Attacks [ ]  The Wizard Boss has 2 attacks. Similar to wizard lizards , it uses ranged attacks to fight and does move when attacking only very slowly.  Static Attack [ ]  The static attack is a long-ranged attack meant to attack players using a Magic weapon. It is similar to the legacy Lighting Scepter’s attack, a succession of lightning bolts are cast in a straight line at the player's current position. It deals 5 damage per hit. The direction in which the attack is cast does not change for the duration of the attack. It is an unusual attack, as it does small amounts of damage, but attacks multiple times rather swiftly.  Pulse Attack [ ]  The pulse attack is a long-ranged attack meant to attack players using a Magic weapon. It is similar to the current Lighting Scepter’s attack, a single lightning bolt is cast in a straight line at the player's current position. It deals 5 damage per hit. The direction in which the attack is cast does not change for the duration of the attack. It is an unusual attack, as it does small amounts of damage, but attacks multiple times rather swiftly.  Explosion Attack [ ]  The explosion attack is faster than any Magic weapon other than the static scepter. It has a similar projectile to the tidal spellbook and the same sound effect as the spellbook . This spell can be detonated prematurely by hitting the projectile with one cast by a spellbook, tidal spellbook, or spirit spellbook . The attack deals 40 HP.  Drops [ ]  The Wizard Boss rewards 1,251 (4,998 with the 4x daily bonus or 126 when maxed out) Combat XP and 1,251 (4,998 with the 4x daily bonus or 126 when maxed out) Light Melee , Heavy Melee , Magic , or Archery XP depending on the weapon the player used to defeat it.  Prior to October 22, 2022 , only a certain number of players will receive drops if too many players are simultaneously fighting it. However, all players will still receive Combat + Weapon XP.  Image Name Drop chance Empty Potion Bottle 1500% Red Page 7.5% Blue Page 7.5% Green Page 7.5% Lightning Scepter 0.5% Spellbook 0.45% Wizard Portal Shard 0.3% Mysterious Fragment #3 5% Wizard Boss Pet Spawn Egg 0.33% Jukebox Disks Red Jukebox Disk 0.35% Yellow Jukebox Disk 0.35% Blue Jukebox Disk 0.35% Green Jukebox Disk 0.01% Orange Jukebox Disk 0.01% Purple Jukebox Disk 0.01%  Damage reduction [ ]  The Wizard Boss reduces the amount of damage dealt to it by 10% to 55% depending on the number of players (compounds) in the arena.  Number of players Damage reduction 1 0% 2 10% 3 25% 4 35% 5 45% 6+ 55%  Resistances and weaknesses [ ]  Resistances Weaknesses Physical Magical Physical Magical Striking Inferno , Storm Piercing Hydro , Quake  History [ ]  April 4, 2021 Added the Wizard Boss. July 2, 2021 The Wizard Boss now has a damage reduction up to 55%. September 5, 2021 The Wizard Boss now has a chance of dropping mysterious fragment #3s . September 18, 2021 The summon cooldown of the Wizard Boss now can be bypassed with 500 Wizard Boss tokens . The Wizard Boss now has a chance of dropping Wizard Boss pet spawn eggs . April 9, 2022 Fixed a bug that prevented the static attack from disappearing after the attack has ended. April 12, 2022 Fixed a bug where the Wizard Boss's lighting arc is missing during its static attack. June 3, 2022 The Wizard Boss now has a chance of dropping spellbooks . The Wizard Boss no longer has a chance of dropping tidal spellbook blueprints upon defeat. September 17, 2022 The Wizard Boss now has resistances and weaknesses. September 24, 2022 Changed the resistances and weaknesses of The Wizard Boss. November 18, 2022 The Wizard Boss now have new arc effects with its charged up attacks. The Wizard Boss now attacks faster.  Trivia [ ]  If too many players simultaneously attack the Wizard Boss, it may glitch between its attacking and idle animations and cause it to remain stuck. The Wizard Boss has the most unique drops possible, being 15. The Wizard Boss rewards the same amount of XP as Bhaa , the Infernal Dragon , Percival the Pumpkin King , and Fhanhorn . Its amount of XP was 1251, 4998 with the 4x daily bonus, or 126 when maxed out. Prior to September 18, 2021 , the summon cooldown of the Wizard Boss cannot be bypassed with tokens . When the Wizard Boss is killed while using its "Static" attack, the lightning projectile doesn't disappear. This was likely a bug where lightning projectile doesn't damage players.  Gallery [ ]

title: Wizard_Boss_Pet_Spawn_Egg
content: Wizard Boss Pet Spawn Egg Dropped by Wizard Boss The Wizard Boss pet spawn egg is a spawn egg used to spawn a Wizard Boss pet . It cannot be dropped, traded , or put in vending machines and chests .  Obtaining [ ]  Mob drop [ ]  The Wizard Boss has a 0.33% chance of dropping a Wizard Boss pet spawn egg upon defeat.  Usage [ ]  Spawning [ ]  To spawn a Wizard Boss pet , the player must be the owner of the island they are currently on. While holding the egg, clicking or tapping anywhere on their screen will spawn a Wizard Boss pet.  History [ ]  September 18, 2021 Added Wizard Boss pet spawn eggs.

content: Wizard Boss Token Dropped by Wizard Lizard Description A token obtained from the Wizard Island! The Wizard Boss token is an item used to bypass the summon cooldown of the Wizard Boss . title: Wizard_Island
content: Wizard Island Current Old Required skill Level 20 Combat Resources Crocus Daffodil Acorn Horseradish Starfruit Red Mushroom Mobs Wizard Lizard Wizard Boss Fish Wizard Island is an island that can be accessed through the portal on the Buffalkor Island , Desert Island , or a Wizard Portal on a player island . It is inhabited by wizard lizards and the Wizard Boss . Players need to be level 20 in Combat to enter Wizard Island.  Resources [ ]  Foliage [ ]  The following plants and crops spawn on Wizard Island which can either be broken or harvested:  Crocus Daffodil Acorn Horseradish Starfruit Red Mushroom  Ores [ ]  Rocks of coal , iron and gold used to spawn on Wizard Island before the April 4, 2021 update.  Mobs [ ]  Wizard Lizard [ ]  Wizard lizards spawn in different areas on the islands. Currently, there can only be 6 lizards on the island.  Wizard Boss [ ]  The Wizard Boss can be summoned on top of the hill past the wizard lizards.  Locations [ ]  Fallen Tree River [ ]  Fallen Tree River 1 2 The Fallen Tree River is a small river located next to the Buffalkor Portal on Wizard Island.  Fallen Tree River Plain [ ]  Fallen Tree River Plain 1 2 3 Mobs Wizard Lizard The Fallen Tree River Plain is a small area of land located near Fallen Tree River. It contains 2 wizard lizards .  Mushroom Field [ ]  Mushroom Field 1 2 The Mushroom Field is a field with giant decorative mushrooms; however, players cannot harvest the mushrooms.  Wizard Mountain [ ]  Wizard Mountain 1 2 Mobs Wizard Lizard The Wizard Mountain contains 3 wizard lizards .  Wizard Boss Entrance [ ]  Wizard Boss Entrance 1 2 Resources Horseradish Acorn Starfruit Mobs Wizard Lizard The Wizard Boss Entrance contains 2 wizard lizards and leads into the Wizard Boss Arena .  Wizard Boss Arena [ ]  Wizard Boss Arena 1 2 Mobs Wizard Boss The Wizard Boss Arena is located at the highest point of Wizard Island, away from the portals on the island. The Wizard Boss can be spawned at the entryway.  Audio [ ]  Name Audio Artist Roblox ID Wizards in the Pines https://robloxislands.fandom.com/wiki/File:Wizard_Island_Loop.ogg Micah Fischer Unknown  Trivia [ ]  There is a gate with a glowing lock on it. The purpose of this is currently unknown.

title: Wizard_Island_Key
content: Wizard Island Key Description One time use. The Wizard Island Key was an item used to access the Wizard Island . It had its functionality removed in the January 22, 2021 update and was later completely removed in the February 5, 2021 update.  Obtaining [ ]  Mob drops [ ]  The Wizard Island Key was able to be obtained by killing Buffalkors with a drop chance of 25%. Buffalkors no longer dropped the key after January 22, 2021 , but existing copies could still be traded with other players until February 5, 2021 , when the item was wiped from players' inventories .  Usage [ ]  The Wizard Island Key was a one-time use item that was consumed from the player's inventory when going through the Wizard Portal on the Buffalkor Island .  Trivia [ ]  The Wizard Island Key has the same texture as Wizard Portal Shard . The Wizard Island Key will not disappear if a player put in the vending machine before it was removed. However, if a player takes it out of the Vending Machine or bought it, it won't show up in that player's Inventory .

title: Wizard_Lizard
content: Wizard Lizard Health 120 HP Behavior Hostile Attack strength 30 HP Drops Empty Potion Bottle Blue Page Green Page Red Page Wizard Portal Shard Wizard Boss Token Jukebox Disk Location Wizard Island A wizard lizard is a hostile mob that spawns on Wizard Island .  Spawning [ ]  Wizard lizards spawn on Wizard Island , which is accessible through the portal on the Buffalkor Island or through a Wizard Portal . Level 20 Combat is required to go through the portal.  Drops [ ]  A wizard lizard rewards 51 Combat XP (198 with the 4x daily bonus) and 51 Light Melee , Heavy Melee , Magic , or Archery XP (198 with the 4x daily bonus) depending on the weapon the player used to defeat it.  Image Name Drop chance Empty Potion Bottle 150% Blue Page 0.5% Green Page 0.5% Red Page 0.5% Wizard Portal Shard 0.02% Wizard Boss Token 500% Jukebox Disks Red Jukebox Disk 0.35% Yellow Jukebox Disk 0.35% Blue Jukebox Disk 0.35% Green Jukebox Disk 0.01% Orange Jukebox Disk 0.01% Purple Jukebox Disk 0.01%  Weaknesses and Resistances [ ]  Resistances Weaknesses Physical Magical Physical Magical None Inferno Piercing Hydro  Trivia [ ]  The desert island key was removed from the Wizard Lizard’s drop table after the January 22, 2021 update as keys were replaced in favor of the newly-added Combat system. After the January 22, 2021 update, there was a bug where the wizard lizard cannot damage the player even though its attacking animation is played. This was patched 2 days later. The wizard lizard wields a spellbook that deals less damage than the spellbook players can craft. A picture of the wizard lizard can be seen in the explore menu . Unlike projectiles shot from players, projectiles shot from wizard lizards have a collision hitbox.

title: Wizard_Portal
content: Wizard Portal Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 1 Wizard Portal Shard 120 Stone Brick 30 Red Carpet Crafted with Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Required skill Level 20 Combat (To use) Best tool Luminous Transparent Description A placeable portal that allows quick-travel to Wizard Island.  The wizard portal is a portal block that allows the player to travel to the Wizard Island directly from their Player Island , rather than going through the portal on the Buffalkor Island .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Wizard Portal 1 Wizard Portal Shard 120 Stone Brick 30 Red Carpet Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Breaking [ ]  Wizard Portal Breaking Data Hardness 35 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 53 Wooden 105 105 Stone 56 56 Iron 35 35 Gilded Steel 25 25 Diamond 18 18 Opal 14 14 Void Mattock 7  Usage [ ]  Traveling [ ]  Wizard portals can be used to transport players to Wizard island from a player's island after reaching Combat level 20. If the skill prerequisite is not met, a UI element will pop up, stating that the player does not meet the required skill level.  Trivia [ ]  The inscription across the top of the portal reads "Islands" in the galactic alphabet . Around the portal you can find several potion bottles, several of them look quite similar to formula 86 .

title: Wooden_Fishing_Rod
content: Wooden Fishing Rod Type Tool Recipe 10 Oak Wood Crafted with Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 The Wooden Fishing Rod is a tool used for fishing .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Wooden Fishing Rod 10 Oak Wood Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Usage [ ]  Fishing [ ]  Fishing rods can be cast into water. After a short period of time, a fish "shadow" will approach the bobber and "bite" it. Particles will appear and a sound will play, the fish will start vibrating rapidly. If the rod is reeled in quickly enough the player obtains a fish or treasure. Walking away from the water source will cause the player to lose the shadow, making you try again.  Trivia [ ]  There is a glitch in which even if the player unequip it, they will still be doing the animation of holding it. However, this has since been patched. The bobber used to be able to be dragged around, making fishing easier. This has since been changed. If a player casts the rod and jump off from their island, it will ragdoll the player when the player is teleported. The bobber can allow the player to hang from a ledge, if positioned above the blocks a player wants to hang from. Wooden fishing rods can no longer catch high tier fish and treasures such as pearls and propellers. These can only be caught with an Iron Fishing Rod.

title: Wooden_Mallet
content: Wooden Mallet Type Heavy Melee Physical class Striking Attack damage 12 HP (Base) +6 HP (Critical) Recipe 40 Oak Wood Crafted with Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 The wooden mallet is a heavy melee weapon in the striking class.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Wooden Mallet 40 Oak Wood Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Heavy Melee , the wooden mallet deals a base damage of 12 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal an extra 6 HP of damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Heavy Melee skill and it is in the striking class.  History [ ]  October 15, 2022 Added wooden mallets. October 22, 2022 Fixed a bug that caused wooden mallets to not swing properly.

title: Wooden_Shortbow
content: Wooden Shortbow Type Ranged; Shortbow Attack damage 10 HP 17 HP (Fully charged) 18 - 21 HP ( Stone Short Arrow ) 31 - 36 HP (Stone Short Arrow; Fully charged) 23 - 28 HP ( Iron Short Arrow ) 39 - 48 HP (Iron Short Arrow; Fully charged) 28 - 34 HP ( Steel Short Arrow ) 48 - 58 HP (Steel Short Arrow; Fully charged) Recipe 75 Oak Wood Crafted with Anvil Description A basic, wooden shortbow The wooden shortbow is a ranged weapon that shoots small arrows .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Wooden Shortbow 75 Oak Wood Anvil  Attacking [ ]  To shoot the bow, at least one small arrow must be in the player's inventory . The bow can be charged by holding left click on PC or holding down on mobile and the damage dealt by the arrow will increase in proportion to the time the bow is charged.  At level 1 Archery , the wooden shortbow deals a base damage of 10 HP to mobs , and its damage can be increased by leveling up the Archery skill.  Charging [ ]  Charging a shot will increase the amount of damage dealt by 1.7x at full charge. This additional damage can be increased by leveling up the Archery skill.  History [ ]  August 9, 2020 Added basic bows. September 17, 2022 Renamed basic bows to the "Wooden Shortbow". Changed the recipe from 100 oak wood to 75 oak wood. Changed the description from "Ranged weapon that shoots arrows." to "A basic, wooden shortbow".

title: Wooden_Stool
content: Wooden Stool Type of block Solid block; Seat Recipe 20 Oak Wood Crafted with Furniture Workbench Best tool Luminous Transparent The wooden stool is a furniture block that can be crafted in the furniture workbench .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Wooden Stool 20 Oak Wood Furniture Workbench  Breaking [ ]  Wooden Stool Breaking Data Hardness 8 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 12 Wooden 24 24 Stone 13 13 Iron 8 8 Gilded Steel 6 6 Diamond 4 4 Opal 4 4 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Sitting [ ]  The wooden stool has a seat, which means players, mobs , and villagers are able to sit on the stool.  History [ ]  May 31, 2020 Added wooden stools.

title: Wooden_Sword
content: Wooden Sword Type Light Melee Physical class Slashing Attack damage 10 HP (Base) +5 HP (Critical) Recipe 20 Oak Wood Crafted with Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 The wooden sword is a light melee weapon in the slashing class.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Wooden Sword 20 Oak Wood Workbench Tier 1 Workbench Tier 2 Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4  Attacking [ ]  At level 1 Light Melee , the wooden sword deals a base damage of 10 HP and can be swung every 0.5 seconds. It has the ability to damage multiple mobs in one swing and moderate knockback. There's also a small chance of landing a critical hit when using this weapon, meaning the attack will deal an extra 5 HP of damage. Its damage can be increased by leveling up the Light Melee skill and it is in the slashing class.  Like other melee weapon , only one player can hit damage in each hostile mob. Multiple players cannot hit damage together.  History [ ]  May 2, 2020 Added wooden swords. May 4, 2020 Wooden swords no longer fall into the void when dropped. July 9, 2021 Changed the wooden sword's model. November 13, 2021 Fixed a bug that caused the wooden sword to swing very slowly. September 17, 2022 Wooden swords are now a slashing weapon.  Trivia [ ]  This was the first ever weapon to be released in Islands . This is the first craftable weapon not crafted in the anvil , the second being the stone sword . The wooden sword deals the second-lowest damage per attack, with the lowest being a tie between the lightning scepter and the maple shield . The weapon's current texture was taken from Easy.gg's other game, Bedwars .

title: Wooden_Trough
content: Wooden Trough Empty Half-full Full Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 30 Pine Wood 3 Iron Ingot Crafted with Animal Bench Required skill Level 4 Animal Care Best tool Luminous Transparent The wooden trough (formerly wheat trough ) is a block used to feed animals food .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Wooden Trough 30 Pine Wood 3 Iron Ingot Animal Bench Level 4 Animal Care  Breaking [ ]  Wooden Trough Breaking Data Hardness 12 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 18 Wooden 36 36 Stone 20 20 Iron 12 12 Gilded Steel 9 9 Diamond 6 6 Opal 5 5 Void Mattock 3  Usage [ ]  Feeding animals [ ]  Wooden troughs can be filled with 2 stacks of 10 food items to be fed to cows , sheep , pigs , chickens , turkeys , ducks , yaks , and horses . Animals will only eat their favorite foods or the that animal type's food.  History [ ]  October 3, 2020 Added wheat troughs. January 22, 2021 Renamed wheat troughs into wooden troughs. February 26, 2021 Fixed a bug where animals could not be milked or sheared after being full from eating from a wooden trough. December 29, 2021 Disabled manually placing items into wooden troughs. January 2, 2022 Re-enabled the ability to manually place items into wooden troughs. January 3, 2022 Disabled manually placing items into wooden troughs. Re-enabled the ability to manually place items into wooden troughs. January 4, 2022 Disabled manually placing items into wooden troughs. January 6, 2022 Re-enabled the ability to manually place items into wooden troughs. April 9, 2022 Fixed a bug that prevented ducks and yaks from eating from wooden troughs.  Trivia [ ]  When the wooden trough was first released, it was called the "wheat trough" since it could only hold wheat . This was changed on January 22, 2021 , when sheep were added.

title: Wood_Tube
content: Wood Tube Horizontal Vertical Ascend Descend Corner Type of block Solid block Recipe 5 Oak Wood Crafted with Maple Workbench (blueprint required) Best tool Luminous Transparent A wood tube is a block used to transport maple sap from tree taps .  Obtaining [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Blueprint required Wood Tube 5 Oak Wood Maple Workbench  Giving Bailey 5 Pancakes will reward you with the blueprint got the wood tube.  Breaking [ ]  Wood Tube Breaking Data Hardness 1 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 2 Wooden 3 3 Stone 2 2 Iron 1 1 Gilded Steel 1 1 Diamond 1 1 Opal 1 1 Void Mattock 1  Usage [ ]  Transporting maple sap [ ]  Wood tubes can be connected from tree taps to a sap boiler and from the latter to a syrup bottler . Wood tubes will only appear full if they are connected on both sides. Two wood tube pathways can be merged into one using a wood tube merger .  History [ ]  November 27, 2021 Added wood tubes.  Trivia [ ]  There is a visual bug where fluid within wood tubes will appear black instead of their usual color when a wood tube merger is connected to another wood tube merger.

title: Wood_Tube_Merger
content: Wood Tube Merger Type of block Solid block Recipe 25 Oak Wood Crafted with Maple Workbench ( blueprint required) Best tool Luminous Transparent Description Combines two wood tubes into one output. A wood tube merger is a block that merges two wood tube pathways into one.  Obtaining [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Blueprint required Wood Tube Merger 25 Oak Wood Maple Workbench  Breaking [ ]  Wood Tube Merger Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 18 Stone 10 10 Iron 6 6 Gilded Steel 5 5 Diamond 3 3 Opal 3 3 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Merging wood tubes [ ]  Wood tube mergers can be used to merge two wood tube pathways into one output. The output tube is the center tube perpendicular to the two input tubes.  History [ ]  November 27, 2021 Added wood tube mergers.  Trivia [ ]  There is a visual bug where fluid within wood tube mergers will appear black instead of their usual colour when one wood tube merger is connected to another.

title: Wool_Vacuum
content: Wool Vacuum Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 1 Medium Chest 1 Pink Sticky Gear 1 Gearbox Crafted with Animal Bench Required skill Level 47 Animal Care Best tool Luminous Transparent Description Automatically pulls wool off of sheep . Outputs wool onto conveyor after 60 seconds. The wool vacuum is an industrial machine that automates the process of shearing sheep .  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Required skill Wool Vacuum 1 Medium Chest 1 Pink Sticky Gear 1 Gearbox Animal Bench Level 47 Animal Care  Breaking [ ]  Wool Vacuum Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 18 Stone 10 10 Iron 6 6 Gilded Steel 5 5 Diamond 3 3 Opal 3 3 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Shearing sheep [ ]  When a sheep is ready to be sheared, it will walk to the nearest wool vaccum and will output wool . title: Workbench
content: Workbench Type of block Solid block; Interactable Spawns Player's Island Best tool Luminous Transparent Description "Used to construct starter island craftables."  The workbench is a crafting station that is spawned when a player's island is first generated.  Obtaining [ ]  Natural generation [ ]  A workbench naturally generates on the player's island when first playing Islands or after resetting the island.  Breaking [ ]  Workbench Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 18 Stone 10 10 Iron 6 6 Gilded Steel 5 5 Diamond 3 3 Opal 3 3 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Crafting recipes [ ]  Image Name Recipe Wooden Pickaxe 3 Oak Wood Workbench Tier 1 5 Oak Wood 2 Iron Ore  Tutorial [ ]  Using a workbench is a part of the tutorial .  Upgrading [ ]  The workbench can be upgraded into a workbench tier 1 with 5 oak wood and 2 iron ore . Upgrading the crafting station will replace the workbench with a workbench tier 1.  History [ ]  July 17, 2020 Added the workbench.

This was fixed the following day.

title: Workbench_Tier_4
content: Workbench Tier 4 Type of block Solid block; Interactable Recipe 250 Red Bronze Ingot 250 Hickory Wood Crafted with Workbench Tier 3 Workbench Tier 4 Best tool Luminous Transparent Description Used to craft advanced industrial island craftables. The workbench tier 4 is a crafting station used to craft some of the most advanced items . Like the other workbenches, it has more crafting recipes than its predecessor, the workbench tier 3 , and is currently the highest tiered workbench.  Once placed, players may spawn oil resource islands using oil resource deeds . Upgrading the crafting station will replace the workbench tier 3 with a workbench tier 4. title: World_Map_Guide
content: The world map guide is a feature in Islands that allows the player to read information on islands , view a bird's-eye view of most islands, and view their current location, which is represented by a green icon. It can be accessed by clicking the World Map Guide button when outside of any player island , which replaces the manage island permissions button in said location.  Trivia [ ]  Meshes will appear gray in the bird's-eye view of islands . The Maple Isles is incorrectly referred to as "Maple Island". There are only two permanent islands which the world map guide does not show: the Diamond Mines , which has its information merged with the Buffalkor Island page; and the Void Isles , which the world map guide has no information on. The Underworld page in the world map guide does not include a bird's-eye view of the island; instead, the text "UNKNOWN LOCATION" appears instead. This is because the bird's-eye view of each island are directly recycled from the ones that appear on treasure maps , which does not include a view of the Underworld.

title: Wreath
content: Wreath Type of block Solid block Buy cost 40 Snowflakes Best tool Luminous Transparent Description Decorate your entryway with this winter edition door topper!  The wreath is a decorative event item that was purchasable  from Santa during the 2020 Christmas event . They can still be obtained from Christmas Presents , which spawned on Player Islands during the event.  Obtaining [ ]  Purchasing [ ]  Wreaths were sold by Santa during the 2020 Christmas Event for 40 Snowflakes.  Christmas Presents [ ]  Wreaths are also obtainable by opening Christmas Presents , and since some players still have unopened ones these can still be obtained.  Breaking [ ]  Wreath Breaking Data Hardness 1 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 2 Wooden 3 3 Stone 2 2 Iron 1 1 Gilded Steel 1 1 Diamond 1 1 Opal 1 1 Void Mattock 1  Trivia [ ]  This was the cheapest block or item Santa sold.

title: Xor_Gate
content: Xor Gate Type of block Solid block; Electrical Recipe 20 Iron Ingot 40 Electrite Crafted with Electrical Workbench (Level 2) Best tool Luminous Transparent Description A logic gate that allows electrical passthrough if ONLY ONE input receives power.  The xor gate is an electrical component that can be crafted with 20 iron and 40 electrite in a level 2 electrical workbench . The xor gate is a logic gate has two inputs and a passthrough. A xor gate will only allow passthrough if only one input is powered.  Obtaining [ ]  Crafting [ ]  Name Recipe Crafting station Xor Gate 20 Iron Ingot 40 Electrite Electrical Workbench (Level 2)  Breaking [ ]  Xor Gate Breaking Data Hardness 6 Best Tool None Max Hits Needed Material/Tool Axe Pickaxe Stone Shovel 9 Wooden 18 18 Stone 10 10 Iron 6 6 Gilded Steel 5 5 Diamond 3 3 Opal 3 3 Void Mattock 2  Usage [ ]  Electrical circuits [ ]  Xor gates work similarly to or gates in that they both let power through if one input is powered. The difference is an or gate will let the greater input through, while this one will only let power through if one is powered.  History [ ]  December 11, 2020 Added xor gates.  Trivia [ ]  This block works just like real XOR gates in real life. The reason NAND Gate, NOR Gate, NOT Gate, and XNOR Gate weren't added because then it would be possible to make an infinite power source. However, this could be solved by having a power requirement in order for these gates to function.

title: Yak
content: Yak Behavior Passive Effect Speed (+25% when mounted) Location Player's Island A yak is a large passive mob that was added in the March 25, 2022 update and a source of yak milk . Players can ride it to receive a 25% speed boost.  It is the seventh animal passive mob in Islands .  Spawning [ ]  The number of yaks that can exist on the player's island varies depending on their level in Animal Care .  Yak spawn egg [ ]  Yaks can be spawned with yak spawn eggs . Yak spawn eggs are obtained by breeding yaks or purchasing them from Taliyah .  Behavior [ ]  A yak can be lured with radishes and can sleep on hay beds .  Milking [ ]  A yak can be milked with a bucket or automatically with an industrial milker to create a yak milk bucket . Yaks can be milked after fully feeding them.  Breeding [ ]  After two yaks have been given a potion of fertility each, they will breed, creating a yak spawn egg . The egg will be of a tier between 1 and 3.  Sleeping [ ]  When it becomes night in-game, yaks will go to sleep. While they can sleep anywhere and sometimes will, they prefer to sleep on a hay bed.  Inspecting [ ]  Yaks can be inspected to show a menu that allows the player to see information about the yak, listed below:  Mount Sell value Information Food level Favorite foods Happiness level Traits (fertility, productivity, and friendliness) Personality  Feeding [ ]  Yaks can be fed approximately every 90 - 100 seconds. Yaks eat radishes , but will also each have its own favorite foods. The foods a yak can have as its favorite food are bread , sushi rolls , tomato soup , and avocado toast .  Feeding a yak will increase its food and friendliness level. The food level is necessary to keep above 20% or the yak will start losing happiness. The milking cooldown can also be skipped if a yak is fully fed.  A wooden trough , metal trough , or automated trough can be used to feed yaks.  Like other animals , if no troughs are in its vicinity, it will eat from a grass block , but doing so will not replenish its hunger meter nor give Animal Care XP.  Petting [ ]  A yak can be petted every 5 minutes, which increases its happiness level. The action yields 5 Animal Care XP (18 XP with the 4x daily bonus).  Mounting [ ]  Yaks can be mounted via the button in the inspect menu if the player is level 8 or higher in Animal Care. A mounted yak can be ridden anywhere within the server. If the yak is dismounted outside the player's island or falls into the void, the yak will respawn on the island spawn point. Mounting a yak will grant a 25% speed boost that stacks with other items that grant bonus movement speed. When the player taking any damage while mounting a yak, it will no longer automatically be dismounted.  Personality [ ]  Yaks are assigned a personality upon spawning. All personalities have the same possibility, except for resourceful which is more uncommon.  Personality Description Effects Trivia Lazy "Your yak is lazy. They sleep for a long time, but gain a bit of happiness while sleeping." Yak will sleep during the afternoon and evening, but will still gain happiness while sleeping. Level-headed "Your yak is level-headed. They will not gain or lose happiness quickly." Self-Explanatory Loyal "Your yak is loyal. They are extra happy around players and animals but can become very lonely when left alone." Yak will gain happiness faster if players and/or animals are within an unknown number blocks, but will lose happiness fast if they are further than that threshold. Friendly "Your yak is friendly. They will bring you extra gifts." Unknown Resourceful "Woah! Your yak is resourceful. They will produce items faster than other animals." Yak will make products (yak milk) faster than normal. This is the rarest personality.  History [ ]  March 25, 2022 Added yaks. Introduced where yaks are now able to eat grass blocks . Changed the "Info" section of the yak's inspection UI to reference itself instead of cows . April 9, 2022 Fixed a bug that prevented yaks from being milked with a bucket . Fixed a bug that prevented yaks from eating from wooden troughs , metal troughs , or automated troughs .  Trivia [ ]  Yaks can move with the sleeping animation, but this can be fixed by mounting and dismounting. Like all other animals, yaks may eat from a grass block instead of from troughs, but doing so will not replenish their hunger meter nor give Animal Care XP. This can be done if no troughs are nearby. The eating sound of yaks is reduced when eating grass blocks. Although yaks can jump over 3-height blocks, yaks cannot jump over half-height blocks such as slabs . If a player mounts another animal while being mounted on a yak, they will continue to have the speed boost even when unmounted. The yak's inspection UI incorrectly states that it can be fed wheat instead of radishes . The "Info" section in the yak's inspection UI was a direct copy of the cows before it was changed half an hour after the update was released. Before April 9, 2022 , yaks could only be milked using an industrial milker and could not eat from troughs. Yaks are the third-tallest animal model, only behind the old model of cows and horses . Yaks share many things with other animals . Yaks share the same eating sound as cows, sheep , pigs , turkeys , and horses. Yaks have the same eye model as turkeys, ducks , horses, and the old model of cows. Yaks have the same animations as cows, sheep, and pigs. Yaks have the same horn model as cows. Yaks do not have a sound when mooing, awake, or being petted. Like ducks and horses, there was a bug where the extra boosts granted when mounting a yak will wear off when joining other servers. This was fixed in the July 9, 2022 update. The hitbox of players is slightly increased when mounting a yak. Yaks are the second animal that granted a speed boost when mounted, with the other being ducks and horses. Yaks, cows, and turkeys have the same amount of Animal Care XP and number of favorite foods .

title: Yak_Spawn_Egg
content: Yak Spawn Egg Buy cost Tier 1: 15,000 coins Required skill Tier 1: Level 49 Animal Care (to buy) Description Spawn a yak with tier 1/2/3 trait maximums. Eats radishes. The yak spawn egg is a spawn egg used to spawn yaks on player islands . There are 3 tiers of the egg; one can be bought while the other two can only be obtained through breeding yaks.  Obtaining [ ]  Purchasing [ ]  Tier 1 yak spawn eggs can be purchased from Taliyah for 17,500 coins each after reaching level 49 Animal Care .  Breeding [ ]  Any tier of this egg can be obtained by breeding two yaks. To breed yaks, the player must feed them each a potion of fertility during the day (in-game). The traits of the two animals will determine the tier of the spawn egg.  Usage [ ]  Spawning [ ]  Players can only spawn yaks if they have not reached the large animal limit and are the owner of the island they are on. While holding the egg, they can click/tap anywhere on their screen to spawn a yak.  History [ ]  March 25, 2022 Added yak spawn eggs.

title: Yuzi
content: Yuzi Location Hub Purpose Sells Lunar New Year-themed furniture blocks. Occupation Lunar Yuzi is a villager who was located in the Hub during the Lunar New Year event . She sold Lunar New Year-themed furniture and once every 20 hours, players could have claimed a red envelope from her.  Shop [ ]  Image Name Price Red Envelope 0 coins [ 1 ] Fortune Cookie 30,000 coins Lion Lounge 22,500 coins Lunar Banner 2,500 coins Lunar Drum 7,000 coins Lunar Gate 100,000 coins Lunar Lamp 3,000 coins Stacked Star Lunar Lantern 4,000 coins Star Lunar Lantern 3,000 coins Stacked Lunar Lantern 2,500 coins Lunar Lantern Small 2,000 coins Tiger Bean Bag 10,000 coins Tiger Coin Bag 15,000 coins Tiger Fridge 20,000 coins Tiger Jacuzzi 50,000 coins  Dialogue [ ]  "Happy Lunar New Year user !" >View Shop Leads to shop. >Tell me about Lunar New Year Yuzi randomly says one of the lines below: "Are you excited to see the fireworks too? Oh, did I speak too soon?" >Okay! "What can I do for you?" Returns to default options. "Can't wait for all of the delicious foods on Lunar New Year! My favorite is the bao! Thinking about it makes me hungry." >Okay! "What can I do for you?" Returns to default options. "They say people born in each Zodiac's year have some of that Zodiac's personality traits. That's probably why cats love me so much!" >Okay! "What can I do for you?" Returns to default options. "Giving people red envelopes brings me so much joy." >Okay! "What can I do for you?" Returns to default options. "Did you know that 2022 is the year of the water tiger? I thought cats hate water." >Okay! "What can I do for you?" Returns to default options. title: Zombie_Cletus
content: Zombie Cletus Health 30,000 HP Behavior Hostile Attack strength 36 (Hand Strike) 36 (Rock Hurl) 36 (Boulder Throw} 10 (Smoke Pout) Drops Cauldron Spider Pet Spawn Egg Zombie Cletus Token Jukebox Disk Location Hub Zombie Cletus was a boss that could have been summoned in the Hub during the 2022 Halloween event . He has 30 minutes summon cooldown and can be summoned without any Combat level requirement.  Description [ ]  Zombie Cletus was a moderately fast boss who specialized in heavy-hitting attacks. He had 30,000 health and could have been summoned in the Hub next to the mountains. He could have been summoned once every 30 minutes without any Combat level requirement. However, the cooldown could have been bypassed using at least 500 Zombie Cletus tokens .  Like other bosses , if there are no players in the battle area, Zombie Cletus will despawn and the player will have to wait another 30 minutes or use at least 500 Zombie Cletus tokens before being able to fight him again.  Attacks [ ]  Hand Strike [ ]  Zombie Cletus uses his hand to hit the players in front of him. He will do 36 damage and deal moderate knockback.  Rock Hurl [ ]  Zombie Cletus will target the furthest players from him and then stomp the ground and hurl rocks towards them, dealing 36 damage and moderate knockback if the rocks hit any players.  Boulder Throw [ ]  Zombie Cletus throws a boulder at a player, dealing 36 damage and extremely large knockback, and dismount their mounts to any player who makes contact with the boulder. Players can be damaged multiple times by the boulder.  Roar [ ]  Zombie Cletus will roar, which will summon green void smoke in the direction that he is facing. The void smoke damages players for 10 HP every second for 10 seconds.  Summon [ ]  Zombie Cletus will summon 1 - 7 spider candles in proportion to how many players are in the arena.  Drops [ ]  Zombie Cletus rewarded 759 Combat XP (3039 with the 4x daily bonus) and 759 Light Melee , Heavy Melee , Magic , or Archery XP (3039 with the 4x daily bonus) depending on the weapon the player used to defeat him.  Only a certain number of players will receive drops if too many players are simultaneously fighting him. However, all players will still receive XP.  Image Name Drop chance Cauldron 100% Spider Pet Spawn Egg 0.33% Zombie Cletus Token [ 1 ] 100 - 300 Jukebox Disks Red Jukebox Disk 0.35% Yellow Jukebox Disk 0.35% Blue Jukebox Disk 0.35% Green Jukebox Disk 0.01% Purple Jukebox Disk 0.01% Orange Jukebox Disk 0.01%  Damage reduction [ ]  Zombie Cletus reduces the amount of damage dealt to him by 10% to 55% depending on the number of players (compounds) in the arena.  Number of players Damage reduction 1 0% 2 10% 3 25% 4 35% 5 45% 6+ 55%  Resistances and Weaknesses [ ]  Resistances Weaknesses Physical Magical Physical Magical Striking Hydro , Void Piercing Inferno , Ethereal  Bugs and glitches [ ]  Players may sometimes get stuck inside of the boulder, causing them to continuously get damaged until they die. The boulder may sometimes launch players extremely far, sometimes causing players to land on Slime Island if they're facing the island.  History [ ]  October 15, 2022 Added Zombie Cletus. October 16, 2022 Buffed Zombie Cletus' health and attack damage. October 22, 2022 Zombie Cletus can now drop spider pet spawn eggs . Zombie Cletus can now spawn spider candles . November 4, 2022 Zombie Cletus can no longer be spawned. Removed Zombie Cletus from the combat catalogue .  Trivia [ ]  The interface to summon Zombie Cletus had the text, "Pay respects to Cletus," which was a reference to the Press F to pay respects meme. Zombie Cletus, the Slime King , Percival the Pumpkin King , Fhanhorn , the Lunar Rabbit , and Draven are the only bosses that can be summoned without any Combat level requirement. He was the second boss that dropped his own token upon defeat, the first being the Void Serpent . Zombie Cletus shares the same magical resistances and weaknesses as bandits . Zombie Cletus was the first and only event boss that has a summon cooldown. Contrastingly, this summon cooldown can be bypassed with at least 500 tokens .

title: Zombie_Cletus_Token
content: Zombie Cletus Token Dropped by Spider Candle Zombie Cletus The Zombie Cletus token is an item that was used to bypass the summon cooldown of Zombie Cletus or purchase cauldrons . Since the November 4, 2022 update, it currently has no use.  Obtaining [ ]  Catching [ ]  Ember skulls were guaranteed to 15 - 55 Zombie Cletus tokens when caught with a net or golden net .  Cauldron [ ]  Opening a cauldron has a chance of rewarding 75 - 1000 Zombie Cletus tokens, having a rarity of 'common'.  Mob drop [ ]  Spider candles were guaranteed to drop 6 - 9 Zombie Cletus tokens upon defeat and Zombie Cletus was guaranteed to drop 100 - 300 Zombie Cletus tokens upon defeat.  Usage [ ]  Summoning [ ]  500 Zombie Cletus tokens could have been used to bypass Zombie Cletus ' summon cooldown in his spawn area in the Hub during the Halloween 2022 event.  Purchasing [ ]  Zombie Cletus tokens could have been used to purchase cauldrons from Kontos during the Halloween 2022 event.  Image Name Buy cost Cauldron 750 Zombie Cletus Token  History [ ]  October 15, 2022 Added Zombie Cletus tokens. October 22, 2022 Decreased the number of Zombie Cletus tokens given when catching ember skulls . November 4, 2022 Zombie Cletus tokens can no longer be obtained from ember skulls and spider candles . Zombie Cletus tokens can no longer be used to summon Zombie Cletus . Zombie Cletus tokens can no longer be used to purchase cauldrons .
